(fn connected?
  ([nodes]
   (connected? (set (first nodes)) (rest nodes) []))
  ([connected new-paths parked-nodes]
   (if (empty? new-paths)
     (empty? parked-nodes)
     (let [[a b] (first new-paths)]
       (if (or (connected a) (connected b))
         (connected? (conj connected a b) (concat (rest new-paths) parked-nodes) [])
         (connected? connected (rest new-paths) (conj parked-nodes [a b])))))))

(fn [e]
  (let [edges (for [[k v] e] [{k [v]} {v [k]}])
        g (apply merge-with concat (apply concat edges))
        init (first (keys g))
        dfs (fn dfs [k seen]
              (let [seen (conj seen k)]
                (apply clojure.set/union seen 
                  (map #(dfs % seen) 
                    (filter (complement seen) (g k))))))]
    (= (dfs init #{}) (into #{} (apply concat e)))))

(fn connected? [s]
        (let [n (set (apply concat s))]
          (loop [x (if (first n) [(first n)] []) o #{} d (set (rest n))]
            (if (empty? x)
              (empty? d)
              (let [e (set (apply concat (filter #(some #{(first x)} %) s)))]
                (recur (remove #(or (o %) (= % (first x))) e)
                       (conj o (first x)) (set (remove e d))))))))

(fn graph-connected? [edges]
  "inserting the body of graph tour and running it on doubled edges"
  (letfn [(graph-tour [edges]

            (letfn ((remove-first [pred [head & tail]]
                      (cond
                        (nil? head) nil
                        (pred head) tail
                        :else (cons head (remove-first pred tail))))
                    (traverse [current-node remaining-edges]
                      (if (empty? remaining-edges)
                        1
                        (let [possible-paths (filter (fn [[a b]] (or (= a current-node) (= b current-node))) remaining-edges)]
                          (if (empty? possible-paths)
                            0
                            (reduce (fn [result [a b :as edge]]
                                      (let [next (if (= a current-node) b a)]
                                        (+ result (traverse next (remove-first #(= % edge) remaining-edges)))))
                                    0 possible-paths))))))
              (let [start-nodes (reduce (fn [n [from to]]
                                          (conj n from))
                                        #{} edges)
                    edges edges]
                (map #(traverse % edges) start-nodes)
                (< 0 (reduce + (map #(traverse % edges) start-nodes))))))]


    
    (graph-tour (concat edges edges))))

(fn conn?
   [edges]
   (let [bs (map #(into #{} [%])
                 (distinct (flatten (vec edges))))]
     (= 1 (count
            (reduce
              (fn [bs [x y]]
                (let [[xs ys]
                      (filter
                        #(or (% x) (% y))
                        bs)]
                  (if (nil? ys)
                    bs
                    (conj
                      (filter
                        #(not (or (% x) (% y)))
                        bs)
                      (into xs ys)))))
              bs edges)))))

(fn [graph]
   (let [all-nodes (into #{} (apply concat graph))]
        (letfn [(neighbours [node]
                  (apply concat (filter #(some (partial = node) %) graph)))]
          (loop [q (conj (clojure.lang.PersistentQueue/EMPTY) (ffirst graph))
                 seen #{}]
            (if (empty? q)
              (= seen all-nodes)
              (let [node (peek q)]
                (if (seen node)
                  (recur (pop q) seen)
                  (recur (into (pop q) (neighbours node)) (conj seen node)))))))))

(fn connected?  [edges]
  (let [coll (set (flatten (vec edges))),
        edges (map set edges),     
        adj? (fn [x y] (not= nil (some (partial = (set [x y])) edges))),
        connected? (fn [coll adj?]
                     (= (set coll) 
                        (loop [coll (into #{} coll), 
                               queue (conj [] (first coll)), 
                               verts #{}]
                          (cond (empty? queue) verts,
                                :else (let [children 
                                            (filter #(adj? (peek queue) %)
                                                    coll)]
                                        (recur (remove (set children) coll) 
                                               (vec (concat (butlast queue) 
                                                            children)) 
                                               (conj verts (peek queue)) ))))))]
	(connected? coll adj?)))

(fn [pairs]
(let [verts (distinct (flatten (vec pairs)))
      pairs (mapcat (fn [[a b]] [[a b] [b a]]) pairs)
      neighbors (fn [v] (set (for [[a b] pairs :when (= a v)] b)))
      reachable
      (fn [start]
        (loop [todo (list start) seen #{}]
          (if (empty? todo)
            seen
            (recur (into (pop todo) (clojure.set/difference (neighbors (peek todo)) seen))
                   (conj seen (peek todo))))))]
      (= (count verts) (count (reachable (first verts))))))

(fn [g]
   (let [V (set (flatten (seq g)))
         P (atom (into {} (map #(vector % 0) V)))
         nn #(reduce (fn [s [a b]]
                        (cond (= a %) (if (= (@P b) 0) (conj s b) s)
                              (= b %) (if (= (@P a) 0) (conj s a) s)
                              :else s))
                     [] g) ]
            (letfn [(go [v]
                       (swap! P assoc v 1) 
                       (doseq [i (nn v)]
                           (go i)))]
                (go (first V))
                (if (some #(= 0 (last %)) @P)
                    false
                    true))))

(fn connected [edges]
  (letfn [
    (connect [components edge] 
      (let [nodes (set edge), 
            connected   (filter #(not-empty (clojure.set/intersection % nodes)) components), 
            unconnected (filter #(empty?    (clojure.set/intersection % nodes)) components)]
        (conj unconnected
              (apply clojure.set/union (conj connected nodes)))))]
    (= 1 (count
      (reduce connect [] edges)))))

(fn foo [xs]
  (let [ys (seq xs)
        zs (set (flatten ys))]
    (loop [i 1 x (first ys)]
      (if (= i (count ys))
        (= zs (set x))
        (recur (inc i)
               (let [_ (for [y ys
                             :when (or (some (partial = (first y)) x)
                                       (some (partial = (second y)) x))]
                         y)]
                 (vec (set (flatten _)))))))))

(fn cg? [g]
     (let [n (set (mapcat identity g))
           cg (group-by first (set (mapcat (fn [[a b]] [[a b] [b a]]) g)))]
       (loop [loc (first (first g)) tn #{loc} tp {} d (zipmap n (repeat 0))]
         (cond (= (count tn) (count n)) true
               (= (set (mapcat cg tn)) (set (mapcat tp tn))) false
               :else (let [id (d loc)
                           p (nth (cycle (cg loc)) id)
                           n_g (second p)]
                       (recur n_g (conj tn n_g) (merge-with concat tp {loc [p]}) (update-in d [loc] inc)))))))

(fn gc[s]
	(letfn [(vertices[s]
		  (reduce into #{} s))
		(edges-with[e]
		  (set (filter #(some #{e} %) s)))] 
		(let [vs (vertices s)
		      n  (count vs)
		      x  (first vs)]
		  (loop [L  #{x}
			 K  [x]] 
			(if (and K (not-empty K))
			   (let [[y & K] K
						  yzs (edges-with y)
					      zs (filter #(not (L %)) (vertices yzs))] 
						(recur (set (concat L zs)) (concat K zs)))
					(= n (count L)))))))

(fn [graph]
  (let [nodes (reduce (fn [acc x]
                (let [[from to] x
                      temp (assoc acc from (conj (acc from []) to))]
                  (assoc temp to (conj (temp to []) from)))) {} graph)]
    (loop [tovisit [(first (keys nodes))] visited #{}]
      (if (empty? tovisit)
        (= (count visited) (count nodes))
        (if (contains? visited (peek tovisit))
          (recur (pop tovisit) visited)
          (recur  (into (pop tovisit) (nodes (peek tovisit))) 
                  (conj visited (peek tovisit))))))))

(fn [s] (letfn [(solve [s known]    
                    (if (empty? s)    
                      true    
                      (boolean (some identity    
                            (map #(solve (disj s %) (into known %))    
                                 (filter #(or (known (first %)) (known (second %))) s))))))]    
            (solve (disj s (first s)) (into #{} (first s)))))

(fn [g]
  (loop [visited (set (first g))
         g (set (map set g))]
    (let [delta-edges (set (for [v visited, e g, :when (e v)] e))]
      (if (empty? delta-edges)
        (empty? g)
        (recur
          (apply conj visited (mapcat vec delta-edges))
          (apply disj g delta-edges))))))

(fn [edges]
  (let [find-connections (fn [m [a b]] (conj m
                                             [a (conj (m a) b)]
                                             [b (conj (m b) a)])) 
        connections (reduce find-connections {} edges)
        num-vertices (->> edges vec flatten distinct count)]
    (letfn [(traverse [seen v]
              (if (seen v)
                seen
                (let [seen (conj seen v)]
                  (apply conj seen v (mapcat (partial traverse seen) (connections v))))))]
      (= num-vertices (count (traverse #{} (ffirst edges)))))))

(fn [edges]
  (letfn
    [(graph [edges]
       (let [edges2 (->> edges
                         (map reverse)
                         (concat edges)
                         (map vec)
                         set
                         (group-by first))]
          (apply conj {}
             (for [k (keys edges2)]
                  [k (map second (get edges2 k))]))))
     (reach [vlis graph]
       (let [vlis2 (distinct
                   (concat vlis
                           (apply concat
                                  (map graph vlis))))]
             (if (= (count vlis) (count vlis2))
               vlis
               (reach vlis2 graph))))]
       (let [verts (distinct (flatten (vec edges)))
             g1 (graph edges)]
        (boolean (= (count verts)
                    (count (reach (take 1 verts)
                                  g1)))))))

(fn [edges]
  (letfn [
    (connections [edges]
      (reduce (fn [C e]
        (let [a (first e), b (second e)]
          (if (= a b)
            C ;ignore self-reference
            (merge-with clojure.set/union C 
              {a #{b}, b #{a}}))))
        {} edges))

    (connected? [C]
      (if (empty? C) true
      ((fn [U I D]
      (loop [kwn (-> C first key list set), 
             unk (-> C rest keys set)]
        (if (empty? unk)
          true
          (let [bnd (apply U (map C kwn))]             
            (if (empty? (I bnd unk))        
              false                                               
              (recur (U kwn bnd)                       
                     (D unk bnd)))))))
      clojure.set/union 
      clojure.set/intersection
      clojure.set/difference)))]

  (connected? (connections edges))))

(fn connected? [edges]
  (= 1
     (->>
       edges
       (reduce
         (fn [conn-sets edge]
           (let [new-set (set edge)
                 matches (filter
                           #(seq (clojure.set/intersection % new-set))
                           conn-sets)]
             (case (count matches)
               0 (conj conn-sets new-set)
               1 (-> conn-sets
                     (disj (first matches))
                     (conj (clojure.set/union (first matches) new-set)))
               2 (-> conn-sets
                     (disj (first matches) (second matches))
                     (conj (apply clojure.set/union matches))))))
         #{})
       count)))

(fn [g]
  (let [nodes (reduce into #{} g)
        n-nodes (count nodes)
        first-node (first (first g))
        connected-nodes (fn [n]
                          (for [[n1 n2] g
                                :when (or (= n1 n)
                                          (= n2 n))]
                            (if (= n1 n) n2 n1)))]
    (loop [node first-node
           walk #{node}
           extra-nodes #{}]
      (let [connected (set (connected-nodes node))]
        (if-let [next-node (some #(if-not (walk %) %) connected)]
          (recur next-node (conj walk next-node) (disj connected next-node))
          (if-let [next-node (first extra-nodes)]
            (recur next-node (conj walk next-node) (disj extra-nodes next-node))
            (= n-nodes (count walk))))))))

(fn gc [s]
  (letfn [(path-res [prem autres]
                   (if (empty? autres)
                     (if (= (count prem) (count s))
                       true
                       false)
                     (for [e autres]
                       (if (not (connect (last prem) e))
                         false
                         (path-res (conj prem e) (filter #(not= e %) autres))))))
			(connect [[w x] [y z]]
				(if (or (= w y)
					(= w z)
					(= x y)
					(= x z))
					true
					false))]
						 
    (if (some #{true} (flatten (for [prem s]
                                 (let [autres (filter #(not= prem %) s)]
                                   (path-res [prem] autres))))) true false)))

(letfn
      [(remove-path [graph a b]
         (update-in (update-in graph [a] disj b)
                    [b] disj a))
       (find-node [graph start node]
         (let [nbors (graph start)]
           (or (= start node)
               (nbors node)
               (some #(find-node (remove-path graph start %) % node) nbors))))]
      (fn [edges]
        (let [; '(:a :b ...)
              nodes (->> edges seq flatten distinct)
              ; map of {node #{neighbors}, ...}
              graph (reduce (fn [m [a b]]
                              (update-in
                                (update-in m [a] (comp set conj) b)
                                [b] (comp set conj) a)) {} edges)
              ]
          (every? identity
                  (for [a nodes b nodes :when (not= a b)] (find-node graph a b))))))

(letfn [(adjs-of-node [node edges]
          (let [rfn (fn [adj [fe se]]
                      (cond
                       (= node fe) (conj adj se)
                       (= node se) (conj adj fe)
                       :else adj))]
            (reduce rfn #{} edges)))
        (all-nodes [edges] (into #{} (mapcat identity edges)))
        (next-adjacency [nodes edges]
          (apply clojure.set/union nodes (map #(adjs-of-node % edges) nodes)))
        (adj-seq
          ([edges] (adj-seq #{(ffirst edges)} edges))
          ([nodes edges] (cons nodes (lazy-seq (adj-seq (next-adjacency nodes edges) edges)))))]
  (fn [edges]
    (let [s (adj-seq edges)
          l (atom nil)
          [res] (drop-while #(not= @l (reset! l %)) s)]
      (= res (all-nodes edges)))))

(fn connected-parts [edges]
   (= 1 (count
       (let [nodes (set (apply concat edges))]
         (reduce
          (fn [classes edge]
            (let [joined (apply clojure.set/union (filter (partial some (set edge)) classes))
                  independent (filter (complement (partial some (set edge))) classes)]
              (cons joined independent)))
          (map (comp set vector) nodes)
          edges)))))

#((fn graph-con [gs] 
    (if (= 1 (count gs)) 
      true 
      (letfn [(v-inc? [g] ((complement empty?) (clojure.set/intersection (first gs) g)))] 
        (let [bg (filter v-inc? (rest gs)) gs (remove v-inc? (rest gs))] 
          (if (empty? bg) false (graph-con (cons (reduce clojure.set/union bg) gs))) )))) (map set %))

(fn cc [g]
  (letfn [(get [cs v] 
            (first (filter #((second %) v) cs)))
          (add [cs v]
            (if (get cs v) cs (assoc cs (count cs) #{v})))
          (connect [cs [v1 v2]]
                 (let [cs (add cs v1)
                       cs (add cs v2)
                       [c1 vs1] (get cs v1)
                       [c2 vs2] (get cs v2)]
                  	(if (= c1 c2)
                     	cs
                     	(assoc (dissoc cs c2) c1 (set (concat vs1 vs2))))))]
    (= 1 (count (reduce connect {} g)))))

(fn connected? [graph]
  (->>
   graph
   ((fn add-pair [connected pairs]
   (if (empty? pairs)
     connected
     (let [[x y] (first pairs)]
       (recur 
        (cond
         (and (connected x) (connected y))
         (into {} (map (fn [[a b]] [a (get {(connected y) (connected x)} b b)]) connected))
         (connected x) (assoc connected y (connected x))
         (connected y) (assoc connected x (connected y))
         :else (assoc connected x x y x))
        (rest pairs))))) {})
   vals
   set
   count
   (= 1)
   ))

(fn connected? [graph]
  (letfn [(adjacent [graph v]
            (reduce (fn [res [a b]]
                      (cond (= v a) (conj res b)
                            (= v b) (conj res a)
                            :else res))
                    #{} graph))

          (dfs
            ([graph] (dfs graph (first (first graph))))
            ([graph v]
             (loop [stack (vector v)
                    visited #{}]
               (if (empty? stack)
                 visited
                 (let [v           (peek stack)
                       neighbors   (adjacent graph v)
                       not-visited (filter (complement #(visited %)) neighbors)
                       new-stack   (into (pop stack) not-visited)]
                   (if (visited v)
                     (recur new-stack visited)
                     (recur new-stack (conj visited v))))))))

          (all-vertices [graph]
            (reduce (fn [vert [a b]] (-> vert (conj a) (conj b))) #{} graph))]

    (and (= (all-vertices graph) (dfs graph)))))

(fn [edges]
  (loop [list-graph #{}
         graph (set (first edges))
         otheredges (rest edges)]
         (if (empty? otheredges)
         (let [c (count list-graph)]
		      (cond
			  (<= c 1) true
			  (>= c 2) (let [intset (apply clojure.set/intersection list-graph)] (if (empty? intset) false true))))						
         (let [inGraph (into {} (for [x list-graph y graph :when (contains? x y)] {x (apply conj x graph)}))
               graph-set (set (keys inGraph))
               new-graph (if (empty? inGraph) 
                             (conj list-graph graph)
                             (apply conj (filter #(not (contains? graph-set %)) list-graph) (vals inGraph)))]
            (recur new-graph
                   (set (first otheredges))
                   (rest otheredges))))))

(fn [e]
  (let [C count
        m (atom #{})]
    (= (-> e vec flatten set C)
       (C (set (tree-seq
                 #(when-not (@m %) (swap! m conj %))
                 #(keep
                    (fn [[x y]] (when (and (= x %) (not= y %)) y))
                    (into e (map (fn [[x y]] [y x]) e)))
                 (ffirst e)))))))

(fn [edges]
  (letfn 
    [(add-edge [emap edge] 
        (update-in emap [(first edge)] #(conj (or %1 #{}) (second edge))))
     (node-map [edges]
        (reduce #(add-edge (add-edge %1 %2) (vec (reverse %2))) {} edges))]  
    
    (let [nmap (node-map edges)]
      (boolean (= (count (keys nmap)) (count
        (loop [visited-nodes #{} unvisited-nodes #{(first (first edges))}]
          (if (empty? unvisited-nodes) visited-nodes
              (let [node (first unvisited-nodes)
                    new-visited-nodes (conj visited-nodes node)
                    adjacent-unvisited-nodes 
                      (filter #(not (contains? new-visited-nodes %)) (get nmap node))]
                (recur new-visited-nodes (into (disj unvisited-nodes node) adjacent-unvisited-nodes)))))))))))

(fn graph-connected? [edges]
  (letfn [(merge-edges [n e]
            (apply conj n e))
          (edge-connected? [c e]
            (or (contains? c (first e))
                (contains? c (second e))))
          (connected-with [c e]
            (reduce merge-edges c
                    (filter #(edge-connected? c %)
                            e)))]
    (let [nodes (reduce merge-edges #{} edges)
          start (merge-edges #{} (first edges))]
      (loop [c start]
        (let [connected (connected-with c edges)]
          (cond
            (= (count connected) (count nodes)) true
            (= (count connected) (count c)) false
            true (recur connected)))))))

(fn [graph]
  (loop [visitied (set (first graph)) edges (rest graph)]
    (if (= (count edges) 0) true
      (let [grouped (group-by #(and (nil? (visitied (first %)))
                                  (nil? (visitied (last  %)))) edges)]
        (if-let [near (grouped false)]
          (recur (into visitied (flatten near)) (grouped true))
          false)))))

(fn graph-con ([graph] (graph-con (first graph) (rest graph)))
  ([item graph]
    (if (empty? graph) true
      (let [check #(or (= (first %1) (first item))
                       (= (second %1) (first item))
                       (= (first %1) (second item))
                       (= (second %1) (second item)))
            newGraph (filter check graph)]
        (if (empty? newGraph) false
          (reduce #(or %1 %2) (map (fn [it] 
                           (graph-con it (filter #(not= it %1) graph))) 
                         newGraph)))))))

(fn  [c]
  (let [[f & r] (seq c)
        h (fn [x] (apply concat x))]
    (= (set (h c))
     (reduce (fn [a x]
               (into a (h (filter #(some a %) c))))
             (set f) r))))

(fn[g]
  (let [distinct-flatten #(set (distinct (flatten (seq %))))
        union-intersecting #(if (and (not (empty? (clojure.set/intersection % %2)))) (clojure.set/union % %2) %)
        [x & xs] (map distinct-flatten (map #(filter (partial some #{%}) g) (distinct-flatten g)))]
    (= (distinct-flatten g) 
       (reduce union-intersecting x xs))))

(fn [edges]
  (let 
    [nodes (fn nodes [edges] (set (flatten (into '() edges))))
     init-graph (fn init-graph [nodes] (zipmap nodes (repeat #{})))
     fill-graph-with-edge (fn fill-graph-with-edge [graph edge] 
                            (let [add-edge (fn [g n1 n2] (assoc g n1 (conj (get g n1) n2)))]
                              (add-edge (add-edge graph (first edge) (second edge)) (second edge) (first edge))))
     fill-graph (fn fill-graph [graph edges] (reduce fill-graph-with-edge graph edges))
     visit-nodes (fn visit-nodes [snode graph visited]
                   (let [nbs (get graph snode) 
                         nbs-to-visit (apply disj nbs visited)
                         to-visit (apply conj visited (conj nbs snode))]
                     (if (empty? nbs-to-visit) 
                       to-visit
                       (map (fn [nb] (visit-nodes nb graph to-visit)) nbs-to-visit))))

     connected? (fn connected? [edges] 
                  (let [nodes (nodes edges)
                        graph (fill-graph (init-graph nodes) edges)
                        visited (set (flatten (visit-nodes (first nodes) graph '())))]
                    (= (count nodes) (count visited))))]
    (connected? edges)))

(fn graph-connect1?
  [coll]
  (letfn [(create-map
            [coll]
            (reduce (fn [m [k v]] (update-in (update-in m [k] conj v) [v] conj k)) {} coll))]
    (let [g (create-map coll)
          start (first (first g))]
      (= (set (keys g))
         (loop [[x & more :as se] (g start) v #{start}]
           (if (nil? se)
             v
             (if (contains? v x)
               (recur more v)
               (recur (concat more (g x))
                      (conj v x)))))))))

(fn [coll]
  (let [sets (map set coll)]
    ((fn connectable? [h r]
       (if (empty? r)
         true
         (let [check (fn [s] (< (count (into h s)) (+ (count h) (count s))))
               connectable (filter check r)
               unconnectable (remove check r)
               ]
           (if (empty? connectable)
             false
             (connectable? (reduce into h connectable) unconnectable)))))
     (first sets) (rest sets))))

(fn t [s]

(fn pb-91 [edges]
  (= 1 (count (reduce (fn [components [v1 v2]]
                        (let [c1 (some #(when (contains? % v1) %) components)
                              c2 (some #(when (contains? % v2) %) components)]
                          (cond
                            (and c1 c2)
                            (->> components
                                 (remove #(or (= % c1) (= % c2)))
                                 (cons (into c1 c2)))
                            c1
                            (->> components
                                 (remove #(= % c1))
                                 (cons (conj c1 v2)))
                            c2
                            (->> components
                                 (remove #(= % c2))
                                 (cons (conj c2 v1)))
                            :else (cons (set [v1 v2]) components))))
                      ()
                      edges))))

            (let [nodes (set edge)

                  {to-join false, to-leave true} (group-by no-link? graphs)]
              (if (seq to-join)
                (cons (apply clojure.set/union nodes to-join) to-leave)
                (cons nodes to-leave))))]

    (letfn [(transitive [node]

(fn [pairs]
    (let [
          allnodes (fn [vs]
            (clojure.set/union (set (map first vs)) (set (map second vs))))

          connect (fn [vs visited]
            (loop [vs vs, visited visited]
                (if (empty? vs) visited
                    (let [[a b] (first vs)]
                        (if (or (contains? visited a)
                                (contains? visited b))
                            (recur (rest vs) (conj (conj visited a) b))
                            (recur (rest vs) visited))))))

          reconnect (fn [vs visited]
            (let [next (connect vs visited)]
                  (if (= visited next)
                    (do (println "done +> " next) next)
                    (recur vs next))))

         ]
        (= (allnodes pairs) (reconnect pairs #{(first (first pairs))}))

(fn [graph]
    (let [graph (->> graph (map set) set)
          adjoining? (fn [e1 e2]
                       (not (empty? (clojure.set/intersection e1 e2))))
          adjoining-at-least-one? (fn [edge-collection edge]
                                    (boolean
                                     (some #(adjoining? edge %) edge-collection)))
          boolean->keyword {true :adjoining false :not-adjoining}
          group-by-adjoining (fn [edges candidate-edges]
                               (group-by
                                (fn [candidate-edge]
                                  (boolean->keyword
                                   (adjoining-at-least-one? edges candidate-edge)))
                                candidate-edges))
          first-edge (first graph)]
      (loop [visiting-edges #{first-edge}
             remaining-edges (disj graph first-edge)]
        (cond (empty? remaining-edges) true
              (empty? visiting-edges) false
              :else (let [grouped-edges (group-by-adjoining visiting-edges remaining-edges)]
                      (recur (:adjoining grouped-edges)
                             (:not-adjoining grouped-edges)))))))

(fn single-connect? [graph]
   (let [nnode (count (distinct (flatten (seq graph))))
         full-pocket? (fn [pocket] (= (count pocket) nnode))
         gen-pocket (fn gen-pocket [graph pocket current]
                      (let [next-node? (fn [[a b] current]
                                         (cond
                                           (= a current) b
                                           (= b current) a))
                            next-nodes (filter identity (map #(next-node? % current) graph))
                            next-nodes-filtered (filter (complement #(some #{%} pocket)) next-nodes)]

                        (if (empty? next-nodes-filtered)
                          [current]
                          (let [chains (map (fn [x] (gen-pocket graph (conj pocket current) x))
                                            next-nodes-filtered)]
                            (distinct (conj (flatten chains) current))))))
         pocket (gen-pocket graph [] (ffirst graph))]
     (full-pocket? pocket)))

(fn [G]
  (let [st (fn [a G]
             (filter (fn [[x y]] (or (= x a) (= y a))) G))
        c? (fn c? [a b G]
             (let [N (st a G)
                   D (clojure.set/difference G N)]
               (when G
                 (if (some (fn [[x y]] (or (= x b) (= y b))) N)
                   true
                   (some identity (for [[x y] N :let [y (if (= x a) y x)]]
                                    (c? y b D)))))))
        nodes (into #{} (flatten (seq G)))]
    (empty? (filter nil? (for [x nodes y (clojure.set/difference nodes #{x})]
                           (c? x y G))))))

(fn [edges]
  (let [
      union (fn [a b] (reduce conj a b))
      points (set (apply concat edges))
      connections (->> edges
        (map (fn [[a b]] [[a b] [b a]]))
        (apply concat)
        (group-by #(first %))
        (map (fn [[k v]] [k (map last v)]))
        (apply concat)
        (apply hash-map))]
    (loop [visiting [(first points)], visited #{}]
      (if (empty? visiting)
        (= visited points)
        (recur
          (filter #(not (visited %))
            (apply concat
              (map #(connections %) visiting)))
          (union visited visiting))))))

(fn gc [s]
  (let [source (map set s)
        expand (fn [s x]
            (let [r (map #(if (empty? (clojure.set/intersection % x))
                            % (clojure.set/union % x))
                         s)]
              (set (if (= s r) (cons x s) r))))]
    (= 1 (count (loop [s source r (set s)]                  
                  (if (= s r) r (recur r (reduce expand s s))))))))

                  adlist-default
                  (concat edges (reduce #(into %1 [[(second %2)(first %2)]]) [] edges)))) ;;undirected, so include reverse also
        adjlist (create-adjlist ;; make default map for adjlist with each vertex and an empty vector for neighbors
                 (into {}  (map vec (partition 2 (interpose [] (flatten edges))))))]
    (letfn [(connected? [] ;; simple BFS
              (loop [visited [] q [(ffirst adjlist)]]
                (if (= 0 (count q)) (if (= (count (set visited)) (count adjlist)) true false)
                    (recur (into visited [(first q)])
                           (if (= -1 (.indexOf visited (first q)))
                             (reduce #(conj %1 %2) (next q)
                                     (adjlist (first q)))
                             (next q))))))]
      (if (connected?) ;; if connected, any graph with max odd degree >2 cannot have a Eulerian path
        true false))))

; Breadth-first solution: simple but not terribly efficient
  (fn [coll]
    (let [nodes (set (flatten (seq coll)))

          (or (= visited nodes)
              (let [spanned-edges (filter #(not-empty (clojure.set/intersection % visited)) edges)
                    next-nodes (reduce clojure.set/union visited spanned-edges)]
                (if (> (count next-nodes) (count visited))
                  (recur next-nodes))))))))

(fn  [graph]
  (letfn [(get-nodes [graph]
                     (set (mapcat identity graph)))
          (get-edges [graph]
                     (set (map set (filter #(not (= (first %) (second %))) graph))))
          (get-neighboors [c n edges] 
                          (filter identity (map #(cond 
                                                   (= (first %) c) (if (contains? n (second %)) false (second %))
                                                   (= (second %) c) (if (contains? n (first %)) false (first %))
                                                   :else false) edges)))
          (dfs [nodes edges] 
               (loop [c (first nodes) s [c] n #{c} 
                      t (get-neighboors c n edges)]
                 (if (empty? s)
                   n
                   (recur 
                     (if (empty? t) (peek s) (first t)) 
                     (if (empty? t) (pop s) (conj s (first t))) 
                     (if (empty? t) n (conj n (first t)))
                     (if (empty? t) (get-neighboors (peek s) n edges) (get-neighboors (first t) n edges))))))
          (is-linked [nodes edges] (= nodes (dfs nodes edges)))
          ]
    (let [n (get-nodes graph) e (get-edges graph)
          
         ]
      (is-linked n e)
      )))

(fn problem91
  [s]
  (letfn [;; Is there a path from node a to node b
          ;; (path [1 2] [2 3]) -> true
          ;; (path [1 2] [3 2]) -> true
          (is-path [[a b] [c d]]
            (or (= b c)
                (= b d)
                (= a c)
                (= a d)))

          ;; Return [elem [xs without elm]]
          (remover [elm xs]
            [elm (filter #(not= elm %) xs)])
          
          ;; split all combinations
          ;; given [a b c d]
          ;; return
          ;; [a [b c d]] [b [a c d] [c [a b d]] [d [a b c]]
          (combo-splitter [xs]
            (map #(remover % xs) xs))

          (filter-next-paths
            [node xs]
            (filter (fn [[n r]] (or (nil? node) (is-path node n))) (combo-splitter xs)))

          ;; For a given set of nodes return true if they are connected
          (problem91Ex [path xs]
            (if (empty? xs)
              path
              ;; for each item in xs
              ;; if is-path (last path) (first xs)
              ;; call foo (add-path path node) (remove node xs)
              (let [node (last path)
                    paths (filter-next-paths node xs)]
                    (map (fn [[ a res ]] (problem91Ex (conj path a) res)) paths))))]
    (pos? (count (flatten (problem91Ex [] s))))))

(fn [E]
       (let [V (set (reduce (fn [vs [a b]]
                              (->> vs
                                   (cons a)
                                   (cons b)))
                            #{} E))]
         (letfn [(rec [n vis]
                      (reduce (fn [v [a b]]
                                (cond
                                 (= a n) (if (get v b) v (rec b v))
                                 (= b n) (if (get v a) v (rec a v))
                                 :else v))
                              (conj vis n) E))]
           (= (count V) (count (rec (first V) #{}))))))

(fn is-connected [connections]
  (let [ add-connection (fn  [current-sets connection] 
                          (let [get-existing-index (fn [current-sets node] (second (first (filter #(first %) (map-indexed (fn [index a] [(contains? a node) index]) current-sets) ))))
                                in-current-indexes (set (remove nil? (map #(get-existing-index current-sets %) connection)))
                                with-index (map-indexed #(vector %1 %2) current-sets)
                                g (group-by  #(contains? in-current-indexes (first %)) with-index)
                                these (apply concat (map second (g true)))
                                others (map second (g false))
                                new-set (conj others  (conj these (first connection) (second connection)))
                                ]    
                            (map set new-set)))]
    (= 1 (count (reduce #(add-connection %1 %2) [] connections)))))

(fn [g]
   (let [v (-> g first first)
         neighbour (fn [v g]
                     (let [[e & _] (filter (fn [e]
                                             (or (= (first e) v)
                                                 (= (second e) v))) g)]
                       (if (= (first e) v) [(second e) e] [(first e) e])))
         rem-first (fn [v coll]
                     (let [[h r] (split-with (partial not= v) coll)]
                       (concat h (rest r))))
         vs (set (mapcat identity g))]
     (loop [s '()
            v v
            c '()
            g g]
       (if (and (nil? (first (neighbour v g))) (empty? s))
         (= (set (cons v c)) vs)
         (let [[n e] (neighbour v g)]
           (if n
             (recur (cons v s) n c (rem-first e g))
             (recur (rest s) (first s) (cons v c) g)))))))

(fn connected? [es]
  (let [vs (reduce (fn [m ls] (reduce #(assoc %1 %2 :unvisited) m ls))
                   '{}
                   es)
        vls (keys vs)]
    (letfn [(adjacent [v1 m]
                      (fn [q [a b]]
                        (cond
                         (and (= v1 a) (= (get m b) :unvisited)) (conj q b)
                         (and (= v1 b) (= (get m a) :unvisited)) (conj q a)
                         :else q)))
            (deq [vs q]
                 (if (empty? q)
                   vs
                   (let [v1 (peek q)]
                     (recur (assoc vs v1 :visited)
                            (reduce (adjacent v1 vs) (pop q) (into '() es))))))]
      (loop [vs vs
             v1 (first vls)
             vls (rest vls)
             components 0]
        (cond
         (nil? v1 ) (= components 1)
         (= (get vs v1) :visited) (recur vs (first vls) (rest vls) components)
         :else (recur
                (deq vs (conj clojure.lang.PersistentQueue/EMPTY v1))
                (first vls)
                (rest vls)
                (inc components)))))))

(fn conn
  ([g] (let [nodes (set (flatten (into '() g)))
      		visited (zipmap nodes (repeat false))]
  		(every? #(conn g visited %) nodes)))
  ([g visited n]
   		(let [edges (filter #(apply some (partial = n) %&) g)
              neighbors (remove #{n} (flatten (into '() edges)))
              visited (merge (assoc visited n true) (zipmap neighbors (repeat true)))]
          (cond (every? true? (vals visited)) true
                (empty? edges) false
                :else (some #(conn (remove #{%} g) 
                            	   visited 
                                   (first (filter (partial not= n) %))) 
                            edges)))))

                    (if (or (in a) (in b))

                      [in (conj out e)]))
                  [ccom []]

      (cond
        (empty? edges)     true
        (= ccom new-ccom)  false
        :else              (recur new-ccom new-edges)))))

;simple depth first search path length compared to length

(fn gc[g]  
  (let [init (first g)
        visited (atom #{init})
        neighbors (fn [node]
                    (let [rg  (into #{} (remove #{node} g))
                          rg2 (clojure.set/difference rg @visited)
                          x (first node)
                          y (second node)]
                      (filter #(or (= x (first %))
                                   (= x (second %))
                                   (= y (first %))
                                   (= y (second %)))
                        rg2)))
        mybranch? (comp not empty? neighbors)
        mychildren (fn[node] (let[c (neighbors node)] (swap! visited into c) c))
        path (tree-seq mybranch? mychildren init)]
    (= (count path) (count g))))

(fn __ [x] 
    (let [my-assoc (fn [acc [k v :as element]]
                     (let [old (acc k)
                           nu (if old (conj old v) #{v})] 
                       (assoc acc k nu)))
          read-in (fn [xs]
                    (reduce (fn [acc element]
                              (my-assoc
                                (my-assoc acc element)
                                (reverse element)))
                            {} xs))
          gcons (fn gcons
                  ([xs x] (gcons xs x #{})) 
                  ([xs x seen]
                   (if (seen x)
                     seen
                     (reduce into #{}  
                             (for [other (xs x)]
                               (gcons xs other (conj seen x)))))))
          graph (read-in x)
          conns (gcons graph (first (first graph)))]
      (= (count (keys graph)) (count conns))))

    (let [every-n-g (every-n graph)]
      (=  (walk #{} #{(first every-n-g)}) every-n-g))))

(fn p-90-connected?
  ([g] (p-90-connected? (vec (rest g)) (set  (first g))))
  ([g seen-vertices-set]
   (println "== Got G: " g)
   (println "== Got seen vertices: " seen-vertices-set)
   (let [rotate-vec (fn [v] (conj (vec (rest v)) (first v)))
         connected-edge? (fn [[v1 v2]] (or (seen-vertices-set v1) (seen-vertices-set v2)))
         next-edge (first g)]
     (cond (empty? g) true ; no more to include
           (not (some connected-edge? g)) false ; other edges don't connect
           (connected-edge? next-edge)
           (p-90-connected? (rest g)
                            (conj seen-vertices-set
                                  (first next-edge)
                                  (second next-edge)))
           :else (p-90-connected? (rotate-vec g) seen-vertices-set)))))

(fn [v]
  (letfn ((rep [v n a]
               (vec `(~@(take n v) ~a ~@(drop (+ n 1) v))))
          (mul [m1 m2]
               (vec (map (fn [i]
                           (vec (map (fn [j]
                                       (reduce (fn [r k]
                                                 (if (> (+ r (* (nth (nth m1 i) k)
                                                                (nth (nth m2 k) j)))
                                                        0)
                                                   1
                                                   0))
                                               0
                                               (range (count m1))))
                                     (range (count m1)))))
                         (range (count m1))))))
         (let [n (apply list (reduce (fn [r v]
                                 (conj r (v 0) (v 1)))
                               #{}
                               v))
               p (reduce (fn [r i]
                           (conj r [(nth n i) i]))
                         {}
                         (range (count n)))
               v (reduce (fn [r v]
                           (conj r v))
                         v
                         (map (fn [v] [(v 1) (v 0)]) v))
               m (loop [v v
                        m (vec (map (fn [i] (vec (map (fn [j]
                                                        (if (= i j)
                                                          1
                                                          0)) (range (count n))))) (range (count n))))]
                   (if (empty? v)
                     m
                     (let [i (p ((first v) 1))
                           j (p ((first v) 0))]
                       (recur (rest v) (rep m i (rep (m i) j 1))))))]
           (loop [m1 m]
             (let [m2 (mul m1 m)]
               (if (= m1 m2)
                 (every? (fn [r]
                           (every? #(= % 1) r))
                         m2)
                 (recur m2)))))))

(fn cn
  ([edges] (cn #{} edges))
  ([components edges]
   (let [combine (fn [[v1 v2] components]
                   (let [c1 (or (first (filter #(% v1) components))
                                #{v1})
                         c2 (or (first (filter #(% v2) components))
                                #{v2})
                         union (comp set (partial remove nil?) concat)]
                     (->> components
                          (remove #(= c1 %))
                          (remove #(= c2 %))
                          (union #{(union c1 c2)}))))]
     (if (empty? edges)
       (= 1 (count components))
       (cn (combine (first edges) components)
           (rest edges))))))

(fn connected? [G]
  (letfn [(adj-list2 [R] ;;given relations construct adj-list
            (let [R2 (concat R (mapv (fn [[a b]] [b a]) R))]
              (reduce #(if (contains? %1 (first %2))
                         (assoc %1 (first %2) (conj (%1 (first %2)) (last %2)))
                         (assoc %1 (first %2) [(last %2)] )) {}  R2)))

          (df-search3 [G v R];;df-search on inicial vertex r. R is a set that contains all vertex that r can reach and v is a reacheable vertex
            (let [neib (G v)]
              (reduce #(if (contains? %1 %2)
                         %1
                         (clojure.set/union %1 (df-search3 G %2 (conj %1 %2)))) R (G v))))
          ]
    (let [adj (adj-list2 G)
          ks (set (keys adj))
          reach (df-search3 adj (first ks) #{})]
      (= ks reach))))

       (if (partitioned false)
         (graph-connectivity (clojure.set/union in-set (set (flatten (partitioned false))))
                           (partitioned true))

                      node)) nodes))

             (map (fn [node]
                    {node (adjoining-vector node nodes sets)}) nodes)))
          (exist-chain? [init graph visited-set]
            (if (= (set (keys graph)) visited-set)
              true

                                (not (visited-set %)))
                       (exist-chain? %
                                     graph
                                     (clojure.set/union #{%} visited-set)))

        (throw (AssertionError. "Component not found!"))
        (let [[comp_id nodes] (first comps)]
          (if (contains? nodes vertex)
            comp_id
            (recur (rest comps)))))))
          vertex_set (compute_vertex_set edge_set)
          initial_components (into {} (map (fn [x] [x #{x}]) vertex_set))]

            (recur (rest edges) components_union_xy))))))

                                   (= (second p) (first c-p))

;; Maintain a set of node sets, where each node set is the set of
;; nodes in one connected component of the graph.

;; containing node 1 (if any), and the set t containing node 2 (if

                        (let [s (or (first (filter #(% u) c)) #{u})

         (and l (set (apply concat (map #(remove g %) l))))))
     (c? [nc nr g]

       (or (empty? nr)

             (and (not (empty? more-nodes))
                  (let [nc-new (reduce conj nc more-nodes)]

                     (clojure.set/difference g (internal-links nc-new g))))))))]
  #(connected? %))

                      connect (fn [vs [e1 e2]]
                                (let [es (filter #(or (% e1) (% e2)) vs)]
                                  (cond (= 1 (count es)) vs
                                    :else (conj (apply disj vs es) 
                                                (into (first es) (second es))))))]
                  (= 1 (count (reduce connect vs g)))))

          (mer [fa [u v]]
            (assoc fa (rep fa u) (rep fa v)))]
    (let [fa (reduce mer {} es)]
      (apply = (map (partial rep fa)
                    (keys fa))))))

(fn [edges]

                     (mapcat (fn [[a b]]
                               [{a #{b}}

        reachable (nth (iterate (fn [reach]
                                  (into {}
                                        (map (fn [[k v]]
                                               [k (into v (mapcat #(get reach % #{}) v))])
                                             reach)))
                                (into paths (map (fn [[k v]] [k (conj v k)]) paths)))
                       (count edges))]
    (= (first (vals reachable)) (set (keys reachable)))))

(fn gti [go]
  (letfn 
    [(orf [& b]
          (cond 
            (empty? b) false
            (= 1 (count b)) (first b)
            :else (cond (first b) true
                         :else (apply orf (rest b)))))
     (gt [g & [e]]
      (cond 
        (empty? g) true
        :else (apply 
                orf
                (for [i (range (count g))
                      :let[ei (g i)
                           ie (vec (reverse ei))
                           rg (vec 
                                (concat
                                  (subvec g 0 i )
                                  (subvec g (inc i))))
                           ee (cond
                                (nil? e) ei
                                (= (e 1)(ei 0)) ei
                                (= (e 1)(ei 1)) ei
                                (= (e 0)(ei 0)) ei
                                (= (e 0)(ei 1)) ei)]
                      :when (not (nil? ee))]
                  (gt rg ee)))))]
     (gt (vec go))))

(fn [edges]
  (let [vs (reduce #(apply conj %1 %2) #{} edges)
        graph (reduce (fn [init-map v]
                        (assoc init-map
                               v
                               (reduce (fn [val-map [a b]]
                                         (cond
                                           (= a v) (conj val-map b)
                                           (= b v) (conj val-map a)
                                           :else val-map))
                                       [] edges))) {} vs)
        dfs-gragh (fn dfs-gragh [node visited]
                    (reduce (fn [init-visited x]
                              (apply conj init-visited (dfs-gragh x init-visited)))
                            (conj visited node)
                            (filter #(every? (fn [visited-node]
                                               (not= visited-node %)) visited)
                                    (get graph node))))]
    (if (= vs (dfs-gragh (first vs) #{}))
      true
      false)))

(letfn 
  [; Nodes within nn that can be reached in one step from n
   (reachable-nodes [e n nn]
     (set (filter 
           (fn [x] (or (contains? e [n x]) (contains? e [x n]))) 
           nn)))

   ; Nodes within nn that cannot be visited starting from n
   (non-visited-nodes [e n nn]
     (if (empty? nn) #{}
       (let [next-n (reachable-nodes e n nn)]
         (if (empty? next-n) nn
           ;[n next-n nn]))))
           (apply clojure.set/intersection
                  (map (fn [x] (set (non-visited-nodes e x (remove #(= x %) nn)))) next-n))))))]

  (fn [e]
    (let [nn (set (apply concat e))]
      (empty? (non-visited-nodes e (first nn) (rest nn))))))

              (reduce (fn [m e] (assoc m e group)) connections group)))]
    (let [connections (reduce (fn [m pair] (connect m pair)) {} graph)
          nodes (set (keys connections))]
      (every? #(= nodes (connections %)) nodes))))

  (letfn [(union [sets uset vset]
            (conj (disj sets uset vset) (clojure.set/union uset vset)))
          (find-set [s v]
            (first (clojure.set/select #(contains? % v) s)))]
    (let [sets (reduce (fn [acc [x y]] (conj acc #{x} #{y})) #{} g)]
      (= 1 (count
        (loop [e g acc sets]
          (if (empty? e) acc

(fn [e]
(letfn [
(v [e] (set (mapcat (fn [[a b]][a b]) e)))
(id [e] (set (for [n (v e)] [n n])))
(re [e] (set (for [[a b] e] [b a])))
(q [e] (letfn [(f [x] (for [[a b] x [c d] x :when (= b c)] [a d]))] (let [e2 (set (f e))] (if (clojure.set/subset? e2 e) e (q (clojure.set/union e e2))))))
(pi [e] (clojure.set/union e (id e) (re e)))]
(let [n (count (v e)) t (count (q (pi e)))] (= (* n n) t))))

(fn [ns]
  (let [g (reduce (fn [m [n1 n2]]
                    (-> m
                        (update-in [n1] #(if % (conj % n2) #{n2}))
                        (update-in [n2] #(if % (conj % n1) #{n1}))))
                  {}
                  ns)
        nodes (set (keys g))
        start (first nodes)]
    (letfn [(walk [n seen]
              (let [nns (clojure.set/difference (g n) seen)]
                (cond (= seen nodes) true
                      (empty? nns) false
                      :else (reduce #(or %1 (walk %2 (conj seen %2))) false nns))))]
      (walk start #{start}))))

                  (if (= x y)
                    ys

        tour-from? (fn tour-from? [from graph]
                     (or (empty? graph)
                         (some (fn [edge]
                                 (tour-from? (first edge)
                                             (remove1 edge graph)))
                               (filter #(= from (second %)) graph))
                         (some (fn [edge]

                                             (remove1 edge graph)))
                               (filter #(= from (first %)) graph))))]
    (true? (some (fn [edge]
                   (or (tour-from? (first edge)

(fn [edges]
  (let [both-directions (fn [edges]
                          (into edges (map reverse edges)))
        neighbours (fn [edges]
                     (into {} (map (fn [[k v]] [k (map second v)]) (group-by first (both-directions edges)))))

        complete-helper (fn [nedges visited]
                          (let [neigbours-to-visited (set (mapcat second (select-keys nedges visited)))]
                            (if (or (empty? nedges) (empty? neigbours-to-visited))
                              visited
                              (recur (apply dissoc nedges visited)
                                     (apply conj visited neigbours-to-visited)))))
        nedges (neighbours edges)]
    (let [[node _] (first nedges)]
      (= (set (keys nedges))
         (complete-helper nedges #{node})))))

(fn all-connect? [edges]
  (letfn [(get-nodes [edges] (set (flatten (vec edges))))
          (get-edges-from-node [node edges] (set (concat (filter #(= (first %) node) edges) (filter #(= (second %) node) edges))))
          (get-edges-from-nodes [nodes edges] (set (mapcat #(get-edges-from-node % edges) nodes)))
          (connected-nodes [edges]
                           (loop [toured-nodes #{(first (get-nodes edges))}
                                  rest-edges (set edges)]
                             (let [expand-edges (get-edges-from-nodes toured-nodes rest-edges)
                                   expand-nodes (get-nodes expand-edges)]
                               (cond
                                 (empty? expand-edges) toured-nodes
                                 :else (recur (clojure.set/union toured-nodes expand-nodes) (clojure.set/difference rest-edges expand-edges))))))]

    (= (connected-nodes edges) (get-nodes edges))))

(let [neighbors (fn [vertex edges]
                    (->> edges
                         (filter #(some #{vertex} %))
                         flatten))
        unvisited (fn [vertex edges seen]
                    (->> (neighbors vertex edges)
                         (remove seen)))
        remove-edge (fn [x y edges]
                      (remove
                       (fn [[a b]]
                         (or (and (= x a) (= y b))
                             (and (= x b) (= y a))))
                       edges))
        dfs-nodes
        (fn dfs-nodes [edges seen vertex]
          (let [seen (conj seen vertex)
                unvisited (unvisited vertex edges seen)]
            (if (empty? unvisited)
              seen
              (reduce #(into %1
                             (dfs-nodes (remove-edge vertex %2 edges)
                                        seen %2))
                      seen
                      unvisited))))]
    (fn [relations]
      (let [vertices (into #{} (flatten (into [] relations)))
            reachable (dfs-nodes relations #{}
                                 ;; arbitrary start node
                                 (first (first relations)))]
        (= vertices reachable))))

(fn is-connected [graph]
  ((fn f [untested remains]
     (cond
       (empty? remains) true
       (empty? untested) false
       true
       (let [[t0 t1] (first untested)
             matching (set (filter #(let [[u0 u1] %]
                                      (or (= t0 u0)
                                          (= t0 u1)
                                          (= t1 u0)
                                          (= t1 u1)))
                                   remains))
             remains (clojure.set/difference remains matching)]
         (recur (clojure.set/union (set (rest untested)) matching) remains))))
     #{(first graph)} (set (rest graph))))

         adjacencies (into {} (for [[k v] (group-by first bidirectional)] [k (map second v)]))]
     (letfn [(traverse [visited]
               (if (= (count adjacencies) (count visited)) true
                   (let [adjacent (into #{} (adjacencies (last visited)))
                         visited-set (into #{} visited)
                         to-traverse (clojure.set/difference adjacent visited-set)]
                     (or (some true? (map #(traverse (conj visited %)) to-traverse)) false))))]
       (or (some true? (map #(traverse (vector %)) (keys adjacencies))) false)))
     
   
   )

(fn [edges]
  (let [
      reduce-reachable (fn [[reachable unreached]]
        (reduce (fn [[rs us] [x y :as edge]]
                  (prn edge " " rs)
                  (if (or
                        (contains? rs x)
                        (contains? rs y)
                        (empty? rs)
                      )
                    [(into rs edge) us]
                    [rs (conj us edge)]
                  )
        ) [reachable #{}] unreached))
      iterations (iterate reduce-reachable [#{} edges])
      final-iteration (second (last (take-while (partial apply not=) (map vector iterations (rest iterations)))))
      joined? (->> final-iteration (second) (empty?))
    ]
    joined?
  )
)

(fn t [edges]
  (if (= 1 (count edges))
    true
    (let [f (fn f [edges remained-edge connecteds]
              (let [find-edge (fn [node]
                                (filter #(= node (first %)) remained-edge))
                    founded-edge (partition 2 (flatten (map #(find-edge %) connecteds)))
                    founded-node (mapcat #(vector (second %)) founded-edge)]
                (if (empty? founded-edge)
                  connecteds
                  (f edges (first (map #(disj remained-edge %) founded-edge))
                     (into connecteds   founded-node)))))

      (if (results nodes) true false))))

(fn [g]
  (let [v (set (mapcat identity g))
        contains-some? (fn [coll pair] (some (partial contains? coll) pair))
        contains-every? (fn [coll pair] (every? (partial contains? coll) pair))]
    (loop [vs (into #{} (first g))
           e (rest g)
           x 0]
      (if (or (empty? e) (== x (count v)))
        (= v vs)
        (recur
         (reduce
          #(if (contains-some? %1 %2)
             (into %1 %2)
             %1)
          vs e) ; New vs
         (remove (partial contains-every? vs) e) ; New e
         (inc x))))))

(fn __ [s]
  (let [nodes (fn [s]
                ;; all the a's and b's of a set of [a b] tuples
                (into #{} (concat (map first s) (map second s))))
        sorted-uniq (fn [s]
                (into #{} (filter (fn [[a b]] ((complement =) a b)) (map sort s))))
        num-possible-links (fn [n]
                             ;; n * (n - 1) / 2
                             (if (= n 1)
                               0
                               (/ (* n (dec n)) 2)))
        positions (fn [pred coll]
                    (keep-indexed (fn [idx x]
                                    (when (pred x)
                                    idx))
                                  coll))
        rev (fn [[a b]]
              [b a])
        add-revs (fn [s]
                   ;; s is a set of [a b] tuples; add all the [b a] tups
                   (clojure.set/union s (into #{} (map rev s))))
        bfs (fn [s [a b]]
              ;; s is a graph as a set of [a b] tuples; find all the neighbors of [a b]
              (let [firsts (map first s)
                    seconds (map second s)
                    idxs (positions (partial = b) firsts)]
                (if (seq idxs)
                  (map #(vector % (nth seconds %2)) (repeat a) idxs)
                  nil)))
        tr-cl (fn tr-cl [s]
                ;; bfs on each node recursively to find all reachable nodes
                (let [nexts (into #{} (filter (complement nil?) (apply concat (map (partial bfs s) s))))
                      s-plus (clojure.set/union s nexts)]
                  (if (= s s-plus)
                    s
                    (tr-cl s-plus))))
        t (sorted-uniq (tr-cl (add-revs s)))
        measured (count t)
        desired (num-possible-links (count (nodes s)))]
    (= measured desired)))

          (let [c (remove #{s} (mapcat #(if (some #{s} %) % []) g))
                t (mapcat #(y % g (concat z c)) (remove (set z) c))]
            (set (concat c t [s]))))
      e (-> g (seq)(flatten)(set))
      ]
  (= e (y (first e) g []))
  ))

(fn connected-graph? [edges]
  (letfn [(nodes-from-edges [e]
            (into #{} (flatten (reduce conj [] e))))]
    (let [nodes (nodes-from-edges edges)
          node->edge (into {}
                           (map (fn [node]
                                  [node (filter #(some (partial = node) %) edges)])
                                nodes))]
      ;; Breadth-first-search from the first node, until we can search no more
      (loop [visits #{(first nodes)}]
        (do (println "We got: " visits))
        (let [new-visits (into #{} (flatten (map node->edge visits)))]
          (if (= visits new-visits)
            (= visits nodes)
            (recur new-visits)))))))

(fn check-connectivity [edges]
  (let [create-initial-disj-set (fn [edges]
                                  (reduce
                                    #(assoc %1 %2 #{%2})
                                    {}
                                    (into #{} (concat
                                                (map first edges)
                                                (map second edges)))))
        union-sets (fn [set-1 set-2 disj-set]
                     (let [union-set (clojure.set/union
                                       (disj-set set-1)
                                       (disj-set set-2))]
                       (-> disj-set
                           (assoc set-1 union-set)
                           (assoc set-2 union-set))))
        init-disj-set (create-initial-disj-set edges)
        num-nodes (count init-disj-set)
        final-disj-set (reduce
                         #(->> %1
                               (union-sets (first %2) (second %2))
                               (union-sets (second %2) (first %2)))
                         init-disj-set
                         (concat edges edges))]
    (if (some
          #(= (count %) num-nodes)
          (vals final-disj-set)) true false)))

(fn
  [g]
  (letfn [(family-tree
            [n]
            (let [a-nods (atom g)
                  minus (fn 
                    [s n]
                    (clojure.set/difference s #{(if (seq? n) (reverse n) n)}))
                  links (fn
                    [[_ s1]]
                    (fn
                      [[f2 s2 :as n2]]
                      (if (= s1 f2) n2 (when (= s1 s2) (reverse n2)))))
                  brc? (fn 
                    [n]
                    (swap! a-nods minus n)
                    (some (links n) @a-nods))
                  chd (fn
                    [n]
                    (keep (links n) @a-nods))]
              (dorun (tree-seq brc? chd n))
              (if-let [nods (not-empty @a-nods)] 
                (do 
                  (reset! a-nods g) 
                  (dorun (tree-seq brc? chd (reverse n))) 
                  (empty? (clojure.set/intersection @a-nods nods))) 
                true)))]
    (every? family-tree g)))

(fn p[g]
  (let [g (apply merge-with (cons concat (map #(hash-map (first %) (vector (second %) )) (set (concat g (reverse g)))))) l (count g)]
    (loop [g g [k & ks ] (list (first (seq (keys g)))) path []]
      (println g ks path)
      (if-let [kn (get g k)]
        (recur (dissoc g k) (concat ks kn) (cons k path))
        (if ks
          (recur g ks path)
          (= (count path) l))))))

(fn tg [s]
  (letfn [(nodes [s]
                 (loop [s s,
                        result #{}]
                   (if (empty? s)
                     result
                     (clojure.set/union (set (first s))
                                        (nodes (rest s))))))
          (onecycle [s] 
                    (loop [s (sort s),
                           n1 (first (first s)),
                           n2 (second (first s)),
                           result #{}]
                      (if (empty? s)
                        result
                        (if (or (contains? result n1)
                                (contains? result n2))
                          (recur (rest s) (first (first (rest s))) (second (first (rest s))) (conj result n1 n2))
                          (recur (rest s) (first (first (rest s))) (second (first (rest s))) (conj #{} n1 n2) )))))]
    (= (onecycle s) (nodes s))))

(fn graph-connectivity [coll]

            (let [nvs (filter #(contains? % fv) m)]
              (cond

               (empty? nvs) false
               (some true? (map #(contains? % tv) nvs)) true
               :else (some true? (map #(exist-path? (disj m %) (first (disj % fv)) tv) nvs)))))]
    (let [cons (set (map set coll))
          vs (set (flatten (apply vector coll)))]
      (every? true? (for [x vs y vs] (exist-path? cons x y))))))

#(let [vertex (set (apply concat %))]
    (loop [visited (set (first %))
           {left false connected true} (group-by
                                        (fn [[a b]]

                                        (rest %))]
      (cond

(fn [g]
  (let [visited (atom #{})
        nodes (set (apply concat g))
        len (count nodes)
        f (fn ! [elem edges]
            (swap! visited conj elem)
            (let [have-elem (filter #(or (= elem (first %)) (= elem (second %))) edges)
                  related (set (map #(if (= elem (first %)) (second %) (first %)) have-elem))
                  to-process (clojure.set/difference related @visited)
                  ]
              (if (seq to-process)
                (if (seq to-process)
                  (some true? (map #(! % edges) to-process))
                  true)
                false)))
        ]
    (f (ffirst g) g)
    (= (count @visited) len)))

(fn [edges]
  (letfn
   [(neighbors [v edges]
      (keep (fn [[v1 v2]]
                (cond (= v v1) v2
                      (= v v2) v1))
            edges))
    (dfs-graph [vertices edges start]
      (loop [visited []
             seen #{start}
             active [start]]
        (if (empty? active)
          visited
          (let [v (peek active)
                nbs (neighbors
                      v edges)
                unseen (remove
                         seen nbs)]
            (recur (conj visited v)
                   (into seen nbs)
                   (into (pop active)
                         unseen))))))
    (connected? [edges]
      (let [vertices
             (->> edges
                  (apply concat)
                  distinct)]
        (= (count vertices)
           (count
             (dfs-graph
               vertices
               edges
               (first vertices))))))]
    (connected? edges)))

(fn connected?
  ([edges]
   (connected? (disj edges (first edges)) #{(first edges)}))

  ([tobeconnected-edges connected-edges]
   (let [connected-nodes (reduce into #{} connected-edges)
         edges-with-path (filter #(seq (filter connected-nodes %)) tobeconnected-edges)
         remaining-edges (reduce disj tobeconnected-edges edges-with-path)]
     (cond
       (empty? remaining-edges) true
       (empty? edges-with-path) false
       :else (connected? remaining-edges (into connected-edges edges-with-path))))))

(fn [edges]
  (let [nodes (->> edges
                   (map (fn [[a b]] (merge {a [b]} {b [a]})))
                   (apply merge-with concat))
        passed (atom #{})]
    (letfn [(go [node-id]
              (when-not (@passed node-id)
                (swap! passed conj node-id)
                (doseq [node-id' (nodes node-id)]
                  (go node-id'))))]
      (go (key (first nodes)))
      (= (count @passed)
         (count nodes)))))

(fn p91 [s]
  (let [elems (distinct (flatten (vec s)))
        size (count elems)
        tbl (make-array Boolean size size)]
    (dotimes [i size]
      (dotimes [j size]
        (when (= i j) (aset tbl i j true))
        (when (or (s [(nth elems i) (nth elems j)])
                  (s [(nth elems j) (nth elems i)]))
          (aset tbl i j true)
          (aset tbl j i true))))
    (dotimes [k size]
      (dotimes [i size]
        (dotimes [j size]
          (when (and (aget tbl i k) (aget tbl k j))
            (aset tbl i j true)
            (aset tbl j i true)))))
    (every? boolean
            (for [i (range size) j (range size)]
              (aget tbl i j)))))

(fn [graph]
 (letfn [(walk [node edge]
         (cond
          (= node (first edge)) (second edge)
          (= node (second edge)) (first edge)
          :else nil))]
   (let [nodes (set (flatten (vec graph)))]
    (loop [walked (for [n nodes e graph :when (not (nil? (walk n e)))] (conj #{} n (walk n e)))]
      (let [nextwalked (for [n nodes e graph w walked :when (and (w n) (not (w (walk n e))) (not (nil? (walk n e))))]
                         (conj w n (walk n e)))]
       (cond
        (some #(= nodes %) walked) true
        (empty? nextwalked) false
        :else (recur nextwalked)))))))

            (recur w (apply disj n d)))))))

(letfn [(collapse-components [comps [x1 x2]]
                             (let [comp1 (first (filter #(contains? % x1) comps))
                                   comp2 (first (filter #(contains? % x2) comps))
                                   newcomp (clojure.set/union comp1 comp2)]
                               (conj
                                (clojure.set/difference
                                 comps (into #{} [comp1 comp2]))
                                newcomp)))
  		(initial-components [graph]
        	(into #{} (map #(into #{} [%]) (into #{} (flatten (into [] graph))))))]
	(fn [graph]
      (= 1 (count (reduce collapse-components (initial-components graph) graph)))))

(fn
  [coll]
  (let [m (reduce (fn [m [s d]]
                    (let [ds (get m s #{})
                          ds' (conj ds d)
                          ss (get m d #{})
                          ss' (conj ss s)]
                      (assoc m s ds' d ss'))) {} coll)]
    (letfn [(bfs [q v m]
              (if (seq q)
                (let [h (first q)
                      t (rest q)]
                  (if (contains? v h)
                    (recur t v m)
                    (let [v' (conj v h)]
                      (if (contains? m h)
                        (recur (concat t (m h)) v' m)
                        (recur t v' m)))))
                v))]
      (= (count m) (count (bfs [(first (first coll))] #{} m))))))

(fn connected? [edges] 
    (letfn [(tuple-to-graph [tuples]
                (reduce #(assoc %1 (first %2) (conj (get %1 (first %2) []) (second %2)) (second %2) (conj (get %1 (second %2) []) (first %2))) {} tuples))
            (unreachable? 
                ([graph visited node-key]
                    (if (contains? visited node-key)
                        visited
                        (set (apply concat (map #(unreachable? graph (conj visited node-key) %) (get graph node-key))))))
                ([graph]

(fn ? [c]
  (let [[x & s] (map set c)
        p (group-by #(if (some x %) 1 0) s)

(fn connected-graph?  [coll] 
  (= 1 (count (reduce 
    (fn [pathset [x y]]
      (let [
        px (first (filter #(contains? % x) pathset))  ; existing path to x
        py (first (filter #(contains? % y) pathset))  ; existing path to y
        link (clojure.set/intersection px py) ; a potential link between the two paths
        path (first (remove empty? [px py])) ; the actual path
        others (disj pathset px py); other unrelated paths  
        vertex (set [x y])
      ]
      ;println "=== pathset:" pathset " | path:" path "| others=" others)
      ; (println "x=" x "px:" px "| y=" y "py:" py "| link=" link ) 
      (if (empty? link)
        ; most common case
        (if (empty? path)
          ; new path, conjoin it
          (conj pathset vertex)
          ; path exists, amend it
          (conj others (clojure.set/union path vertex)))
        (conj others (clojure.set/union px py)) ; link not empty, paths must union!
    )))
    #{} coll)
)))

                                           (cons s (flatten (vals (dissoc h nil)))))]
                      (cons connected not-connected)))]
    (loop [ g (map set graph)]
      (let [size (count g)
            ng (reduce join-sets
                       [(first g)] (rest g))]
        (if (or (nil? (next ng)) (= size (count ng)))
          ng
          (recur ng))))))))

(let [add (fn [forest n1 n2]
            (let [old1 (forest n1) old2 (forest n2) nil1 (= old1 nil) nil2 (= old2 nil)]
              (if (and nil1 nil2)
                (assoc forest n1 n1 n2 n1)
                (if (or nil1 nil2)
                  (if nil1 (assoc forest n1 old2 n2 old2) (assoc forest n1 old1 n2 old1))
                  (into {}
                        (map
                         (fn [item]
                           (let [k (first item) v (second item)]
                             [k (if (= v old2) old1 v)]))
                         forest))))))]
  (fn [graph] (let [forest (reduce (fn [forest edge] (add forest (first edge) (second edge))) {} graph)]
                (apply = (vals forest)))))

      (->> sets

        (drop-while #(> (count %) 1))
        (ffirst)
        (= (apply clojure.set/union sets)))))

(fn __ ([in] (let [[[a b] & xs] (seq in)] (__ (conj #{a} b) xs)))

           (group-by

           to-add-vertices

         (recur (clojure.set/union connected-vs to-add-vertices) no-add))))))

(fn graph-connectivity [graph]
  (let [iterate-until
        (fn [f init pred] (->> (iterate f init) (partition 2 1) (drop-while #(not (apply pred %))) first second)) 
        nodes (->> (seq graph) flatten set)
        adjacents (fn [node] (into #{} (for [[n m] graph :when (or (= n node) (= m node))] (if (= n node) m n))))
        step (fn [[visited last-visited]] 
               (let [new-visited (->> (map adjacents last-visited) (reduce clojure.set/union))]
                 [(clojure.set/union visited new-visited) new-visited]))
        stop (fn [[visited _] [next-visited _]] (= visited next-visited) )
        some-node (some nodes nodes)
        [accessible-from-node _] (iterate-until step [#{} #{some-node}] stop)]
    (= (count accessible-from-node) (count nodes))))

(fn [graph]
  ((complement empty?)
   (apply
    clojure.set/intersection
    (reduce (fn [sets edge]
              (let [seted (set edge)]
                (if (every? empty? (map #(clojure.set/intersection % seted) sets))
                  (conj sets seted)
                  (set (map (fn [temp-set]
                              (if (empty? (clojure.set/intersection temp-set seted))
                                temp-set
                                (clojure.set/union temp-set seted)))
                            sets)))))
            #{(set (first graph))}
            (rest graph)))))

(fn graph-connectivity
  [connections]
  (let [nodes (set (flatten (seq connections)))]
    (loop [edge [(first nodes)] unconnected (disj nodes edge)]
      (let [candidate (reduce into (map (fn [node] (reduce #(if (= node (first %2)) 
                                                                 (conj %1 (second %2)) 
                                                                 (if (= node (second %2)) 
                                                                   (conj %1 (first %2)) 
                                                                   %1)) 
                                                           #{}
                                                           connections)) edge))
            new-edge (clojure.set/intersection candidate unconnected)
            new-unconnected (reduce #(disj %1 %2) unconnected new-edge)]
        (if (empty? new-unconnected)
          true
          (if (empty? new-edge)
            false
            (recur new-edge new-unconnected)))))))

      (= 1 (count clusters))

            merged (apply clojure.set/union (conj (filter #(some connection %) clusters) connection))
            others (remove #(some connection %) clusters)]
        (recur (rest remaining)
               (conj others merged))))))

(fn [edges]
    (let [all-nodes (set (mapcat identity edges))
          neighbours (fn [node]
                        (letfn [(get-neighbour [edge]
                                  (cond
                                    (= node (first edge)) (second edge)
                                    (= node (second edge)) (first edge)
                                    :else nil))]
                       (filter identity (map get-neighbour edges))))
          step (fn [visited]
                 (set (concat visited (mapcat neighbours visited))))]
      (loop [visited (into #{} (first edges))]
        (let [stepped (step visited)] 
          (cond
            (= all-nodes stepped) true
            (= visited stepped) false
            :else (recur stepped))))))

(fn graph-con [raw-edges]
  (let [keys (into #{} (flatten (seq raw-edges)))
        paths (into {} (map (fn [[k v]] (vector k (disj (into #{} (flatten v)) k)))
                                         (group-by first (concat raw-edges (map reverse raw-edges)))))
        get-children (fn [[current unseen]] 
                       (map #(list % (clojure.set/difference unseen (paths current)))
                            (clojure.set/intersection (paths current) unseen)))
        branch? (fn [data] ((complement empty?) (get-children data)))
        start (first keys)]
    	(boolean (some #(empty? (last %))
        (tree-seq branch? get-children [start (disj keys start)])))
    ))

(letfn [
        (combinable-edges? [[v1 v2] [v3 v4]]
           (cond
             (= v1 v3) true
             (= v1 v4) true
             (= v2 v3) true
             (= v2 v4) true
             :else false))

        (combine-edges [[v1 v2] [v3 v4]]
            (cond
              (= v1 v3) [v2 v4]
              (= v1 v4) [v2 v3]
              (= v2 v3) [v1 v4]
              (= v2 v4) [v1 v3]
              :else (throw (ex-info "Tried to combine no combinable vertices" {}))))

         (walked-through-all-nodes? [visited edges]
           (empty? (clojure.set/difference (set (flatten (into [] edges))) visited)))]

  (fn walk-connected-graph [original-edges]
    (loop [working-edge (first original-edges)
           edges (rest original-edges)
           visited (set working-edge)
           not-combinable []]
      (cond
        (walked-through-all-nodes? visited original-edges) true
        (empty? edges) false
        (combinable-edges? working-edge (first edges))
          (recur
            (combine-edges working-edge (first edges))
            (concat not-combinable (rest edges))
            (apply conj visited (flatten (filter #(combinable-edges? working-edge %) edges)))
            [])
        :else (recur
                working-edge
                (rest edges)
                visited
                (conj not-combinable (first edges)))))))

            (or (= v x) (= v y) (= w x) (= w y)))]
