  [graph]
  (letfn [(dfs
            [g s]
            (loop [vertices [] explored #{s} frontier [s]]
              (if (empty? frontier)
                vertices
                (let [v (peek frontier)
                      neighbors (g v)]
                  (recur
                    (conj vertices v)
                    (into explored neighbors)
                    (into (pop frontier) (remove explored neighbors)))))))]
    
  (let [g (apply merge (map (fn [[k v]]
                              {k (map last v)})
                            (group-by #(first %) graph)))
        all-pathes (map #(dfs g %) (keys g))
        vs (into #{} (flatten (into [] graph)))]
    
    (if (some #(= (count %) (count vs)) all-pathes)
      true
      false)
   )))

(fn f [s]
  (let [nodes (set (concat (map first s) (map second s)))
        accessibles
          (loop [in (set (first s))]
            (let [news (into #{}
                        (flatten
                          (for [[a b] s
                                [c d] s
                                :when (and (or (in a) (in b))
                                        (or (= a c) (= a d) (= b c) (= b d)))]
                            [a b c d]
                        )))]

              (if (empty? (clojure.set/difference news in))
                in
                (recur (clojure.set/union in news)))))]
    (println accessibles)
    (= (count nodes) (count accessibles))))

(fn [g]
  (letfn [(merge-if-matching-entry [s1 s2]
            (if (some s1 s2)
              (apply conj s1 s2)
              s2))
          (build-paths [x]
            (reduce
              (fn [cs s]
                (let [sx (set s)]
                  (concat [sx] (map (partial merge-if-matching-entry sx) cs))))
              []
              x))
          (merge-paths [p]
            (mapcat
              (fn [x]
                (map (partial merge-if-matching-entry x) p)) p))
          (filter-subsets [p]
            (reduce
              (fn [x y]
                (conj (filter
                        (fn [i]
                          (not (and (some y i) (>= (count y) (count i)))))
                        x) y))
              []
              p))]
    (->> g
         (build-paths)
         (merge-paths)
         (sort #(< (count %1) (count %2)))
         (filter-subsets)
         (count)
         (= 1))))

(fn prob-0091
  [rels]
  (let [add-dir-rel (fn add-dir-rel
                      [rel p-map s-map]
                      (let [[p s] rel
                            rels (for [p-new (conj (p-map p) p)
                                       s-new (conj (s-map s) s)]
                                   [p-new s-new])
        
                            s-rels (map #(array-map (first  %) #{(second %)} ) rels)
                            p-rels (map #(array-map (second %) #{(first  %)} ) rels)

                            new-pm (apply merge-with into p-map p-rels)
                            new-sm (apply merge-with into s-map s-rels)]
        
                        [new-pm new-sm]))

        add-undir-rel (fn add-undir-rel
                        [rel p-map s-map]
                        (let [[a b] rel]
                          (apply add-dir-rel [a b]
                                 (add-dir-rel [b a] p-map s-map))))

        ]
    
    (let [[p-map s-map] (reduce #(apply add-undir-rel %2 %1) [{} {}] rels)]
      (and (not (empty? s-map)) (= (count p-map) (count (val (first p-map))))))))

; this is for directed graphs
; but passes the tests apparantly

(let [
  ;all nodes of a given graph
  nodes (fn [v] (into (into #{} (map #(% 0) v)) (map #(% 1) v)))
      ;nodes reachable from node n in graph v
      reachable-from (fn [v n]
        (let [c (fn [s] (into s (for [x s [y z] v :when (= x y)] z)))]
        (loop [acc #{n} prev #{}]
          (if (= acc prev) acc
            (recur (c acc) acc)))))]
     ;graph is connected iff 
     ;allnodes are reachable from some arbitrary node
     #(= (nodes %) (reachable-from % ((first %) 0))))

(fn [s]
  (letfn [(me-helper [g a b]
            (assoc g a (conj (get g a []) b)))
          (make-edge [g a b]
            (me-helper (me-helper g a b) b a))
          (re-helper [g a b]
            (let [a_ind (.indexOf (get g b) a)]
              (assoc g b (concat (take a_ind (get g b)) (drop (inc a_ind) (get g b))))))
          (rem-edge [g a b]
            (re-helper (re-helper g a b) b a))
          (make-graph [arys]
            (reduce (fn [g [a b]]
                      (make-edge g a b)) {} arys))
          (visit [graph current-node node-list]
            (cond
              (empty? node-list) true
              (empty? (get graph current-node)) false
              :else (some identity (map #(visit (rem-edge graph current-node %) % (disj node-list %)) (get graph current-node)))))
          (is-connected [graph]
            (not (nil? (some identity (map #(visit graph % (disj (into #{} (keys graph)) %)) (keys graph))))))]
    (is-connected (make-graph s))))

(fn graph-connectivity?
  ([graph]
   (graph-connectivity? (map set graph) [] (count graph)))
  ([graph result cog]
   (letfn [(connect-union [sa sb]
             (if (empty? (clojure.set/intersection sa sb))
               sa
               (clojure.set/union sa sb)))
           (connect-sets [acc ps]
             (let [result (map #(connect-union % ps) acc)]
               (if (some #(not-empty (clojure.set/intersection ps %)) result)
                 result
                 (conj result ps))))]
     (cond
       (empty? graph) (if (= cog (count result))
                        (= 1 (count result))
                        (graph-connectivity? result))
       (empty? result) (graph-connectivity? (rest graph)
                                            (conj result (first graph))
                                            cog)
       :else (graph-connectivity? (rest graph)
                                  (connect-sets result (first graph))
                                  cog)))))

(fn connected? [edges]
  (letfn [(edges->neighbours 
           [coll]
           (letfn [(updater [s v] 
                            (conj (or s #{}) v))
                   (reducer [nei [a b]]
                            (-> nei
                                (update-in [a] updater b)
                                (update-in [b] updater a)))]
             (reduce reducer {} coll)))
          (dfs 
           ([g] (dfs g (first (keys g))))
           ([g v]
            (reduce
             (fn [[walked left :as res] nei]
               (if (left nei)
                 (let [[new-walked new-left] (dfs left nei)]
                   [(concat walked new-walked) new-left])
                 res))
             [[v] (dissoc g v)] (g v))))]
    (let [g (edges->neighbours edges)
          [_ left] (dfs g)]
      (empty? left))))

(fn graph-connectivity [coll]
   (let [elements (distinct (flatten (map identity coll)))
         coll- (concat coll (first (for [i coll] (map #(vector % %) i))))
         possible-paths
          (loop [counter (count coll-)
                 acc coll-]
            (if (= 0 counter)
              (set acc)
              (recur (dec counter) (set (remove nil?
                                                (concat
                                                  acc
                                                  (for [i acc
                                                        j acc]
                                                    (if (= (last i) (first j))
                                                      [(first i) (last j)]))
                                                  (for [i acc
                                                        j acc]
                                                    (if (= (last i) (first j))
                                                      [(last j) (first i)]))))))))
         full-graph (set (for [i elements
                          j elements]
                      [i j]))]
     (= possible-paths full-graph)))

(letfn [(connected? [nodes e]
          (some (into #{} e) nodes))]
  (fn [coll]
    (loop [nodes (into #{} (first coll))
           edges (rest coll)]
      (if (empty? edges)
        true
        (let [new-edges (filter (partial connected? nodes) edges)]
          (if (empty? new-edges)
            false
            (recur (clojure.set/union nodes (into #{} (flatten new-edges)))
                   (remove (partial connected? nodes) edges))))))))

(fn[g]
  (loop[Connectivity (cons(first g)'()), graph (rest g), index 0]
   (if (empty? graph) 
     true            
     (if (= index (count graph)) 
       false
       (let[ [x y :as node] (nth graph index)]
         (if (some #(or (= x (first %)) (= x (second %)) (= y (first %)) (= y (second %))) Connectivity)
           (recur (cons node Connectivity) (remove #(= node %) graph) 0)
           (recur Connectivity graph (inc index))))))))


;let[ [x y :as node] (nth graph index)] => destructuring. tutorial: https://clojure.org/guides/destructuring

;the algorithm run over all the elements in "graph" to fine some node that connected to some node in Connectivity.
;if it find one it transfer it to connectivity & start over.

(fn [graph]
  (let [vertices (apply hash-set (distinct (flatten (seq graph))))
        start (first vertices)
        neighbors (fn [v] (apply hash-set (distinct (for [x vertices :when (or (graph [x v]) (graph [v x]))] x))))]
    (letfn [(bfs [verts visited]
              (let [nverts (clojure.set/difference (apply clojure.set/union (for [v verts] (neighbors v))) visited)]
                (if (empty? nverts)
                     (if (= vertices (clojure.set/union verts visited))
                           true
                           false)
                      (bfs nverts (clojure.set/union verts visited)))))]
          (bfs #{start} #{}))))

(fn graph-connect [edges]
  (let [points (set (apply concat edges))
        other-one (fn [tuple item] (if (= item (first tuple)) (last tuple) (first tuple)))
        next-pos (fn [in-set pos] (filter #(not ((set in-set) %)) (map #(other-one % pos) (filter #((set %) pos) edges))))
        nexts-pos (fn [in-set] (apply concat (map #(next-pos in-set %) in-set)))
        points (set (apply concat edges))
        step (fn f [in-set]
               (if (= (count points) (count in-set))
                 true
                 (let [after-set (set (concat in-set (nexts-pos in-set)))]
                   (if (= (count after-set) (count in-set))
                     false
                     (f after-set))))
               )]
    (step (set (list (first points))))))

(fn connected? [xs]
   (letfn [ (trans-closure [xs] 
              (loop [xs xs]
                (let [nxs
                      (reduce
                        (fn [a [x1 x2]]
                          (reduce (fn [b [y1 y2]]
                                    (if (= x2 y1) (conj b [x1 y2]) b))
                                  a
                                  a))
                        xs
                        xs )]
                  (if (= nxs xs) nxs (recur nxs))
                  )
                ))]
     (let [nodes (distinct (flatten (seq xs)))
           pairs (for [i nodes j nodes :when (not= i j)] [i j])
           xs (into xs (map reverse xs))
           closure (trans-closure xs)] 
       (every? identity (map #(or (closure %) (closure (reverse %))) pairs))
       ))
   )

(fn [s]
    (letfn [(check-all [o s]
              (let [r (group-by #(or (= (first %) (second o)) (= (second %) (first o)) (= (first %) (first o))) s)]
                [(cons o (get r true)) (get r false)]))]
      (let [[a b] (check-all (first s) (rest s))]
        (loop [a a b b]
          (cond (empty? b) true
                (empty? a) false
                :else (let [[a1 b1] (check-all (first a) b)]
                        (recur (concat (rest a) (rest a1)) b1)))))))

(fn connected-4clojure?
  ([s]
    (let [developed-graph (apply merge-with 
                #(into %1 %2) 
                (apply concat 
                  (map (fn [[k v]] [{k #{v}} {v #{k}}]) s)))
          next-vals #(for [x %2] (%1 x))]
          (loop [starting-point 0 connected-dots (conj (second (first developed-graph)) (ffirst developed-graph))]
          (if (= (count developed-graph) (count connected-dots)) true
              (let [new-connected-dots (set (flatten (map #(concat connected-dots %) (next-vals developed-graph connected-dots))))]
                (if (= starting-point (count new-connected-dots)) false
                  (recur (count new-connected-dots) new-connected-dots))))))))

(fn [s]
   (let [;; Bidirectional set of edges
         s2 (into s (map (comp vec reverse) s))
         ;; Reachability map: all edges 
         m (into {} (map (fn [[k v]] [k (set (map second v))]) (group-by first s2)))
         ;; Iterates (f x), (f (f x)), ... until the result no longer changes.
         closure (fn [f x] (let [fx (f x)] (if (= x fx) x (recur f fx))))
         ;; Transitive closure of the reachability map
         mm (closure (fn [x] (reduce (fn [m [k v]]
                                       (assoc m k (set (concat v (mapcat #(m %) v)))))
                                     {} x))
                     m)]
     (apply = (vals mm))))

(fn connected-graph? [set-of-links]
  (letfn [(find-nodes [set-of-tuples]
            (reduce (fn [acc [from to]] (conj acc from to)) #{} set-of-tuples))
          (find-direct-links [nodes set-of-tuples]
            (vals 
              (reduce 
                (fn [acc-m node] 
                  (assoc acc-m node (vec (filter #(contains? (set %) node) (vec set-of-tuples))))) 
                {} nodes)))
          (linked-islands? [l-island r-island]
            ((comp not empty?) (clojure.set/intersection (set (flatten l-island)) (set (flatten r-island)))))
          (merge-direct-links [[head-island next-island & tail]]
            (if (nil? next-island) (set head-island)
              (if (linked-islands? head-island next-island)
                (recur (cons (concat head-island next-island) tail))
                (recur (cons head-island tail)))))]
    (-> set-of-links
        find-nodes
        (find-direct-links set-of-links)
        merge-direct-links
        (= set-of-links))))

(fn [input] (let [first-pass (reduce (fn [r [k v]] 
                                      (let [h1 (get r k [])
                                            h2 (get r v [])
                                            c1 (conj h1 v)
                                            c2 (conj h2 k)
                                            r1 (assoc r k (into #{} (concat c1 c2)))
                                            r2 (assoc r1 v (into #{} (concat c1 c2)))]
                                        r2))
                                    {} input)
                  second-pass (reduce 
                                (fn [r [k v]]
                                  (let [j (filter #(not (#{k} %)) v)]
                                    (assoc r k (into #{} (reduce (fn[vr vv] (concat vr (get r vv))) v j)))))
                                first-pass first-pass)
                  node-count (count (keys second-pass))
                  matched (some(fn [[k v]] (= (count v) node-count)) second-pass)]
              (if (nil? matched) false true)))

(fn [edges]
  (boolean
   ((fn [nodes edges]
      (or (empty? edges)
          (if-let [edge (some #(if (some % nodes) %) edges)]
            (recur (apply conj nodes edge)
                   (disj edges edge)))))
    (->> edges first set)
    (->> edges rest (map set) set))))

(fn [g]
  (let [v (set (flatten (reduce conj '() g)))
        f (fn [f g v] (filter #(= (f %) v) g))
        m (fn [f c] (map f c))
        s (first v)]
    (loop [c [s]
           r #{s}]
      (let [n (reduce into (reduce into #{} (map #(m last (f first g %)) c))
                (map #(m first (f last g %)) c))
            nr (into r n)]
        (condp = nr
          v true
          r false
          (recur n nr))))))

(fn [edges]
  (let [vertices (set (flatten (seq edges)))
        neighbor-edges (fn [edges node]
                         (filter (fn [[x y]] (or (= x node) (= y node))) edges))
        walk (fn w [edges start]
               (let [to-visit (neighbor-edges edges start)
                     new-vertices (set (flatten to-visit))
                     next-edges (clojure.set/difference edges to-visit)
                     next-vertices (disj new-vertices start)]
                 (apply clojure.set/union new-vertices (map #(w next-edges %) next-vertices))))]
    (= vertices (walk edges (ffirst edges)))))

(fn[g]
  (let
    [to-set (fn[s] (into #{} (mapcat identity s)))
     sz (count (to-set g))
     f (fn[s]
         (let [t (to-set (filter #(some s %) g)) z (count t)]
           (cond (= z sz) true
                 (= z (count s)) false
                 :else (recur t))))]
  (f #{(ffirst g)})))

(fn is-connected? [edges]
	(if (empty? (rest edges))
		true
		(let [vertexes (-> edges vec flatten set)
			  n        (count vertexes)
			  get-reachable-from (fn [x edges]
								  	(loop [eds edges, result #{}]
										(if (empty? eds)
											result
											(let [edge (first eds)
												  idx (.indexOf edge x)]
												(if (not= -1 idx)
													(recur 
														(rest eds) 
														(conj result (if (= 0 idx) (edge 1) (edge 0))))
													(recur 
														(rest eds) 
														result)
											))
										)))
			  find-edges-with	(fn [x edges]
									(loop [eds edges, result #{}]
										(if (empty? eds)
											result
											(let [edge (first eds)
												  idx  (.indexOf edge x)]
												(if (= -1 idx)
													(recur (rest eds) result)	
													(recur (rest eds) (conj result edge))		
												))
									)))
			  get-vertexes-without (fn [y edges]
										(loop [eds edges, result #{}]
											(if (empty? eds)
												result
												(let [[a b] (first eds)]
													(cond
														(= a y) (recur (rest eds) (conj result b))
														(= b y) (recur (rest eds) (conj result a))
														:default
														(recur (rest eds) result))
												))))	
			  fill-l-k  (fn [l k vers-without-y]
							(loop [vwy vers-without-y, l1 (set l), k1 k]
								(if (empty? vwy)
									{:l l1, :k k1}
									(let [z (first vwy)]
										(if (contains? l1 z)
											(recur (rest vwy) l1 k1)
											(recur (rest vwy) (conj l1 z) (conj k1 z))

										)	
									))))
			  ver-x 	(first vertexes)
			  l 		[ver-x]
			  k   		[ver-x]]
			(loop [k1 k, l1 k1]
				(if (empty? k1)
					(if (= n (count l1)) true false)
					(let [y      		 (first k1)
						  edgs-y 		 (find-edges-with y edges)
						  vers-without-y (get-vertexes-without y edgs-y)
						  r 			 (fill-l-k l1 (rest k1) vers-without-y)]
						  (recur (r :k) (r :l))
						)))	
	)))

(fn [m]
  (let [[[a b] & rest] (seq m)
        flatseq #(set (flatten (seq %)))] ; #{[1 2] [2 3]} => #{1 2 3}
    (loop [visited (set [a b]) ; keep track of visited nodes
           m rest]
      (or (empty? m) ; visited everything 
          (and ((complement empty?) (clojure.set/intersection visited (flatseq m))) ; there's still some accessible nodes
               (let [found (set (reduce into (for [x visited] (filter (fn [[a b]] (or (= a x) (= b x))) m))))] ; found nodes connected to visited nodes
                 (recur (flatseq found) (remove #(contains? found %) m)))))))) ; recur with updated "visited" and removed visited nodes

(fn [edges]
  (let [find-root (fn [graph n]
                    (let [root (get graph n n)]
                      (if (= root n)
                        n
                        (recur graph root))))
        union-graph (fn [graph a b]
                      (let [root-a (find-root graph a)
                            root-b (find-root graph b)]
                        (-> graph
                            (assoc a root-a)
                            (assoc b root-a))))
        graph (reduce (fn [g [a b]] (union-graph g a b)) {} edges)]
    (= 1 (->> graph
              (map #(find-root graph (first %)))
              distinct
              count))))

(fn connect[-set]
  (let [trans (fn l[s]
              (let[D (fn k[ss](into ss (for [[a b] ss [c d] ss :when (= b c)] [a d])))]
                (if (= s (D s))
                  s
                  (recur (D s)))))
        nset (into -set (map (fn[[a b]][b a]) -set))
        comp (trans nset)
        nn (count comp)
        n (count (set (for [[a _] comp] a)))
        ]
    (= nn (* n n))))

(fn[edges]
  (let [[head & tail] (vec edges)]
    (loop [start (set head) tail tail]
      (let [components (group-by #(boolean (some start %)) tail)]
        (if (seq (components true))
          (recur (set (flatten (components true))) (components false))
          (not (seq (components false))))))))

(fn [s] 
  (let [
    setify (map set s)
    findone (fn [s ss] (some #(if (some s  %) % nil) ss))
    ]
  (loop [x (set (rest setify)) a (first setify)]
    (if (empty? x) true
      (let [f (findone a x)]
        (if (nil? f) false
          (recur 
            (disj x f) 
            (conj (conj a (first f)) (last f)))))))))

(fn [graph]
  (letfn [(adjacent [k]
                    (clojure.set/union
                     (->> graph (filter #(= k (first %))) (map second))
                     (->> graph (filter #(= k (second %))) (map first))))
          (dfs-connected? [[v & vs] remaining]
                          (cond (empty? remaining) true
                                (nil? v) false
                                :else (let [adj (filter remaining (adjacent v))
                                            next-vs (if (empty? adj) vs (apply conj vs adj))
                                            next-rem (apply disj remaining adj)]
                                          (dfs-connected? next-vs next-rem))))]
    (let [[v & vs] (distinct (flatten (vec graph)))]
      (dfs-connected? (list v) (apply hash-set vs)))))

(fn myf [graph]
 (loop [all-set (set (flatten (vec graph)))
        graph-set (set (first graph))]
   (let [res (reduce 
               #(if (or (contains? %1 (second %2)) (contains? %1 (first %2))) (into %1 %2) %1)
               graph-set
               graph)]
     (cond (= graph-set all-set) true;
           (= graph-set res) false;
           :else (recur all-set res)))))

(fn [g]
  (letfn [(g->m [g]
            (->> g
                 (group-by first)
                 (map (fn [[node items]]
                        [node (set (map second items))]))
                 (into {})))
          (expand [m]
            (into {}
                  (for [[f ts] m]
                    [f (set (apply concat ts
                                   (for [t ts]
                                     (get m t))))])))]
    (let [g1 (g->m g)
          g2 (g->m (map (comp vec reverse) g))
          m (merge-with #(set (concat %1 %2)) g1 g2)
          size (count m)]
      (= size
         (-> (nth (iterate expand m) size) vals first count)))))

(fn [pairs]
  (let [connected? (fn connected? [p p']
                     (> 4 (count (distinct (concat p p')))))
        clusters (loop [input pairs, output #{}]
                   (if (empty? input)
                     output
                     (let [pair (first input)
                           belongs? (fn [pair pairs]
                                      (some #(connected? % pair) pairs))
                           groups (group-by #(belongs? pair %) output)
                           output' (conj (groups nil)
                                         (apply clojure.set/union (conj (groups true) #{pair})))]
                       (recur (set (next input))
                              output'))))]
    (= 1 (count clusters))))

(fn [g]
  ((fn [e] (let [next-e (reduce (fn [a b] (into a (filter #(some (set b) %) g))) #{} e)]
            (if (= next-e e) (= next-e g) (recur next-e)))) #{(first g)}))

(fn f [g]
  (let [expand-graph (fn expand-graph [g]
                       (let [rev-g (map #(apply hash-map [(second %) [(first %)]]) g)
                             gm (map #(apply hash-map [(first %) [(second %)]]) g)]
                         (reduce (fn [col x]
                                   (merge-with concat col x))
                                 (concat rev-g gm))))
        traverse     (fn traverse [visited n eg]
                       (let [all-children (eg n)
                             not-visited  (filter #(not (visited %)) all-children)
                             visited'     (conj visited n)
                             _ (println n visited all-children not-visited)]
                         (if (not-empty not-visited)
                           (mapcat #(traverse visited' % eg) not-visited)
                           (do (println "Returning" visited')
                               visited'))))
        eg           (expand-graph g)
        n            (first (first eg))
        all-nodes    (set (mapcat concat g))
        visited      (set (traverse #{} n eg))]
    (println eg all-nodes visited)
    (= all-nodes visited)))

(fn gc [s]
  (let [f (first s)
        filt (fn [x s]
               (let [f (fn [v]
                         (cond
                          (= (first x) (first v)) v
                          (= (first x) (last v)) v
                          (= (last x) (first v)) v
                          (= (last x) (last v)) v
                          :else nil))]
               (map f s)))]
    (loop [r #{f}
           pr #{}]
      (if (= (count r) (count pr))
        (= s r)
        (recur (clojure.set/union r (disj (apply clojure.set/union
                                          (for [x r]
                                            (into #{} (filt x s))))
                                    nil))
               r)))))

(fn [graph-edges]
  (let [
         adjcent-v  (fn [v E]
                      "Helper function to retrieve all nodes adjenct to v by finding all the e in E which contain v, 
                      v is then removed from the result set and it is cast as a vector"
                      (vec (remove #(= % v) (flatten (filter #(some (fn [e]  (= v e)) %) E)))))
         
         adjacency-list (fn [graph-edges]
                          "create an adjacency list from the edges provided"
                          (->>
                            graph-edges
                           	(into [])
                            (flatten)
                            (set)
                            (map (fn [v] (hash-map v (adjcent-v v graph-edges))))
                            (into {})
                            ))
         breath-first-chain (fn [adj-list]
                              "Breadth first graph search based on
                              http://stackoverflow.com/questions/713508/find-the-paths-between-two-given-nodes
                              current, enqued and visted nodes - we care about chains not paths"
                              (loop [current-node (ffirst adj-list)
                                        enqued-nodes (peek (first adj-list))
                                        visited-nodes (hash-set (ffirst adj-list))]
                                (if (empty? enqued-nodes)
                                  visited-nodes
                                  (recur (first enqued-nodes)
                                         (let [new-nodes (remove #(contains? visited-nodes %) (adj-list current-node))]
                                           "enque nodes that have not been visited"
                                           (if (empty? new-nodes)
                                             (rest enqued-nodes)
                                             (apply conj (rest enqued-nodes) new-nodes)
                                             )
                                           )
                                         (conj visited-nodes current-node))
                                  )
                                )
                              )
         connected-graph? (fn [adj-list]
                            "Checks if there is a chain which contains all of the nodes in the graph"
                            (if (map? adj-list)
                              (if-not (= (count adj-list) 1)
                                (= (into #{} (keys adj-list)) (breath-first-chain adj-list))
                                true)
                              false)
                            )
         ]
    (connected-graph? (adjacency-list graph-edges))
    )
  )

(fn [edges]
  (letfn [(add-edge [[f & r] edge]
            (cond  (nil?  f)     [(set edge)]      
                   (some f edge) (add-edge r (into f edge))
                   :else         (cons f (add-edge r edge))))]
    (= 1 (count (reduce add-edge [] edges)))))

(fn [s]
  (letfn [(check [c s] ; (c: connected nodes, s: candidate edges)
            (if (empty? s)
              true
              (let [e (filter (fn [m] (some (fn [n] (some #(= % n) c)) m)) s)] ; filter edges which may be connected
                (if (empty? e)
                  false
                  (recur (reduce into c e) (filter (fn [m] (not (some #(= % m) e))) s))))))]
    (check (set (first s)) (rest s))))

(fn connected? [g]
  (let [rf (fn rf [a b]
              (let [u (b 0)
                    v (b 1)
                    sets (reduce clojure.set/union (filter #(or (contains? % u) (contains? % v)) a))
                    rest (remove #(or (contains? % u) (contains? % v)) a)]
                (conj rest (clojure.set/union #{u} #{v} sets))))]
    (= 1 (count (reduce rf [] g)))))

(fn [s]
  (loop [i s matched nil rem '() looped nil]
    (cond 
      (empty? i)
        (cond 
          (empty? rem) true
          (or (nil? looped) (> looped (count rem)))
            (recur rem matched '() (count rem))
          :else false)
      (nil? matched)
        (recur (rest i) (set (first i)) rem looped)
      (some matched (first i))
        (recur (rest i) (apply conj matched (first i)) rem looped)
      :else
        (recur (rest i) matched (conj rem (first i)) looped))))

 (recur (reduce (fn [s [p q :as r]]

    (into s r) s)) a b) (inc c) b z)))

(fn [x]
  (letfn [(nodes [edges]
            (set (mapcat (fn [x] x) edges)))
          (reachable? [n edge]
            (if (contains? (set edge) n)
              (filter #(not (= n %)) edge)
              []))
          (can-reach [edges n]
            (reduce #(into %1 (reachable? n %2)) #{n} edges))
          (all-reachable
            ([edges] (all-reachable #{(first (first edges))} edges))
            ([rchd-nds edges]
             (letfn [(nxt-stp [reached]
                       (set (mapcat (partial can-reach edges) reached)))]
               (loop [x0 rchd-nds x1 (nxt-stp rchd-nds)]
                 (if (= x0 x1)
                   (if (= x0 (nodes edges)) true false)
                   (recur x1 (nxt-stp x1)))))))
          ]
    (all-reachable x)))

(fn [g]

             (loop [q (conj [] (ffirst g)) visited #{}]

                   (empty? rem))
                 (let [v1 (peek q)
                       edges (filter (partial some #{v1}) g)
                       vertices (filter (partial not= v1) (flatten edges))
                       unvisited (filter #(not (contains? visited %)) vertices)]
                   (recur (into (rest q) unvisited) (into (conj visited v1) unvisited))))))]
     (connected? g)))

(letfn
    [( closure [xys]
        (into
            xys
            (for [[x1 y1] xys
                  [x2 y2] xys
                  :when (= y1 x2)]
                  [x1 y2])))

      ( tc [xys]
        (loop [count-so-far (count xys)
               step (closure xys)]
          (if (= count-so-far (count step))
            step
            (recur (count step) (closure step)))))

      ( vertices [graph]
        (distinct (flatten (vec graph))))

      ( normalize [graph]
        (set (apply concat (for [[x y] graph] [[x y] [y x]]))))]

    (fn [graph]
      (let [count-full (->> graph normalize tc count)
            count-vertices (count (vertices graph))]
          (= count-full (* count-vertices count-vertices)))))

(fn [g]  
  (let [ gg (into g (map #(vector (last %) (first %)) g)) ]
    (letfn [ (f [ [a b] r] 
               (->>
                 (filter #(= (first %) b) r)
                 (map #(vector a (last %)))
                 ))
           (trans-closure [r]
                      (let [x  (mapcat #(f % r) r)
                            y  (filter #(nil? (r %)) x )] 
                        (if (empty? y) r (recur (into r y)))))]
    (let [ closure (trans-closure gg)
           nodes (distinct (map #(first %) gg)) 
          ] ( = (count closure) ( * (count nodes) (count nodes))))
      )))

(fn connected
  [graph]
  (letfn [( path
            ([n1 n2 graph] (path n1 n2 graph #{}))
            ([n1 n2 graph nodes]
              (letfn [(step [y z] (if (and (= y n1) (nil? (nodes z)))
                                    (or (= z n2) (path z n2 graph (conj nodes z)))
                                    false))]
                (some true? (for [[v u] graph]
                              (or (step v u) (step u v)))))
              ))] (let [nodes (reduce
                 (fn [res [x y]] (conj res x y))
                 #{}
                 graph)]
     (every? true? (for [v nodes u nodes]
                     (path v u graph)))))
  )

(fn timmy-conn? [edges]
  (let [graph (reduce (partial merge-with into)
                      (map (fn [[m n]]
                             (if (= m n) {m #{m}}
                             {m #{n} n #{m}}))
                           edges))]
    ((fn connected? [start unvisited graph]
       (if (empty? unvisited)
         true
         (let [visiting (set (filter (graph start) unvisited))
               new-unvisited (set (remove visiting unvisited))]
           (if (some true?
                 (map #(connected? % new-unvisited graph)
                      visiting))
             true
             false))))
     (first (keys graph))
     (disj (set (keys graph)) (first (keys graph)))
     graph)))

(fn [s]
    
    (let [connected   (set (first s))
          unchecked   (rest s)
          unconnected #{}
          any-present? (fn [c] (some (comp not nil?) c))]
      
      (loop [connected connected
             unchecked unchecked
             unconnected unconnected]
        
        (let [check (first unchecked)
              add-c (partial apply conj connected)
              add-u (partial apply conj unconnected)
              rem-u (partial apply disj unconnected)
              check-is-connected? (any-present? (map connected check))
              check-is-link? (or (and (connected (first check)) (unconnected (second check)))
                                 (and (connected (second check)) (unconnected (first check))))]
          
          (if (and (nil? check) (empty? unconnected))
            true
            (if (nil? check)
              false
              (if check-is-link?
                (recur (add-c (add-u check)) (rest unchecked) #{})
                (if check-is-connected?
                  (recur (add-c check) (rest unchecked) unconnected)
                  (recur connected (rest unchecked) (add-u check))))))))))

(fn f91 [edges]
  (letfn [(graph [edges]
            (->> edges
                 (mapcat (fn [v]
                           (let [f (first v)
                                 s (second v)]
                             [{f #{s}} {s #{f}}])))
                 (apply merge-with clojure.set/union)))
          (dsf [graph node]
            (loop [seen #{node}
                   path [node]
                   todo (vec (get graph node))]
              (if (empty? todo)
                path
                (let [node (peek todo)]
                  (if (seen node)
                    (recur seen
                           path
                           (pop todo))
                    (recur (conj seen node)
                           (conj path node)
                           (into (pop todo) (get graph node))))))))

          (connected-graph? [g]
            (= (count g)
               (count (dsf g (ffirst g)))))]
    (-> edges
        graph
        connected-graph?)))

(fn connected-graph? [edges]
    (let [nodes (reduce #(apply conj %1 %2) #{} edges)]
      (loop [visited? #{} queue (conj clojure.lang.PersistentQueue/EMPTY (first nodes))]
        (let [node (peek queue)
              rst  (pop queue)]
          (if (empty? queue)
            (empty? (clojure.set/difference nodes visited?))
            (recur (conj visited? node)
                   (reduce
                    (fn [q [v w]]
                      (cond
                        (and (not= v node) (not (visited? v))) (conj q v)
                        (and (not= w node) (not (visited? w))) (conj q w)
                        :else q))
                    rst
                    (filter (fn [e] (some #(= node %) e)) edges))))))))

(fn 
  [graph]
  (letfn [(within-reach? [reach node]
            (if (contains? reach node)
              true
              (some (fn [a] (and (or (contains? reach (first a))
                                    (contains? reach (second a)))
                                (or (= (first a) node)
                                    (= (second a) node))))
                    graph)))
          (domain [graph]
            (into #{} (flatten (seq graph))))]
    (loop [edges  (next graph)
           this (first graph)
           reachable (set this)]
      (if (nil? edges)
        (= reachable (domain graph))
        (recur (next edges)
               (first edges)
               (if (or (within-reach? reachable (first this))
                        (within-reach? reachable (second this)))
                 (into reachable this)
                 reachable))))))

(fn [coll]
  (loop [links
         (reduce
           (fn [m [a b]] (assoc m a (conj (m a) b)))
           (reduce #(assoc %1 %2 #{%2}) {} (distinct (flatten (concat coll))))
           (concat coll (map reverse coll)))]
    (let [new-links (reduce (fn [m [k s]] (assoc m k (into s (mapcat #(links %) s)))) {} links)]
      (if (= links new-links)
        (apply = (count links) (map count (vals links)))
        (recur new-links)))))

(fn [edges]
  (let [
        tree-flat (apply concat edges)
        all-nodes (set tree-flat)
        start-node (ffirst edges)
        edge-matcher (fn [vertex] #(some #{vertex} %))
        matching-edges (fn [vertex edges]
                         (set (filter
                               (edge-matcher vertex)
                               edges)))
        next-vertex (fn [current-vertex [x y]]
                      (if (= current-vertex x) y x))
        can-expand? (fn [[vertex edges]]
                      (some (edge-matcher vertex) edges))
        get-children (fn [[vertex edges]]
                       (map (fn [edge]
                              [(next-vertex vertex edge) (disj edges edge)])
                            (matching-edges vertex edges)))
        connected (= all-nodes (set (map first
                                     (tree-seq can-expand?
                                               get-children
                                               [start-node (set edges)]))))
        count-degrees (fn [node]
                        (count (filter #{node} tree-flat)))
        odd-degree-vertices (filter odd? (map count-degrees all-nodes))]
    (and connected )))

(fn connected? [s]
  (let [f (fn [acc s]
            (if (empty? s) true
              (let [node-connected
                    (some (fn [x]
                            (or
                              (some #(= % (ffirst s)) x)
                              (some #(= % (second (first s))) x))) acc)]
                (if (not node-connected) false
                  (recur (conj acc (first s)) (rest s))))))
        ordered (sort-by (juxt first second) s)]
    (f (list (first ordered)) (rest ordered))))

                     r)))))

(add-node [groups node]

            [(first result) (conj (second result) group)]
            [(conj (first result) group) (second result)]))

     (conj (first result) (set (apply concat (second result))))))

       undirectGraph (fn [g]

(fn connected?
  [edges]
  (letfn [(grow-paths [edges]
            (let [[edge & more] (seq edges)]
              (reduce path-to #{edge} more)))
          (path-to [a b]
            (let [ab (concat (first a) b)]
              (if (apply distinct? ab)
                (conj a b)
                (conj (rest a) (distinct ab)))))
          (changed? [[x y]]
            (not= (count x) (count y)))]
    (->> edges
         (iterate grow-paths)
         (partition 2)
         (drop-while changed?)
         ffirst
         count
         (= 1))))

(fn connected? [edge_set]
    (let
        [
            symmetric_closure
                (fn [edges] (into (set edge_set) (for [[a b] edges] [b a])))
            build_adjacency_map
                (fn [edges] (reduce (fn [ret [a b]] (assoc ret a (conj (ret a #{}) b))) {} edges))
            connected_helper?
                (fn f [[g visited total] curr]
                    (if (contains? visited curr)
                        [g visited total]
                        (reduce f [g (conj visited curr) (inc total)] (g curr))
                    )
                )
            connected?
                (fn [g] (= (last (connected_helper? [g #{} 0] (first (first g)))) (count g)) )
        ]
        (->> edge_set (symmetric_closure) (build_adjacency_map) (connected?))
    )
)

        nodes (set (keys graph))

                      (if-let [n (first queue)]
                              (recur (into (subvec queue 1) (clojure.set/difference (graph n) visited)) (conj visited n))
                              visited)))]
        
        (= nodes (bfs (first nodes)))))

    (->> graph (first) (distinct) (apply hash-set))))
  ([graph visited]

(fn [s]
  ; it's almost Christmas and I'm feeling lazy so it's naively based on http://www.4clojure.com/problem/84
  (letfn [(all-transitions [a]
            (clojure.set/union
              a
              (map vec
                   (remove empty?
                           (mapcat
                             (fn [c]
                               (map (fn [[_ b]] (vector (first c) b))
                                    (filter (fn [[x _]] (= x (second c))) (remove #{c} a))))
                             a)))))]
    (let [with-reverted (mapcat (fn [[x y]] (concat [[x y] [y x]])) s)
          all (loop [c with-reverted]
                (let [next (set (all-transitions c))
                      _ (println next)]
                  (if (= (count next) (count c))
                    next
                    (recur next))))
          eac (set (flatten (vec s)))
          ]
      (every? true? (for [a eac
                          b eac]
                      (or (= a b) (contains? all [a b]) (contains? all [b a])))))))

(fn connected? [g]
  (let [v ((first g) 0)
        vn (disj (set (flatten (filter #(or (= v (% 0)) (= v (% 1))) g))) v)
        g' (set (map (fn [e] (cond
                               (contains? vn (e 0)) [v (e 1)]
                               (contains? vn (e 1)) [(e 0) v]
                               :else e))
                        g))]
       (or (empty? g)
         (= g #{[v v]})
         (and (not (= g g'))
              (connected? g')))))

(fn __ [graph]
  (letfn [
          (all-nodes [g]
            (set (mapcat identity g)))

          (has-way? [s d g] ; check graph whether s connected to d
            (g [s d]))

          (all-ways [grf]
            (loop [g grf]
              (let [ng
                    (into g
                          (for [[a b] g
                                [c d] g
                                :when (= b c)]
                            [a d]))]
                (if (= ng g) g
                    (recur ng)))))

          (connected? [nodes g]
            (every? boolean
                  (for [n nodes
                        d nodes]
                    (has-way? n d (all-ways (into g (map reverse g)))))))
          ]
    (connected? (all-nodes graph) graph)))

(fn [graph]
  (let [adjacent-nodes (apply merge-with into {}
                     (mapcat (fn [[x y]] (vector {x [y]} {y [x]})) graph))
        all-nodes (set (keys adjacent-nodes))
        [[first-node]] (seq graph)]
    (letfn [(paint [painted node]
                (let [adjs (adjacent-nodes node)]
                  (if (painted node)
                    painted
                    (reduce paint (conj painted node) adjs))))]
  (= all-nodes (paint #{} first-node)))))

(fn [graph]
  (let [nodes (set (flatten (seq graph)))
        in? (fn [seq elm] (some #(= elm %) seq))
        neighbors (fn [n] (map (fn [[a b]] (if (= a n) b a)) (filter #(in? % n) graph)))
        unvisited (fn [visisted n] (filter #(not (contains? visisted %)) (neighbors n)))]
    (loop [visited #{} component #{} queue [(first nodes)]]
      (if (empty? queue)
        (= component nodes)
        (recur
         (conj visited (peek queue))
         (conj component (peek queue))
         (into (pop queue) (unvisited visited (peek queue))))))))

    (or (empty? ns)
      (let [
        nns 
        (map #(reduce conj n %) ns)

          nns ns)
      ]
      (and (not-every? false? isect)
        (recur (map #(if %1 %2 %3) isect nns ns)))))))

(fn [set-of-tuples]
    (letfn [(make-graph [ts]
              (loop [m {}
                     ts ts]
                (if (seq ts)
                  (let [[x y] (first ts)
                        m'  (assoc m  x (conj (or (m  x) []) y))
                        m'' (assoc m' y (conj (or (m' y) []) x))]
                    (recur m''
                           (rest ts)))
                  m)))
            (depth-first-traversal
              [graph start]
              (loop [result  [start]
                     visited #{start}
                     stack   (list start)]
                (if (empty? stack)
                  result
                  (let [next (first (sort (remove visited (graph (peek stack)))))]
                    (if next
                      (recur (conj result next) (conj visited next) (conj stack next))
                      (recur result visited (pop stack))
                      )))))
            (has-chain?
              []
              (let [g (make-graph set-of-tuples)
                    vertices (reduce into #{} set-of-tuples)
                    num (count vertices)
                    paths (map #(depth-first-traversal g %)
                               (map first set-of-tuples))
                    pass #(= num (count %))]
                (if (some pass paths)
                  true
                  false)
                ))]
      (has-chain?)))

(fn [tuples]
  (let [G (group-by first tuples)
        root (ffirst G)
        ;; Run DFS on the graph G, if we see all nodes in the graph, then
        ;; it is connected, otherwise not.
        nodes (loop [discovered #{root}, processing [root], nodes #{}]
                (if (empty? processing)
                  nodes
                  (let [v (peek processing), neighbors (map peek (G v))]
                    (recur
                      (into discovered neighbors) 
                      (into (pop processing) (remove discovered neighbors))
                      (conj nodes v)))))]
    ;; Compare the number of distinct nodes in the tuple set to the number
    ;; of nodes that we have seen in our traversal.
    (= (count (reduce into #{} tuples))
       (count nodes))))

(fn [edges]
        (let [create-graph (fn [edges]

                  (-> m
                      (update-in [x1] (fnil conj []) x2)
                      (update-in [x2] (fnil conj []) x1))) {} edges))
              bfs (fn [graph start]
                    (loop [queue [start] visited (into {} (map (fn [[k]] [k false]) graph)) trail []]
          (let [[verge & queue] queue
                edges (graph verge)]
            (if verge
              (recur (if-not (visited verge) (into (vec queue) edges) (vec queue)) (assoc visited verge true) (if-not (visited verge) (conj trail verge) trail))
              trail))))
              connected (fn [graph start end]
                          (println "bfs=" (bfs graph start))
                          (some #{end} (bfs graph start)))
              cart-prod (fn [s]
                          (loop [s s result []]
          (let [[head & tail] s]
            (if-not tail
              result
              (recur tail (into result (map (fn [x] [head x]) tail)))))))
              graph (create-graph edges)]
          (= (count (filter (comp not identity) (map (fn [[v1 v2]] (connected graph v1 v2))
                                                   (cart-prod (keys graph)))))
           0)))

(fn [graph]
  ; basically transitive closure from prob #84 (but starting with bidirectional adjacency "matrix")
  (let [union (fn [s1 s2] (reduce #(conj % %2) s1 s2))
        add-adjacencies (fn [adjm [a b]] (assoc (assoc adjm a (conj (adjm a) b)) b (conj (adjm b) a)))
        adjm (reduce add-adjacencies (zipmap (reduce concat [] graph) (repeat #{})) graph)
        warshall-step (fn [adjm [i j]]
                        (if (contains? (adjm i) j)
                          (assoc adjm i (union (adjm i) (adjm j)))
                          adjm))
        tc-adjm  (reduce warshall-step adjm (for [j (keys adjm) i (keys adjm)] [i j]))
        reachables (vals tc-adjm)
        ]
    (not= nil (reduce #(if (= % %2) %) (first reachables) reachables))))

                 (mapv g graphs)

     (loop [graphs (map set edges)]
       (let [merged (reduce f [] graphs)]
         (if (= merged graphs)
           (= (count merged) 1)
           (recur merged))))))

(fn fully-connected? [graph]
  (let [nodes (set (apply concat graph))
        full-graph (set (mapcat (fn [[a b :as n]] [n [b a]]) graph))
        children (into {} (for [[k v] (group-by first full-graph)] [k (set (map second v))]))
        connections (fn [node]
                      (->> (iterate #(into % (mapcat children %)) #{node})
                           (partition 2 1)
                           (filter #(apply = %))
                           first first))]
    (every? #(= % nodes) (map connections nodes))))

					(zipmap (distinct (flatten graph)) (repeat []))
					graph))
		transformed (transform-graph graph)
		vertices (keys transformed)]
		(loop [stack (vector (first vertices)) visited #{}]
			(if (empty? stack)
				(= visited (into #{} vertices))
				(let [v (peek stack) neighbors (transformed v) restStack (pop stack)]

(fn graph-connect2 [s]
  (cond
   (empty? s) true
   (= (count s) 1) true
   :else
   (letfn [(filter-intersections [s1 s2]
             (loop [matched s1 to-match s2 unmatched #{}]
               (cond
                (empty? to-match) [matched unmatched]
                (> (count (clojure.set/intersection s1 (set (first to-match)))) 0) (recur (clojure.set/union matched
                                                                                             (first to-match))
                                                                                  (rest to-match)
                                                                                  unmatched)
                :else
                (recur matched (rest to-match) (conj unmatched (first to-match))))))
           (flatten-set-of-pairs [s]
             (loop [s s acc #{}]
               (cond
                (empty? s) acc
                :else
                (let [[x y] (first s)]
                  (recur (rest s) (conj acc x y))))))]
     (loop [from (first s)
            to (rest s)]
       (cond
        (empty? to) (if (empty? (clojure.set/difference (flatten-set-of-pairs s) from))
                     true false)
        :else
        (let [[pass _] (filter-intersections (set from) to)]
          (recur pass (rest to))))))))

             check  #(= (- all 1) (count (distinct (map % edges))))]

          (and (every? (points edges) (points loops)) ;; points with loops connected with others 
               (or (check first)
                   (check second))
          )))
)

(fn graph-connect [nodes]
  (letfn [(numnodes [nodes] (count (set (reduce concat nodes))))
          (to-node-map [nodes]
            ((fn !  [nodes node-map]
               (if-let [n (seq nodes)]
                 (let [[key val] (first n)]
                   (if (contains? node-map key)
                     (! (rest n) (assoc node-map  key (conj (node-map key) val)))
                     (! (rest n) (assoc node-map key [val]))
                     )
                   )
                 node-map)
               ) (concat nodes (map #(reverse %) nodes)) {}))
          (search [node node-map visited]
            (if (or (contains? visited  node) (empty? (node-map node)))
              visited
              (set (mapcat #(search % node-map (conj visited node)) (node-map node)))
              )
            )]
    (let [N (numnodes nodes)
          node-map (to-node-map nodes)
          searched-nodes (search (ffirst nodes) node-map #{})]
      (= N (count searched-nodes)))))

(fn [gr]
  ((fn con [s1 s2]
    (if (empty? s2) true
      (let [adj? (fn [[s1 e1] [s2 e2]] (or (= s1 s2) (= s1 e2) (= e1 s2) (= e1 e2)))
            adjs (group-by #(reduce (fn [e1 e2] (or e1 (adj? % e2))) false s1) s2)]
        (if (empty? (adjs true)) false
          (con (into s1 (adjs true)) (adjs false)))))) #{(first gr)} (rest gr)))

(fn [edges]
  (letfn [(getij [cm i j] (nth (nth cm i) j))
          (setij [cm i j newv] (assoc (vec cm) i (assoc (vec (nth cm i)) j newv)))
          (markcon [cm i j] (setij (setij cm i j 1) j i 1))]
    (let [vedges (vec edges)
          nodes (distinct (flatten (seq edges)))
          n (count nodes)
          nindexmap (zipmap nodes (range n))
          startm0 (map #(assoc (vec (repeat n -1)) % 1) (range n))
    	  startm (reduce (fn [mat edge] 
                           (let [i (nindexmap (first edge)) j (nindexmap (second edge))]
                             (markcon mat i j))) startm0 vedges)
          endm (reduce (fn [mat [k i j]] 
                         (if (and (not= -1 (getij mat k i)) (not= -1 (getij mat k j))) 
                           (markcon mat i j) mat))
                       startm (for [k (range n) i (range n) j (range n)] [k i j]))]
      (empty? (filter #(= % -1) (first endm)))
      )))

(fn [xs]
  (letfn [(prod [[x1 x2 :as xs] [y1 y2 :as ys]]
            (if (or (= x1 y1) (= x1 y2) (= x2 y1) (= x2 y2))
              (apply concat (for [x xs y ys] [[x y] [y x] [x x] [y y]])) #{}))
          (step [xs]
            (set (apply concat (for [x xs y xs] (prod x y)))))
          (trans [xs]
            (loop [n xs n+ (step xs)]
              (if (= n n+) n
                  (recur n+ (step n+)))))
          (expect [xs]
            (let [ns (set (apply concat xs)) s (count ns)] (* s s)))]
    (= (expect xs) (count (trans xs)))))

(fn[kanten-seq]
  (letfn[
    (adja-map[kanten-seq]
      (let [dup (into kanten-seq (map (fn[[k v]] [v k]) kanten-seq))]
        (apply merge-with (fn[o n] (concat o n)) (map (fn[[k v]] (hash-map k [v])) dup))))
    (zusammenhaengend? [kanten-seq]
        (let [am (adja-map kanten-seq)
              node-set (set (keys am))]
          (loop [rn (set (val (first am)))
                 rounds 1]
            (if (= rn node-set)
              true
              (if (<= rounds (count node-set))
                (let [next-rn (reduce into #{} (vals (select-keys am rn)))]
                  (recur (into rn next-rn) (inc rounds)))
                false)))))]
  (zusammenhaengend? kanten-seq)))

(fn is-graph-connected? [graph]
  (letfn [(edge-has-node [node edge]
            (or (= (first edge) node)
                (= (second edge) node)))
          (remove-node [node graph]
            (filter #(not (edge-has-node node %)) graph))
          (adjacent-nodes [node graph]
            (map #(if (= node (first %))
                    (second %)
                    (first %)) (filter (partial edge-has-node node) graph)))
          (nodes-connected? [n1 n2 current-node graph]
            (if (= current-node n2)
              true
              (if (empty? graph)
                false
                (some true? (map #(nodes-connected? n1 n2 % (remove-node current-node graph))
                                 (adjacent-nodes current-node graph))))))]
    (let [distinct-nodes (distinct (flatten (map #(vector (first %) (second %)) graph)))]
      (every? true? (map (fn [n1]
                           (every? true? (map #(nodes-connected? n1 % n1 graph)
                                              (remove #(= % n1) distinct-nodes))))
                         distinct-nodes)))))

(fn [pairs]
    (let [all (set (mapcat identity pairs))
          m (merge 
              (into {} (for [i all j all] [[i j] (if (= i j) 0 1)]))
              (into {} (for [p pairs] [p 0]))
              (into {} (for [p pairs] [(reverse p) 0])) )]
      (->> (for [k all i all j all] [i j k])
        (reduce
          (fn [m [i j k]]
            (update-in m [[i j]] min (+ (m [i k]) (m [k j]))))
          m)
        vals
        (every? zero?)
        )))

(fn connected? [graph]
  ; do transform input graph into the one where managing connections between nodes is much easier: {:x [:y :z], :y [:x], :z [:x]}
  (let [g (apply merge-with #(vec (concat %1 %2)) 
                 (map #(conj {} [(first %) [(second %)]] [(second %) [(first %)]]) graph))]
    (let [start-node (rand-nth (keys g)) ; start from any node, doesn't matter
          visited  (atom #{})]
      (letfn [(collect-all-connected-nodes [node]
                (doseq [adjacent-node (get g node)]
                  (when-not (contains? @visited adjacent-node)
                    (swap! visited conj adjacent-node) ; update visited nodes so far
                    (collect-all-connected-nodes adjacent-node))
                  ))
              ]
        (collect-all-connected-nodes start-node))
      (= (count @visited) (count (keys g)))) ; if we have visited all the nodes, then graph is connected
    )
  )

(fn connected? 
  [edges]
  (letfn [
  
    (vertice-count
      [edges]
      (->> 
        edges
        (apply concat)
        distinct
        count))
        
    (full-bidirected-graph-count 
      [n]
      (* n (- n 1)))
      
    (add-opposite-edges
      [edges]
      (concat edges (map (fn [[a b]] [b a]) edges)))
      
    (no-self-edges
      [edges]
      (filter (fn [[a b]] (not= a b)) edges))
      
    (distinct-edges
      [edges]
      (set edges))
      
    (try-find [[af as] set-of-pairs]
      (reduce 
        (fn [found [bf bs]]
          (cond
            (not (nil? found)) found
            (and (= af bs) (= bf as)) nil
            (= af bs) (if (set-of-pairs [bf as]) nil [bf as])
            (= bf as) (if (set-of-pairs [af bs]) nil [af bs])
            :else nil))
        nil
        set-of-pairs))

    (try-add [e set-of-pairs]
      (let [found (try-find e set-of-pairs)]
        (if 
          (nil? found) set-of-pairs
          (conj set-of-pairs found))))
        
    (trans-clos-step [set-of-pairs]
      (->> (map #(try-add %1 set-of-pairs) set-of-pairs) (apply clojure.set/union)))

    (trans-clos [set-of-pairs]
      (loop [this-set set-of-pairs]
        (let [new-set (trans-clos-step this-set)]
          (if
            (= new-set this-set) this-set
            (recur new-set)))))

    ]
    (let [
      normalized-no-self-edges (no-self-edges edges)
      
      normalized
        (->> 
          edges 
          no-self-edges 
          distinct-edges)
        
      normalized-bidirected 
        (->> 
          edges
          no-self-edges 
          add-opposite-edges 
          distinct-edges)
        
      transitive-closure-normalized-bidirected
        (->> 
          edges
          no-self-edges 
          add-opposite-edges 
          distinct-edges
          set
          trans-clos
          add-opposite-edges 
          no-self-edges 
          distinct-edges)
      ]
      (= (full-bidirected-graph-count (vertice-count edges))
         (count transitive-closure-normalized-bidirected)))))

(fn [g]
  (let [a (set (flatten (seq g)))
        f (first g)]
    (loop [r (set f)]
      (let [n (flatten (filter (fn[[a b]]
                                 (or (and (r a) (not (r b)))
                                     (and (r b) (not (r a))))) g))]
        (if (empty? n)
          (= r a)
          (recur (set (concat r n ))))))))

(fn [t]
  (let [g (reduce (fn [z [a b]] (merge-with concat z {a [b]} {b [a]})) {} t)
        h (iterate #(into % (mapcat g %)) #{(ffirst t)})
        [[a _] & _] (drop-while (fn [[a b]] (not= a b)) (map vector h (next h)))]
      (== (count (keys g)) (count a))))

(fn grconn
  ([edges] (grconn (set (first edges)) (set (rest edges))))
  ([nds es]
     (letfn [(conn? [e] (or (nds (first e)) (nds (second e)))),
             (connpoint [e] (if (nds (first e)) (second e) (first e)))]
       (cond (empty? es) true,
             (empty? (filter conn? es)) false,
             :else (recur (set (concat nds (map connpoint (filter conn? es))))
                          (set (filter (complement conn?) es)))))))

(fn [edges]
  (letfn [(joint? [a b]
            (not (empty? (clojure.set/intersection a b))))
          (conj-edge [components edge]
            (let [newcomp (set edge)
                  {conn true, unconn false} (group-by #(joint? newcomp %) components)]
              (conj unconn (apply clojure.set/union newcomp conn))))]
  (->> edges
    (reduce conj-edge [])
    count
    (= 1))))

(fn [s]
  (let [o (set (apply concat (for [e s] (vector (first e) (second e)))))
        m (zipmap o (range))
        os (sort #(if (= (m (first %)) (m (first %2))) (< (m (second %)) (m (second %2))) (< (m (first %)) (m (first %2)))) s)]
    (= o (clojure.set/intersection o 
                                   (reduce #(set (remove nil? (concat % (for [x %] (cond (= x (first %2)) (second %2)
                                                                            (= x (second %2)) (first %2)))))) #{(ffirst os)} os)))))

(fn p91 [routes]
  (letfn [(mks [ngs r]
            (let [cs (filter (fn [ng] (some #(ng %) r)) ngs)
                  th (reduce conj #{} r)]
              (if (every? nil? cs) (conj ngs th)
                          (conj (reduce disj ngs cs) (reduce conj #{} (reduce concat (conj cs th)))))))
          (mkg [a n rs]
            (if (empty? rs) n
		(mkg (reduce conj a (first rs)) (mks n (first rs)) (next rs) )))]
    (= 1 (count (mkg #{} #{} routes)))))

#(loop [r #{(ffirst %)}]
   (let [nr (reduce (fn [r a]
                      (->> (filter (fn [[b c]] (or (= b a) (= c a))) %)
                           flatten
                           (into r)))
                    r r)]
     (if (= r nr)
       (= r (set (flatten (seq %))))
       (recur nr))))

(fn connected-graph? [edges]
  (let [adj-list (fn [edges]
                   (->> (into edges (map #(vec (reverse %)) edges))
                        (group-by first)
                        (map #(vector (first %) (map second (second %))))
                        (apply map vector)
                        (apply zipmap)))
        bfs (fn [v adj]
              (loop [que [v]
                     visited #{v}]
                (if (empty? que)
                  visited
                  (let [to-visit (concat
                                   (rest que)
                                   (filter #(not (contains? visited %)) (adj (first que))))
                        with-neighbours (if (empty? to-visit)
                                          visited
                                          (apply conj visited to-visit))]
                    (recur to-visit with-neighbours)))))
        adj (adj-list edges)]
    (= (count adj) (count (bfs (ffirst adj) adj)))))

(fn connected? [graph]
  (letfn [(transitions [node graph]
                       (set (map #(if (= node (first %)) % (reverse %))
                                 (filter #(or (= node (first %)) (= node (second %))) graph))))
          
          (reachable-nodes [start-node explored-nodes graph]
                           (let [explored-nodes (conj explored-nodes start-node)
                                 unexplored-transistions (remove #(explored-nodes (second %)) (transitions start-node graph))]
                             (if (empty? unexplored-transistions)
                               explored-nodes
                               (reduce #(into %1 (reachable-nodes (second %2) explored-nodes graph))
                                       explored-nodes 
                                       unexplored-transistions))))
          
          (nodes [transitions]
                 (reduce #(conj (conj %1 (first %2)) (second %2)) 
                         #{} 
                         transitions))]
         
         (= (count (nodes graph))
            (count (reachable-nodes (ffirst graph) #{} graph)))))

(fn [n]
  (loop [c #{(first n)}]
    (let [m (into c (apply concat (for [i c o n :when (some (set i) (set o))] (for [k i l o] [k l]))))]
      (or (clojure.set/subset? n m)
        (if (= m c) false (recur m))))))

(fn [edges]
  (letfn [(vertecies []
            (into #{} (apply concat edges)))
          (neighbors [vtx]
            (mapcat (fn [[x y]]
                      (cond (= x vtx) [y]
                            (= y vtx) [x]
                            :else nil)) edges))
          (iter [vs visited]
            (if (empty? vs) visited
                (let [res (reduce disj (set (mapcat neighbors vs)) visited)]
                  (iter res (reduce conj visited res)))))]
    (= (vertecies) (iter #{(first (first edges))} #{}))))

(fn [xs] (let [nodes (set (distinct (apply concat (seq xs))))
               aux (fn [f g z nd] (reduce #(if (= (f %2) nd) (into % (vector (g %2))) %) z xs))
               go (fn [nd] (aux first second (aux second first #{} nd) nd))
               succ (fn [nds] (reduce into (map go nds)))
                ]
           (letfn [(limit [z] (into z (if (= z (succ z)) () (limit (succ z)))))]
            (= nodes (set (limit (set (first xs))))))))

(fn [G]
  (loop [e (rest G) C (into #{} (first G))]
    (let [{c true d false} (group-by #(->> % (some C) boolean) e)]
      (if (or (empty? e) (empty? c))
        (every? C (flatten (into [] G)))
        (recur d (into C (flatten c)))))))

( fn __ [edges]
    (let [edge-list (apply merge-with concat (map (fn [[s e]] (if (= s e) {s []} {s [e] e [s]})) edges))
           explore (fn [[seen frontier]]
                     (let [new-frontier (set (remove seen (mapcat edge-list frontier)))]
                       [(clojure.set/union seen new-frontier) new-frontier]))
           start (ffirst edges)
           component (ffirst (filter #(empty? (second %)) (iterate explore [#{start} #{start}])))]
          (=  (count component) (count edge-list))))

(fn connected-graph? [edges]
  (let [outbound (->> (concat edges (map reverse edges))
                      (group-by first)
                      (map (fn [[node edge-list]]
                             [node (set (map second edge-list))]))
                      (into {}))
        nodes (set (keys outbound))]
    (loop [visited #{(first nodes)}]
      (let [next-visited (->> (mapcat outbound visited)
                              (into visited))]
        (cond
          (= next-visited nodes)
          true

          (= next-visited visited)
          false

          :default
          (recur next-visited))))))

(fn connected? [G]
  (letfn [(united? [x y G]
    (loop [radiation #{x}]
      ;; grab the edges 
      (let [rad-edges (filter #(not-empty (clojure.set/intersection radiation %)) G)]
        ;; grab the nodes corresponding to those edges
        (let [new-radiation (reduce clojure.set/union rad-edges)]
          ;; if we fully expanded, then we're done
          (cond (contains? new-radiation y) true
                 ;; if not, and if new radition achieved no effect, we're stuck
                (= radiation new-radiation) false
                ;; otherwise, continue the radiation outward
                true (recur new-radiation))))))]

  (let [nodes (reduce clojure.set/union G) cartesian-product (fn [A B] (set (for [a A b B] [a b])))]
    (reduce #(and %1 %2) (for [pair (cartesian-product nodes nodes)] 
                  (united? (first pair) (second pair) (set (map set G))))))))

(fn [g]
    (let [start (ffirst g)
          num-nodes (count (into #{} (flatten (seq g))))
          edges (into #{} (clojure.set/union g (map reverse g)))
          orbit (fn orbit [n e already-seen]
                       (let [out-edges (filter #(= n (first %)) e)
                             successors (clojure.set/difference (into #{} (map last out-edges)) already-seen)]
                         (if (empty? successors)
                           already-seen
                           (let [other-edges (clojure.set/difference e out-edges)]
                             (apply clojure.set/union (map #(orbit % other-edges (into already-seen[%])) successors))))))
          component (orbit start edges #{start})]
      (= num-nodes (count component))))

(fn [s1]
          (let [
                [m1 nodes]  (reduce (fn [[acc accn] [l r :as t]] 
                              [(merge-with concat acc {l [r]} ) (into accn [ l r])]) [{} #{}] s1)
                m2 (reduce (fn [acc xxs] (let [vw (get m1 xxs)]
                                               (reduce (fn [a1 v1] (merge-with concat a1 {v1 [xxs]}))
                                                       acc
                                                       vw
                                                       ))) m1 (keys m1))
                allxs (keys m1)
                k1 [(first allxs)]
                ]
            (loop [rs (into #{} k1) ]
             (let 
               [k2 (reduce (fn [acc ls]  (into acc (get m2 ls))) rs rs)]               
                 (if (= (count k2) (count rs))
                  (= (count k2) (count nodes))
                  (recur k2 )
                 ))))
          )

(fn connected-graph? [tuples]
  (let [whereis (fn [l r xs]
                  (let [il (.indexOf xs l)
                        ir (.indexOf xs r)]
                    (cond
                      (= [-1 -1] [il ir]) nil
                      (not= -1 il) [(inc il) r]
                      (not= -1 ir) [ir l])))
        insert-before-idx (fn [v n e]
                            (if (= n (count v))
                              (into v [e])
                              (let [l (subvec v 0 n)
                                    r (subvec v n (count v))]
                                (into l (into [e] r)))))
        some? #(-> % nil? not)
        tuples->runs (fn [already tuples]
                       (reduce (fn [acc [l r]]
                                 (let [wheres (map #(whereis l r %) acc)]
                                   (if (empty? (remove nil? wheres))
                                     (conj acc [l r])
                                     (let [updater (->> wheres
                                                        (map-indexed #(when (some? %2) (into [%1] %2)))
                                                        (some #(when (some? %) %)))
                                           where-1 (first updater)
                                           where-2 (second updater)
                                           what (first (drop 2 updater))]
                                       (update-in acc [where-1] (fn [v]
                                                                  (insert-before-idx v where-2 what)))))))
                               already
                               tuples))
        grouped (->> tuples
                     ((partial tuples->runs []))
                     (group-by count))
        new-tuples (get grouped 2)
        non-tuple-key (first (disj (set (keys grouped)) 2))
        in-again (get grouped non-tuple-key)
        ]
    (= 1 (count (tuples->runs in-again new-tuples)))))

(fn [g]
  (letfn
     [(direct-connections [n]
        (reduce (fn [acc edge] (if ((set edge) n) (into acc edge) acc)) #{} g))

      (graph-connections [n]
        (loop [connections #{}
               new-connections #{n}]
          (if (or (= connections new-connections) (empty? new-connections))
            connections
            (recur
              (into connections new-connections)
              (reduce (fn [acc n] (into acc (direct-connections n)))
                      #{}
                      (clojure.set/difference new-connections connections))))))]

    (let [all-nodes (set (flatten (map identity g)))]
      (every? (partial = all-nodes) (map graph-connections all-nodes)))))

(fn [edges]
   (letfn [(touches [comp [x y]]
             (or (contains? comp x) (contains? comp y)))
           (add [comps edge]
             (let [to-merge (conj (set (filter #(touches % edge) comps)) (set edge))
                   others (clojure.set/difference comps to-merge)]
               (into #{(apply clojure.set/union to-merge)} others)))]
     (= 1 (count (reduce add #{} edges))))
   )

(fn [s]
  (true?
    ((fn connected? [node-set reminder]
       (or (empty? reminder)
           (some #(when (some (fn [k] (node-set k)) %)
                   (connected? (into node-set %) (disj (set reminder) %))) reminder)))
      (into #{} (first s)) (rest s))))

(fn graph-connect
  ([s] 
    (let [el (distinct (flatten (seq s)))]
      (every?
        #(graph-connect (first %) (second %) s)
          (for [i el j el] [i j]))))
  ([a b s]
    (letfn [(any? [f s] ((comp boolean some) f s))
            (includes? [s a] (any? (partial = a) s))
            (rm-one [s a] 
                (concat 
                  (remove (partial = a) s) 
                  (rest (filter (partial = a) s))))]
    (if (= a b)
    true
    (if (empty? s)
      false
      (let [next (filter #(includes? % a) s)]
        (if (empty? next)
          false
          (any?
            #(graph-connect 
              (if (= (second %) a) (first %) (second %))
              b
              (rm-one s %))
            next))))))))

(fn my-graph-connectivity [g]
  (letfn [(f [edge]
            (#(if (= % edge) (= % g) (f %))
              (reduce (fn [a b]
                         (into a (filter #(some (set b) %) g)))
                      #{}
                      edge)))]
      (f #{(first g)})))

(fn [s]
  (loop [edges (rest s) nodes (set (first s))]
    (let [parts (group-by (fn [[a b]] (not (nil? (or (nodes a) (nodes b))))) edges)
          in (set (apply concat (parts true))) out (set (parts false))
          newnodes (into nodes in)]
      (cond (empty? out) true
            (= newnodes nodes) false
            true (recur out newnodes)))))

(fn __ [edges]
  (letfn [(connected? [c1 c2]
                      (not (empty? (clojure.set/intersection c1 c2))))
          (add-comp [c1 c2]
                      (if (connected? c1 c2) (apply conj c1 c2) c1))
          (merge-comp [cs]
                      (if (empty? cs) '()
                        (let [c (first cs), rs (rest cs)]
                          (if (true? (some true? (map #(connected? c %) rs)))
                            (merge-comp (map #(add-comp % c) rs))
                            (cons c (merge-comp rs))))))
          ]
    (->> (map #(into #{} %) edges)
         (merge-comp)
         (count)
         (#(= 1 %)))))

(fn connected-graph [graph]
  (letfn [(walk [graph seen]
  	(loop [i (count graph) seen seen]
		  (if (zero? i)
		    seen
		    (recur (dec i)
			   (walk-graph graph seen)))))
	  (walk-graph [graph seen]
		      (loop [g graph seen seen]
			(if (empty? g)
			  seen
			  (let [[a b] (first g)]
			    (recur (rest g)
				   (map (fn [seen]
					     (if (seen a)
					       (conj seen b)
					       (if (seen b)
						 (conj seen a)
						 seen)))
					seen))))))]
    (let [seen (walk graph [#{(ffirst graph)}])]
     (not (nil?
	   (some (fn [g] (= (count (set (flatten (vec graph))))
			    (count g)))
		 seen))))))

(fn [s]
  (let [con (reduce (fn [m [k v]]
                      (->> m
                           (merge-with concat {k [v]})
                           (merge-with concat {v [k]})))
                    {} s)
        reachables (fn [k]
                     (loop [open [k]
                            closed #{}]
                       (if (seq open)
                         (let [head (first open)
                               nc (conj closed head)]
                           (recur (into (rest open) (remove nc (con head))) nc))
                         closed)))]
    (apply = (map reachables (keys con)))))

(fn [G]
  (letfn [(add [R u]
           (if (contains? R u) R (assoc R u u)))
          (find [R u]
            (let [pu (get R u)]
              (if (= u pu) u (recur R pu))))
          (union [R u v]
            (let [pu (find R u) pv (find R v)]
              (if (= pu pv) R (assoc R pu pv ))))]
    (let [V (reduce (fn [V [u v]]
                      (conj (conj V u) v))
                    #{} G)
          R (reduce (fn [R [u v]]
                      (union (add (add R u) v) u v))
                    {} G)]
      (first (reduce (fn [[r c] u] [(= c (find R u)) c])
                     [true (find R (first V))] (rest V))))))

(fn connected? [g]
  (letfn [(other [x [a b]]
                 (condp = x
                        a [b]
                        b [a]
                        nil))
          (all-connections-with [x g]
            (mapcat #(other x %) g))
          (connected-to-root? [roots el]
            (some roots el))]
    (loop [roots #{(ffirst g)} g g]
      (cond
        (empty? g) true
        (empty? roots) false
        :else (recur (set (mapcat #(all-connections-with % g) roots))
                     (set (remove #(connected-to-root? roots %) g)))))))

                      (reduce 
                        #(if (seq (clojure.set/intersection %1 %2)) 
                           (clojure.set/union %1 %2)
                           %1)
                        visited
                        coords))]
    (loop [visited (first coords)]
      (if (empty? (clojure.set/difference everything visited))

          (if (= (count updated) (count visited))

            (recur updated)))))))
