(fn [s]
    (let [closure (fn [s]
                    (let [new-s (reduce
                                 into
                                 s
                                 (map
                                  (fn [[x1 x2]]     
                                    (set (map
                                          (fn [[y1 y2]]
                                            (if (= x2 y1)
                                              [x1 y2]
                                              [x1 x2]))
                                          s)))
                                  s))]
                      (if (= new-s s)
                        s
                        (recur new-s))))

          s' (into s
                   (map (fn [[a b]]
                          [b a])
                        s))

          closed (closure s')

          el->reachable (reduce (fn [acc [l r]]
                                  (merge-with into acc {l #{r}}))
                                {}
                                closed)
          ]
      
      (apply = (vals el->reachable))
      ))

(fn [edge-set]
  (let [all-nodes (reduce (fn [acc pair] (-> acc
                                             (conj (first pair))
                                             (conj (second pair))))
                          #{} edge-set)
        reachable-from-node (fn [node]
                              (reduce (fn [acc pair] (cond
                                                      (= node (first pair)) (conj acc (second pair))
                                                      (= node (second pair)) (conj acc (first pair))
                                                      :else acc))
                                      #{} edge-set))
        reachable-from-set (fn [nodes]
                             (reduce clojure.set/union nodes (map reachable-from-node nodes)))

        ]
    (loop [reached #{(first all-nodes)}]
      (let [reachable (reachable-from-set reached)]
        (cond
         (= all-nodes reachable) true
         (= reached reachable) false
         :else (recur reachable))))))

(fn __ [graph]

        start (set (first graph))
        expand2Width (fn [rrr edges]
                       (reduce
                         (fn [vers [f t]]
                           (let [
                                 ff (if (vers f)
                                      (conj vers t)
                                      vers)
                                 ff2 (if (ff t)
                                      (conj ff f)
                                      ff)
                                 ] ff2))
                         rrr graph))
        expanded (loop [
                        reached start
                        ]
                   (let [
                         reachedMore (expand2Width reached graph)
                         ]
                     (if (= reached reachedMore)
                       reached
                       (recur reachedMore))))
        result (= vertices expanded)

(letfn [(undirected [edges]
          (into edges (for [[from to] edges]
                        [to from])))
        (transit-1 [edges]
          (let [undir (undirected edges)
                nodes (group-by first undir)]
            (into undir (for [[from to] nodes
                              [_ intermediate] to
                              [_ endpoint] (nodes intermediate)]
                          [from endpoint]))))
        (closure [edges]
          (->> edges
               (iterate transit-1)
               (partition 2 1)
               (drop-while (partial apply not=))
               ffirst))
        (nodes [edges]
          (set (apply concat edges)))
        (fully-connected [nodes]
          (set (for [x nodes, y nodes]
                 [x y])))]
  (fn [edges]
    (= (fully-connected (nodes edges))
       (closure edges))))

(fn con
   ([graph]
      (letfn [(nodes [graph]
                (set (flatten (seq graph))))]
        
        (if (some true? (flatten
                         (for [node graph]
                           (con (disj graph node) node (-> (nodes graph)
                                                           (disj (first node))
                                                           (disj (second node)))))
                         ))
          true
          false
          )))

   ([graph cur-node not-visited-nodes]
      (letfn [(find-next-node [val pair graph]
                (some #(when (or (= (first %1) val)
                                 (= (second %1) val)) %1) (disj graph pair)))]
        (if (seq graph)
          (for [node graph]
            (let [next-node (find-next-node (second cur-node) cur-node graph)]
              (if next-node
                (con (disj graph node) next-node (-> not-visited-nodes
                                                     (disj (first node))
                                                     (disj (second node))))
                false)))
          
          (if not-visited-nodes
            true
            false)))))

(fn connected? [g]
 (let [adj-list (fn [s]
        (let [nodes (set (mapcat flatten s))
          nbs (fn [curr] 
              (mapcat (partial filter #(not= % curr)) 
                      (filter (partial some #(= % curr)) s)))]
        (zipmap nodes (map nbs nodes))))
       walk (fn walk [curr adj visited]
             (let [nearby (adj curr)
                   unvisited (filter (complement visited) nearby)
                   new-visited (into visited unvisited)]
             (if (empty? unvisited) visited
              (apply clojure.set/union (flatten 
                    (map #(walk % adj new-visited) unvisited))))))
       adj (adj-list g)
       nodes (keys adj)]
  (if (< (count nodes) 2) true
  (= (count nodes) (count (walk (first nodes) adj #{}))))))

(fn [s] 
     (let [con-to (fn [cc s] (into cc (for [x cc [a b] s] (cond (= x a) b (= x b) a :else x))))
           conn-comp (fn [cc s] (let [newcc (con-to cc s)] (if (= cc newcc) cc (recur newcc s))))]
        (= (set (flatten (seq s)))
           (conn-comp #{(ffirst s)} s))))

(fn is-connected [g]
  (let [f (fn [c-comp edge] (reduce #(if (or (= (first edge) (first %2)) 
                                             (= (first edge) (second %2)) 
                                             (= (second edge) (first %2)) 
                                             (= (second edge) (second %2)))
                                       (conj %1 %2) %1) c-comp g))]
    (= (count g)
       (count (reduce (fn [c-comp edge]
                        (let [v-c (flatten (vec c-comp))]
                          (if (some #(or (= (first edge) %) (= (second edge) %)) v-c)
                            (f c-comp edge)
                            c-comp))) (f #{} (first g)) (disj g (first g)))))))

(fn cn? [g]
  (let [ gs (map set g)
         find-eq (fn [eq]
						(reduce into eq 
              (filter #(some eq %) (map set gs))))
         drop-incr (fn [l] 
            (drop-while #(not= (count (first %)) (count (second %))) (partition 2 1 l)))]
					(=
					  (reduce into gs)
					  (ffirst (drop-incr (iterate find-eq (first gs))))
        )))

(fn path [coll]
  (letfn [(trans [coll]
                 (loop [coll coll]
                   (let [new-coll (into coll
                                        (for [[a b] coll
                                              [c d] coll
                                              :when (= b c)]
                                          [a d]))]
                     (if (= coll new-coll)
                       coll
                       (recur new-coll)))))
          (all-paths [coll]
                     (let [flat-coll (flatten (vec coll))]
                       (for [x flat-coll
                             y flat-coll
                             :when (not= x y)]
                         [x y])))]
    (->> (into coll (map reverse coll))
         trans
         (filter #(not= (first %) (second %)))
         set
         (= (set (all-paths coll))))))

(fn connected? [edges]
  (let [all-connections (fn [edges]
                          (reduce (fn [res [a b]]
                                    (conj res [a b] [b a]))
                                  #{}
                                  edges))
        edges           (reduce (fn [res [a b]]
                                  (assoc res a (conj (get res a) b)))
                                {}
                                (all-connections edges))
        vertices        (set (keys edges))
        dfs             (fn dfs [vertex vertices]
                          (let [vertices (disj vertices vertex)]
                            (reduce (fn [res conn]
                                      (if (contains? res conn)
                                        (dfs conn res)
                                        res))
                                    vertices
                                    (get edges vertex))))]
    (empty? (dfs (first vertices) vertices))))

(fn connected? [edges]
  (letfn [(add-edge [g a b]
            (update-in g [a] (fn [e] (if (nil? e) [b] (conj e b)))))

          (graph [edges]
            (reduce (fn [acc [a b]]
                      (add-edge (add-edge acc a b) b a)) {} edges))

          (dfs [g n]
            (letfn [(dfs-iter [stack visited]
                      (lazy-seq
                       (when-let [cur (peek stack)]
                         (if (visited cur)
                           (dfs-iter (pop stack) visited)
                           (let [adjs (g cur)]
                             (cons cur (dfs-iter (vec (concat (pop stack) adjs))
                                                 (conj visited cur))))))))]
              (dfs-iter [n] #{})))]
    (let [g (graph edges)]
      (= (set (keys g)) (set (dfs g (key (first g))))))))

(fn [graph]

(letfn [
        (nodes [graph]
          (distinct (flatten (into () graph))))
        
        (node-paths [node graph]
          (filter #(not (= node %))
                  (nodes (filter #(< -1 (.indexOf % node)) graph))))
        
        (nav-map [graph]
          (loop [rm (nodes graph), acc {}]
            (cond (empty? rm) acc
                  :else (let [node (first rm)]
                          (recur (rest rm)
                                 (assoc acc node (node-paths node graph)))))))
        (combos [graph]
          (let [nodes (nodes graph)]
            (loop [rm nodes, rm2 nodes, acc #{}]
              (let [n1 (first rm), n2 (first rm2)]
                (cond (nil? n1) acc
                      (nil? n2) (recur (rest rm) nodes acc)
                      (= n1 n2) (recur rm (rest rm2) acc)
                      :else (recur rm (rest rm2) (conj acc (into [] (sort (list n1 n2))))))))))
        
        (next-node [current-path failed-paths nav-map]
          (first (filter #(= -1 (.indexOf failed-paths (conj current-path %)))
                         (filter #(= -1 (.indexOf current-path %)) (nav-map (last current-path))))))

        (has-path? [node1 node2 nav-map]
          (loop [current-path [node1], failed-paths []]
            (let [n (next-node current-path failed-paths nav-map)]
              (cond (empty? current-path) false
                    (= n node2) true
                    (nil? n) (recur (pop current-path) (conj failed-paths current-path))
                    :else (recur (conj current-path n) failed-paths)))))

        (connected? [graph]
          (let [nav-map (nav-map graph)
                nodes (nodes graph)]
            (every? true? (map #(has-path? (% 0) (% 1) nav-map) (combos graph)))))]
  connected?)

(fn [edges]
  (let [[first-node & others] (flatten (seq edges))
        edges (map set edges)]
    (loop [connected #{first-node}
           unconnected (disj (set others) first-node)]
      (let [{new-connects true unconnected nil}
            (group-by (fn [node] (some #(and (contains? % node)
                                             (not (empty? (clojure.set/intersection % connected))))
                                       edges)) unconnected)]
        (cond 
         (empty? unconnected) true ; we've connected everything, hooray
         (empty? new-connects) false ; we can't connect any more, boooo
         :else (recur (clojure.set/union connected (set new-connects))
                      unconnected))))))

(fn [graph]
	(letfn 
	[(genNodes [in]  (distinct (apply concat in)))
	 (pathExists? [n e t]
	 	(if (= n t) true
	 	(if (empty? e) false
	 	(loop [ [x & xs] (filter #(contains? % n) e)]
 			(if (nil? x) false
 				(if (pathExists? (first (disj x n)) (disj e x) t)
 					true
 					(recur xs)
 					))))))
	(isConnected? [[curNode & nextNodes] edges]
		(if (nil? curNode) true
			(if (reduce #(and %1 (pathExists? curNode edges %2)) true nextNodes)
				(recur nextNodes edges)
				false)))
	]
	(isConnected? (genNodes graph) (into #{} (map set graph))))
)

(letfn [
  	(to-adjacency-map [edges]
			(loop [m {}, es edges]
				(if-let [[[n1 n2] & es] (seq es)]
					(recur (merge-with clojure.set/union m {n1 #{n2}} {n2 #{n1}}) es)
					m)))
					
		(transitive-closure-1 [m]
			(apply merge-with clojure.set/union (for [[k vs] m, v vs] {k (clojure.set/union vs (get m v))})))
			
		(transitive-closure-* [m]
			(let [m2 (transitive-closure-1 m)]
				(if (= m2 m)
					m
					(recur m2))))]
		
	(fn is-connected [edges]
		(let [m (transitive-closure-* (to-adjacency-map edges))]
			(= (count (keys m)) (apply min (map count (vals m)))))))

(fn [graph] (letfn [ (vertices [edge-set] (sort (distinct (flatten (map flatten edge-set))))) (without [coll item] (cond (empty? coll) [] (= (first coll) item) (rest coll) :else (cons (first coll) (without (rest coll) item)))) (seq-contains? [coll item] (cond (empty? coll) false (= (first coll) item) true :else (seq-contains? (rest coll) item))) (edges-with [edge-set vertex] (filter #(seq-contains? % vertex) (map flatten edge-set))) (vertices-with-distance-1 [edge-set vertex] (mapcat #(without % vertex) (edges-with edge-set vertex))) (expand [edge-set vertices] (sort (distinct (concat vertices (mapcat #(vertices-with-distance-1 edge-set %) vertices))))) (iterate-while-changes [f x] (cons x (map second (take-while #(not= (first %) (second %)) (partition 2 1 (iterate f x)))))) (expand-full [edge-set] (last (iterate-while-changes (partial expand edge-set) (take 1 (vertices edge-set))))) (is-connected? [graph] (= (set (vertices graph)) (set (expand-full graph)))) ] (is-connected? graph)))

(fn graph-connected? [graph]
  (let [; get all nodes from edges
        edges-to-nodes (fn [nodes]
                         (set (mapcat identity nodes)))
        ; all the nodes from the graph
        all-nodes (edges-to-nodes graph)
        ; nb of nodes in graph
        nb-nodes (count all-nodes)]
    (loop [nodes #{(first all-nodes)}]
      (let [; true if edge [fst snd] is connected to any of the nodes
            is-connected (fn [[fst snd]]
                           (or (nodes fst)
                               (nodes snd)))
            ; all the connected edges
            connected-edges (filter is-connected graph)
            ; the connected nodes
            connected-nodes (edges-to-nodes connected-edges)
            ; the new merged set of nodes
            nx-nodes (apply conj connected-nodes nodes)]
        (if (= nx-nodes nodes)
          (= nb-nodes (count nodes))
          (recur nx-nodes))))))

(fn [graph]
   (let [available (reduce (partial merge-with clojure.set/union) (map (fn [tuple] {(first tuple) #{(second tuple)}}) (concat graph (map reverse graph))))
         all-available-routes ((fn all-routes [prev next]
                                 (cond (= prev next) prev
                                       :else (all-routes
                                               next
                                               (reduce (partial merge-with clojure.set/union) (map (fn [route]
                                                                                                     {(first route)
                                                                                                      (into #{}
                                                                                                            (concat (second route)
                                                                                                                    (mapcat (fn [current-available]
                                                                                                                              (get next current-available))
                                                                                                                            (second route))))}) next)))))
                                [] available)
         
         node-count (count (distinct (reduce concat graph)))]
     (= (reduce max (map count (vals all-available-routes))) node-count)
     ))

(fn [graph]
  ; Algorithm:
  ;   Start with one path, any path. The vertices (or vertex) connected to that path make a connected set.
  ;   Now for each vertex V in the connected set C, loop over every vertex X in the disconnected set D.
  ;     Is there a path (graph edge) linking V to X? If so, add X to C and remove it from D, then repeat.
  ;     If not, continue looping.
  ;   Once you've examined every pairwise combination of vertices in C and D, check if there are any vertices
  ;   left in the disconnected set. If so, the graph is not connected. If D is now empty, the graph is connected.
  (let [all-pairs (fn [set1 set2] (for [a set1 b set2] [a b]))
        known-vertices (set (apply concat graph))
        first-vertex (first known-vertices)
        ]
    (loop [C (set [first-vertex])
           D (disj known-vertices first-vertex)]
      (if (empty? D) true  ; If we empty out D, we're done
        (let [next-path (first (filter graph (concat (all-pairs C D) (all-pairs D C))))]
          (if (nil? next-path) false  ; If there's no way to reach any vertex in D, the graph is not connected.
            (recur (apply conj C next-path) (apply disj D next-path)
                   )))))))

(comp
 (fn [[f & r]]
  (if (not r)
    true
    (if-let [n (first (filter #(some f %) r))]
      (recur (-> (set r) (disj n f) (conj (into f n)) seq))
      false)))
 #(map set %))

(fn [pairs] (= (count (distinct (apply concat pairs)))
               (count (loop [s (set (first pairs))]
                        (let [t (into s (for [[a b] pairs [a b] [[a b] [b a]] :when (s a)] b))]
                          (if (= s t)
                            s
                            (recur t)))))))

(fn [pairs]
    (letfn [(pairs-to-neighbor-list-map [pairs]
              (loop [[[k v] & pairs] pairs
                     g {}]
                (if-not k
                  g
                  (let [g (update-in g [k :neighbors] conj v)
                        g (update-in g [v :neighbors] conj k)]
                    (recur pairs g)))))

            (set-explored [g i]
              (assoc-in g [i :explored] true))

            (explored [g i]
              (get-in g [i :explored]))

            (get-neighbors [g i]
              (get-in g [i :neighbors]))

            (dfs [g i]
              (let [g (set-explored g i)
                    js (get-neighbors g i)]
                (loop [g g, [j & js] js]
                  (cond
                   (not j)        g
                   (explored g j) (recur g js)
                   :else          (recur (dfs g j) js)))))

            (all-connected [g]
              (let [v (first (keys g))
                    exp (dfs g v)]
                (every? (partial = true) (map :explored (vals exp)))))]

      (->> pairs
           (into [])
           pairs-to-neighbor-list-map
           all-connected)))

(fn [edges]
  (let
    [isconn
      (fn conn [g]
    (loop [s #{(first (keys g))}
          a s]
      (let
        [
          neighbors 
          (reduce (partial reduce conj) (map g a))
          news
          (reduce disj neighbors s)    
        ]
        (if (empty? news)
          (= (count (reduce conj s a)) (count (keys g)))
          (recur (reduce conj s a) news)
        )
      )
    ))]
  (->> edges
    (mapcat (juxt identity reverse))
    (group-by first)
    (mapcat
      (juxt first (comp set (partial map second) second))
    )
    (apply hash-map)
    (isconn)
  )
))

         (->> (map reverse edges)
              (concat edges)
              (group-by first)

        (connected? [graph visited to-visit]

               (empty? to-visit) false
               :else

               (recur graph

  (fn [edges]

      (connected? graph #{} #{(ffirst graph)}))))

(fn [edges]

                    (reduce #(if (pred %2) [(conj (first %) %2) (second %)]
                               [(first %) (conj (second %) %2)])

           (in-path? [path vs]
                    (let [t (separate #(or (contains? path (first %))
                                           (contains? path (second %)))
                                      vs)

                      (cond (empty? vs2) true
                            (= (count vs) (count vs2)) false                          
                            :else (in-path? (into path (apply concat (first t))) vs2))))]
    (in-path? (set (first edges)) (rest edges))))

                        (if ((complement empty?) (clojure.set/intersection nodes (set edge)))
    (clojure.set/union nodes (set edge))

          (connect-edges [nodes edges]

    (cond
   (empty? edges) false 
   (empty? (next edges)) true 
   :else (= (set (reduce clojure.set/union #{} edges))
            (reduce (fn [nodes n] (connect-edges nodes edges))
                    (set (first edges))

(fn graph-connectivity?
  ([nodes] (graph-connectivity? (first nodes) (rest nodes)))
  ([chain nodes]
    (loop [c chain n nodes m #{}]
      (if (or (nil? n) (empty? n))
        (cond
          (empty? m) true
          (= (count m) (count nodes)) false
          :else (graph-connectivity? c m))
        (if (not-any? (set c) (first n))
          (recur c (next n) (merge m (first n)))
          (recur (concat c (first n)) (next n) m))))))

  ([edge others] 
   (letfn [(notes [edges]

     (cond 
      (empty? others) true
      ((complement connectable?) others) false
      :else (or (contains? (notes others) (first edge)) (contains? (notes others) (last edge)))))))

; ts is a set of tuples like #{[1 2] [2 3]}
(fn __ [ts] 
	(letfn [
    ; is the passed set contain the same vertices as ts?
    (is-full-set? [x] (= (set (apply concat ts)) x))
    ; find vertices which are connected to the vertices in connected-vertices
  	(find-connected [connected-vertices]
      (let [
        ; find vertices which have connections with connected-vertices, and make a set by unifying them
      	new-connected-vertices
          (apply clojure.set/union connected-vertices 
            (for [tuple ts
              ; set from tuple
            	:let [stuple (set tuple)]
              ; find some connected vertices if any inside tuple
            	:when (some connected-vertices tuple)]
        				stuple))]      
                  (if (= connected-vertices new-connected-vertices) (is-full-set? connected-vertices) 
                    (find-connected new-connected-vertices))))]
    (find-connected (set (first ts))))  
)

(fn conn? [g]
  (let [adj-g (reduce (fn [m [in out]]
                        (-> m (update-in [in] conj out)
                            (update-in [out] conj in)))
                {} g)
        all (set (flatten (vec g)))
        init (first (keys adj-g))]
    (loop [cur-v init, remain (disj all init), temp-q []]
      (let [adj-v (adj-g cur-v)
            new-q (into temp-q (filter #(contains? remain %) adj-v))
            r (apply disj remain (cons cur-v adj-v))]
        (if (empty? r)
          true
          (if-let [next-v (first new-q)]
            (recur next-v r (rest new-q))
            false))))))

(fn graphConnected[l]
  (letfn [(createGraph[l]
                      (reduce
                        (fn [m [f s]]
                          (merge-with (comp vec set concat) m {f [s]} {s [f]})) {} l))
          (dfsPath
            ([g node dest] (dfsPath g [] #{} node dest))
            ([g v s node dest]
              (cond 
                (contains? s dest) #{v}
                (or (contains? s node) (empty? (g node))) #{}
                :else  (reduce
                         #(apply (partial merge %1) %2)
                         (map #(dfsPath g (conj v node) (conj s node) % dest) (g node))))))
          (cartesianProduct
            ([s1] (reduce 
                    (fn [s [fst sec]]
                      (if (or (contains? s [fst sec]) (contains? s [sec fst]) (= fst sec))
                        s
                        (conj s [fst sec]))) #{} (cartesianProduct s1 s1)))
            ([s1 s2] (set (apply concat (map (fn [el] (map #(vec [% el]) s1)) s2)))))]
    (let [g (createGraph l)]
      (every? identity (map (complement empty?)
                            (map (fn [[f s]] (dfsPath g f s)) 
                                 (cartesianProduct (keys g))))))))

           (dfs [start]
             (loop [visited #{start}
                    unvisited (reachable-from start)]
               (if (empty? unvisited)
                 visited
                 (let [this-node (first unvisited)
                       next-nodes (apply disj (reachable-from this-node) (into visited unvisited))]
                   (prn visited unvisited)
                   (recur (conj visited this-node)
                          (into (rest unvisited) next-nodes))))))]
     (let [all-nodes (nodes edges)
           first-node (first (first edges))]
       (= all-nodes (dfs first-node)))))

(fn connected? [graph]
  (let [graph-map (->> graph
                       (map (comp vec reverse))
                       (concat graph)
                       (group-by first)
                       (map (fn [[k v]] [k (set (map second v))]))
                       (into {}))
        traverse-depth-first (fn [graph start-node]
                               (->> [(list start-node) #{} []]
                                    (iterate (fn [[to-visit visited path]]
                                               (let [not-visited (filter (complement visited) to-visit)]
                                                 (if-let [next-to-visit (first not-visited)]
                                                   [(concat (graph next-to-visit) 
                                                            (rest not-visited)) 
                                                    (conj visited next-to-visit) 
                                                    (conj path next-to-visit)]
                                                   [nil visited path]))))
                                    (drop-while (fn [[to-visit]] (not (nil? to-visit))))
                                    first
                                    last))]                                                                                     
    (= (set (traverse-depth-first graph-map (first (keys graph-map)))) 
       (set (keys graph-map)))))

          (set

              (into a b)))
          clear-subsets (fn [s1 s2]
                          (filter

                              (not-any? 
                                #(clojure.set/subset? ss %)
                                s1)
                              )
                            s2)
                          )
          ]

        (= 1 (count sets))
        (recur (into combined-sets (clear-subsets combined-sets sets)))

      ))
  )

(fn g [graph]
  (let [sorted-graph (map sort graph)
        links (merge-with conj
               (group-by first sorted-graph)
               (group-by second sorted-graph))
        neighbors (fn [k] (-> (get links k)
                              (flatten)
                              (set)
                              (disj k)))
        nodes (into #{} (keys links))
        start (first nodes)]
  (loop [frontier (conj clojure.lang.PersistentQueue/EMPTY start)
         visited #{start}]
    (if-let [curr (peek frontier)]
      (let [neighb (remove (partial contains? visited) (neighbors curr))]
        (recur
         (into (pop frontier) neighb)
         (into visited neighb)))
      (= visited nodes)))))

        get-linked-nodes (fn [edge edges] (set (into (get-linked-first edge edges) (get-linked-second edge edges))))
        get-nodes (fn [edges] (reduce #(into %1 %2) #{} edges))]
    (loop [on #{(ffirst edges)}
           remaining (disj (get-nodes edges) (ffirst edges))]
      (if (empty? remaining)
        true
        (let [next-on (filter remaining (mapcat #(get-linked-nodes % edges) on))]
          (if (empty? next-on)
            false
            (recur next-on (reduce #(disj %1 %2) remaining next-on))))))))

(fn [pairs-set]
  (let [build-paths
          (fn build-paths
            ([path pairs]
              (if (empty? pairs) (list path)
                (let [new-paths (mapcat 
                  (fn [[a b :as pair]] 
                    (let [pa (ffirst path) pe (last (last path)) 
                          rpair (reverse pair)] 
                      (if (= pe a) (list (concat path (list pair)))
                        (if (= pe b) (list (concat path (list rpair))) 
                          (if (= pa b) (list (concat (list pair) path))
                            (if (= pa a) (list (concat (list rpair) path)) 
                              '() )))))) 
                  pairs)]
                  ;(println "path:" path "pairs:" pairs "\n new-paths" new-paths) 
                  (if (empty? new-paths) (list path)
                    (mapcat #(build-paths % 
                      (filter 
                        (fn [pair] (nil? (get (set (map set %)) (set pair)))) 
                        pairs)
                      ) new-paths)))))
            ([[pair & rpairs]] (build-paths (vector pair) rpairs))) ; fn build-paths []
	connected? 
          (fn [paths]
            (= (set (map set pairs-set)) 
               (set (mapcat (fn [path] (map set path)) paths))))
        pairs (seq pairs-set)] ; let
    (connected? (build-paths pairs))))

#(=

          (for [[a b] a
                [c d] (concat % (map (fn [v] (vec (reverse v))) %))]
            (cond 
              (= a d) [c b]
              (= a c) [b d]
              (= b c) [a d]
              (= b d) [a c]
              :else [a b])))))))

                          (contains? connected-set b))                                                      [a b]                                                                                 (recur (set (rest remaining)))))))]                                     (if (nil? c)                                                                            false                                                                       
          (recur (disj remaining c) (conj connected-set (c 0) (c 1))))))))

(fn [edges]
  (if (empty? edges) true ; why not?
    (let [vertices (reduce (fn [s [a b]] (conj s a b)) #{} edges)
          steps-from (reduce (fn [m [a b]] (merge-with concat m {a [b]} {b [a]})) {} edges)]
      (loop [visited #{(first vertices)}]
        (if (= (count visited) (count vertices))
          true
          (let [new-visited (reduce #(into %1 (get steps-from %2)) visited visited)]
            (if (= (count new-visited) (count visited)) false
              (recur new-visited))))))))

(letfn [(findk [s x] (if (= x (s x)) x (recur s (s x))))
		(unionk [s [a b]] (let [fa (findk s a) fb (findk s b)] (if (= fa fb) s (assoc s fa fb))))
		(addk [s [a b]] (assoc s a a b b))
		(makeSet [c] (reduce unionk (reduce addk {} c) c))

(fn [g]
    (letfn
      [(grow [g reached]
         (into reached (concat
           (for [[x y] g :when (contains? reached y)] x)
           (for [[x y] g :when (contains? reached x)] y))))
       (nodes [g] (into #{} (concat (map first g) (map second g))))
       (main [g]
         (loop [reached #{(first (first g))}]
           (if (= reached (nodes g))
             true
             (let [new-reached (grow g reached)]
               (if (= new-reached reached)
                 false
                 (recur new-reached))))))]
      (main g)))

(fn graph-connected? [g]
  (letfn [(adjacent-nodes [v g]
            (keep (fn [[a b]] (cond (= v a) b, (= v b) a)) g))

          (dfs-iter [v g]
            (loop [stack (cons v nil) visited #{}]
              (if (empty? stack)
                visited
                (let [node         (peek stack)
                      col          (pop stack)
                      not-visited? (not (contains? visited node))
                      next-visited (if not-visited?
                                     (conj visited node)
                                     visited)
                      next-stack   (if not-visited?
                                     (reduce #(conj %1 %2)
                                             col (adjacent-nodes node g))
                                     col)]
                  (recur next-stack next-visited)))))]

    (let [nodes       (set (reduce concat g))
          connections (reduce (fn [acc v]
                                (assoc acc v (dfs-iter v g)))
                              {} nodes)]
      (every? #(= (count nodes) (count (last %1))) connections))))

  (let [

  arbitrary-vertex (first vertices)
  add-all (fn [xs set]
    (apply conj set xs))
  remove-all (fn [xs set]
    (apply disj set xs))
  impl (fn [acc xs rem]
    (if (empty? rem)
      true
      (let [neighbors (->> (filter #(or (xs (% 0)) (xs (% 1))) edges)
                           (vertices-of)
                           (remove-all acc)
                           (remove-all xs))]
        (if (empty? neighbors)
          false
          (recur (add-all xs acc) neighbors (remove-all neighbors rem))))))
  ]
  (impl #{} #{arbitrary-vertex} (disj vertices arbitrary-vertex))))

           unconnected (disj nodes start)]

        (let [new1 (for [e edges :when (and (some #{(first e)} connected) (some #{(last e)} unconnected))] (last e))
              new2 (for [e edges :when (and (some #{(last e)} connected) (some #{(first e)} unconnected))] (first e))
              new (clojure.set/union new1 new2)]
          (if (empty? new)

                   (apply disj unconnected new))))))))

          (non-sharers [c1 cs2] (remove #(share? c1 %) cs2))
          (add-sharers [c1 cs2] (set (concat c1 (apply concat (sharers c1 cs2)))))
          (connected? [g]
            (loop [res (first g) leftover (rest g)]
              (if (empty? leftover)
                true
                (if (and (= (add-sharers res leftover) res) (empty? (sharers res leftover)))
                  false
                  (recur (add-sharers res leftover) (non-sharers res leftover))))))]
    (connected? gr)))

(letfn [(union [& xts] (reduce into #{} xts))
        (select [f? xt]
          (reduce #(if (f? %2) %1 (disj %1 %2)) xt xt))
        (isect [xt yt]
          (if (> (count xt) (count yt))
            (recur yt xt)
            (select (partial contains? yt) xt)))
        (isects? [xt yt] ((comp full? isect) xt yt))
        (popset [xt] (when-first [x xt] [x (disj xt x)]))
        (full? [x] ((comp not empty?) x))]

 (let [nodeSet (set (flatten (seq edgeSet)))];get the node set

     (let[extendedConnectivity (for [[linked node] connectivity, [n1 n2] edgeSet :when (and (or (= n1 node) (= n2 node)) (or (nil? (linked n1)) (nil? (linked n2))))]
                                 [(conj linked n1 n2) (if (= node n1) n2 n1)])];extend the connectivity when a newly linked node is found
       (if (not-any? #(= nodeSet %) (map first connectivity));if not a fully connected graph is found

([g] (cond (empty? g) false

([w g] (if (empty? g)

	   (let [is-adjacent? (fn [e1 e2] (let [[s t] e1 [u v] e2] 
	   		      	      	       (or (= s u) (= s v) (= t u) (= t v))))
		 w2 (for [e1 w e2 g

(fn [s]
  (let [nodes (fn [s] (set (reduce concat s)))
       relations (fn [s] (clojure.set/union s (set (mapv reverse s))))
       partition-nodes (fn [nodes] (map (comp set list) nodes))
       partition-merge (fn [part a b]
                         (conj (filter #(not (or (contains? % a) (contains? % b))) part)
                               (apply clojure.set/union
                                      (concat (filter #(contains? % a) part)
                                              (filter #(contains? % b) part)))))
       add-link (fn [[part tree] link]
                  (let [new (partition-merge part (first link) (second link))]
                    (if (< (count new) (count part))
                      [new (cons link tree)]
                      [new tree])))
       make-tree (fn [s] (second (reduce add-link [(partition-nodes (nodes s)) '()] (relations s))))]
  (= (+ (count (make-tree s)) 1) (count (nodes s)))))

(fn graph-connected?
  [edge-set]
  (letfn [(edges-connect? 
            [e1 e2]
            (or (= (first e1) (first e2)) (= (first e1) (second e2)) (= (second e1) (second e2))))]
    (cond 
      (<= (count edge-set) 1)
      true
      
      (= (count edge-set) 2)
      (let [one-edge (first edge-set)
            other-edge (first (disj edge-set one-edge))]
        (edges-connect? one-edge other-edge))
      
      :else       
      (not (nil? (some true? (for [one-edge edge-set]
                               (let [rest-edges (disj edge-set one-edge)]
                                 (if (some identity (map #(edges-connect? one-edge %) rest-edges))
                                   (graph-connected? rest-edges)
                                   false)))))))))

(fn t? [g]

          (span? [t g]
            (let [e (last t)]
              (if (empty? g)
                true
                (some identity (map #(span? (conj t %) (remove #{%} g)) (filter #(connected? e %) g))))))]
    (= true (span? [(first g)] (rest g)))))

(fn [dataset]
      (letfn [(contains-elem? [ coll it] (some #{it} coll))
      	      (add-node[coll item]  (if (nil? (contains-elem? coll item)) (conj coll item) coll ))
              (connected? [dataset node1 node2 ]
                (cond
                  (= node1 node2) true
                  (contains-elem? dataset [node1 node2]) true
                  (contains-elem? dataset [node2 node1]) true
                  :else false))
              (adjacency-list [edges]
                (let [vertices (distinct (flatten edges))]
                 (reduce (fn [m i] (assoc m i(filter (partial connected? edges i ) vertices))) {} vertices)))
              (build-path [adj-lst path]
                (if (seq adj-lst)
                  (let [key (last path)
                   paths (map (partial add-node path ) (adj-lst key))
                   adj (dissoc adj-lst key)]
                   (map (partial build-path adj) paths ))
                  path))
              (create-paths [adj-list tree]
                (let [[vertex neighbours] tree
                  root (conj [] vertex)
                  paths (into [] (map (partial add-node root) neighbours))
                  adj (dissoc adj-list vertex)] 
                  (map  (partial build-path  adj)  paths)))
              (check-path [edges]
                (let [adj-lst (adjacency-list edges)](map (partial create-paths adj-lst) adj-lst)))
              (is-trail? [edges]
                (not  (empty? (into #{} (filter vector? (tree-seq sequential? seq (check-path edges)))))))]
         (is-trail? (into [] dataset))))

(fn [edges]
  (let [assoconj (fn [m k v] (assoc m k (if (m k) (conj (m k) v) #{v})))
        nodes (reduce (fn [nodes [v c]] (-> nodes (assoconj v c) (assoconj c v)))
                      {} edges)
        visit (fn visit [visited v]
                (if (visited v)
                  visited
                  (reduce into
                         (map #(visit (conj visited v) %) (nodes v)))))]
    (= (count (visit #{} (ffirst nodes))) (count (keys nodes)))))

(fn connected? [g]
    (let [transitiveclosure (fn [m]
       (loop [storage #{} result m]
         (if (= storage result)
           result
           (recur result (set (into result (for [x result
                                                 y result
                                                 :when (= (peek x) (first y))]
                                             (vector (first x) (peek y)))))))))]
    (reduce #(and %1 %2) (map sequential? 
            (for [q (set (mapcat flatten g))
                 r (set (mapcat flatten g))]
             (some #{(vector q r)} (transitiveclosure (into g
                                                            (map #(vec (reverse %)) g)))))))))

(fn [edges]
  (let [edge-map (reduce (fn [m [v1 v2]]
                           (-> m
                            (update-in [v1] (fnil conj #{}) v2)
                            (update-in [v2] (fnil conj #{}) v1)))
                         {} edges)
        conn-fn (fn conn-fn [conn-set key]
                  (loop [vs (get edge-map key)
                         s conn-set]
                    (if (empty? vs)
                      s
                      (let [v (first vs)]
                        (if (contains? s v)
                          (recur (rest vs) s)
                          (recur (rest vs) (clojure.set/union s (conn-fn (conj s v) v))))))))
        all-vertices (set (keys edge-map))
        conn-set (conn-fn #{} (first all-vertices))]
    (= conn-set all-vertices)))

(fn dfs [edges]
   (let [vertices (into #{} (apply concat edges))
         start-v (first vertices)
         incident-edges (fn [v edges] (for [e edges :when (some #(= % v) e)] e))
         dfs-helper (fn dfs-helper [v old-explored-vertices explored-edges]
                      (let [explored-vertices (conj old-explored-vertices v)]
                        (for [e (incident-edges v edges)
                              :when (not (contains? explored-edges e))
                              w (remove #(= % v) e)]
                          (if-not (contains? explored-vertices w)
                            (dfs-helper w explored-vertices (conj explored-edges w))
                            explored-edges))))]
     (= vertices (conj (set (apply concat (flatten (dfs-helper start-v #{} #{})))) start-v))))

(fn walk
   ([g a b]
    (if 
     (empty? g) false
     (some true?
       (for [edge (filter #(= (% 0) a) g)]
        (if (= (edge 1) b) 
          true 
          (walk (disj g edge) (edge 1) b)
       )))))
   ([g] 
    (let [coll (apply vector (distinct (apply concat g)))]
    (every? true?
     (for [a (range (count coll)), b (range (count coll))
          :when (< a b)]
      ;[(coll a) (coll b) 
       (walk (clojure.set/union g (map (fn [[x y]] [y x]) g))
             (coll a) (coll b))
    )))))

                    (cond
                      (m s) m
                      (not (m t)) (assoc m s t)
                      (= s (m t)) (assoc m s nil)
                      :default (recur m s (m t))))]
    (> 2 (count (filter nil? (vals
                        (reduce (fn [m [s t]]
                                  (upd-comps
                                    (upd-comps m s t)
                                    t s)) {}  es)))))))

            (tstedge [e lg] (group-by #(intersec? % (set e)) lg))
            (nlg [lg e] (let [m (tstedge e lg)]

      (= 1 (count (reduce nlg [] grh)))))

(fn [g]
  (letfn [         
          (make-edges [g]
            (->>
              (filter (fn [[x y]] (not= x y))  g)
              (set)
              (into [])))
          
          (make-nodes [g]
            (into #{} (flatten (into [] g))))
          
          (make-matrix [ns]
            (->> (for [n1 ns n2 ns :when (not= n1 n2)]
                   #{n1 n2})
              (map (fn [n] [(first n) (last n)]))
              (into #{})))
          
          (make-times [ns]
            (int (* 4 (Math/pow (count ns) 2))))
          
          (contains-node? [[x y] n]
            (or (= x n) (= y n)))
          
          (next-edge [es n]
            (first (filter #(contains-node? % n) es)))
          
          (remove-edge [es e]
            (if (empty? es)
              es
              (let [x (first es)
                    xs (into [] (rest es))]
                (if (= x e) xs (remove-edge (conj xs x) e)))))
          
          (next-node [[x y] n]
            (if (= x n) y x))
          
          (walk? [es n1 n2]
            (cond
              (= n1 n2) true
              (empty? es) false
              :else
              (let [e (next-edge es n1)]
                (cond 
                  (nil? e) false
                  (contains-node? e n2) true
                  :else
                  (walk? (remove-edge es e) (next-node e n1) n2)))))
          
          (eval-edge? [es n1 n2 t]
            (cond 
              (zero? t) false
              (walk? es n1 n2) true
              :else
              (eval-edge? (shuffle es) n1 n2 (dec t))))
          
          (eval-graph [es mx t]
            (reduce 
              (fn [acc [n1 n2]]
                (if (not acc) false (eval-edge? es n1 n2 t))) true mx))]
    
    (let [es (make-edges g)
          ns (make-nodes g)         
          mx (make-matrix ns)
          t (make-times ns)]
      (eval-graph es mx t))))

(fn [graph]
  (let* [vertices (into #{} (reduce concat graph))
         init (->> graph
                   (mapcat (fn [[x y]] [{x [y]} {y [x]}]))
                   (reduce (fn [x y] (merge-with concat x y))))]
    (loop [i 0
           bag (second (first init))]
      (if (and (not (= bag vertices)) (< i (count graph)))
        (recur (+ i 1)
               (into #{} (concat bag (mapcat init bag))))
        (= bag vertices)))))

              [connected (conj others [a b])]))
          (find-conn [xs]
            (let [[connected others] (reduce 
                                       by-connected 
                                       [(set (first xs)) #{}] (rest xs))]
              (if-not (zero? (count others)) 
                (some (find-conn others) connected)
                connected)))]
    (boolean (find-conn g))))

           (= 1 (count (reduce (fn [x y]
                                   (let [f (first y)
                                         l (last y)

                                                                    (contains? % l))
                                                               x)
                                        q (clojure.set/difference x p)

(fn graph-connected?
  [path-map]
  (letfn [(upsert-relation
            [relation a b]
            (if (relation a)
              (update-in relation [a] conj b)
              (assoc relation a #{b})))

          (path->relation
            [relation [a b :as path]]
            (-> relation
                (upsert-relation a b)
                (upsert-relation b a)))

          (path-map->relations
            [path-map]
            (reduce path->relation {} path-map))

          (count-connected-nodes
            ([relations] (let [my-first
                               (ffirst relations)] (count-connected-nodes relations my-first #{my-first} 1)))
            ([relations next visited counter]
             (let [all-neighbours          (relations next)
                   [unknown-n new-v new-c] (reduce
                                            (fn [[n v c] x]
                                              (if (v x)
                                                [n v c]
                                                [(conj n x) (conj v x) (inc c)])) [[] visited counter] all-neighbours)]
               (if (empty? unknown-n)
                 new-c
                 (apply max (flatten (map (fn [y] (count-connected-nodes relations y new-v new-c)) unknown-n)))))))]
    (let [node-count (count (distinct (mapcat identity path-map)))
          relations  (path-map->relations path-map)]
      (= node-count (count-connected-nodes relations)))))

(fn gconn [x]
  (let [trans (fn [coll]
                (loop [c coll acc (count coll)]
    (let [nc (for [x c y c
                   :when (and ((complement =) x y)
                              (= (last x) (first y)))] [(first x) (last y)])
          nnc (clojure.set/union (set nc) c)]
      (cond
       (= (count nnc) acc) nnc
       :else (recur nnc (count nnc)))))
                )
        n (count (set (mapcat identity x)))
        g (set (mapcat (fn [[x y]] [[x y] [y x]]) x))
        g' (trans g)
        ]
    (= (* n n) (count g'))))

                 (conj V n))
          (= V N))))))

	(letfn [(all-nodes [edges]

			(all-node-combinations [nodes]
				(reduce #(if (%1 (reverse %2)) %1 (conj %1 %2)) #{}
						(for [n1 nodes n2 nodes] [n1 n2])
						))
			(paths [node all-edges visited]
				(for [e all-edges :when (and (or (= (first e) node) (= (second e) node)) (not (visited e))) ] e)
				)
			(other-node [start-node edge]
				(if (= start-node (first edge))
					(second edge)
					(first edge)))
			(path-exists? [start-node end-node all-edges visited]
				(if (= start-node end-node)
					true
					(let [edges (paths start-node all-edges visited)]
						(true? (some #(path-exists? (other-node start-node %) end-node all-edges (conj visited %)) edges))
						)
					))]
		(every? #(path-exists? (first %) (second %) edges #{}) (all-node-combinations (all-nodes edges)))
	))

(fn [edges]

              (let [v1-partitions (filter #(some #{v1} %) vertex-partition)
                    v2-partitions (filter #(some #{v2} %) vertex-partition)]
                (if (= v1-partitions v2-partitions)
                  (let [joined (into #{} (flatten (map seq v1-partitions)))
                        not-in-joined (for [p vertex-partition :when (not (some p joined))] p)]

            (add-edge-to-partition [vertex-partition edge]

                                    ;; else

                (merge-if-intersection new-partition edge)))]
      (= 1 (count
            (loop [edges edges

              (if (empty? edges)
                vertex-partition
                (recur (next edges) (add-edge-to-partition vertex-partition (first edges)))))))))

                 [l r]]
            (if (empty? acc)
              #{#{l r}}
              (let [grouped (group-by #(cond
                                         (and (contains? % l) (contains? % r)) :both
                                         (contains? % l) :has-a
                                         (contains? % r) :has-b
                                         :else :neither)
                                      acc)
                    joined (set (apply concat (map #(into % [l r])
                                                   (concat (:has-a grouped)
                                                           (:has-b grouped)))))
                    possible-new-subset (if (and (empty? joined) (empty? (:both grouped)))
                                          #{l r}
                                          nil)]
                (set (filter #(and (not (empty? %))
                                  (not (contains? (set (:has-a grouped)) %))
                                  (not (contains? (set (:has-b grouped)) %)))
                             (concat acc
                                     #{joined}
                                     #{possible-new-subset}
                                     (:neither acc))))
                )))]
    (if (= 1 (count input))
      true
      (= 1 (count (reduce phun #{} input))))))

            (recur (concat (rest q) adj)

(fn [edges] (letfn [
(reducer [cur [f l] ]
      (if-let [head (first cur)]
               (cond   (contains? head f)   (cons (conj head l) (rest cur)) 
                       (contains? head l)   (cons (conj head f) (rest cur)) 
                       :else (cons head (reducer (rest cur) [f l])))
        [(set [l f])])) ]
  (or
   (not (= #{} (apply clojure.set/intersection (reduce reducer [] edges))  ))          
   (= (count (reduce reducer [] edges)) 1))))

(fn [g]
  (let [step1? (fn [a b]
                 (or (= (first a) (first b))
                     (= (first a) (second b))
                     (= (second a) (first b))
                     (= (second a) (second b))))
        step1s (fn [as bs]
                 (set
                   (for [a as b bs
                     :when (step1? a b)]
                     b)))
        trav1 (fn [as bs]
                (let [abs (step1s as bs)]
                  [(clojure.set/union as abs) (clojure.set/difference bs abs)]
                  ))
        trav (fn f [as bs]
               (if (empty? bs)
                 [as bs]
                 (let [[as1 bs1] (trav1 as bs)]
                   (if (= as as1)
                     [as bs]
                     (f as1 bs1)))))]
    (empty? (second (trav #{(first g)} (set (rest g)))))))

(fn [g]
  (= (reduce #(into % %2) #{} g)
     (loop [res (set (first g))]
       (let [res+1 (reduce #(if (some % %2) (into % %2) %) res g)]
         (if (= res res+1)
           res
           (recur res+1))))))

(fn [g] (let [vs (reduce #(into %1 %2) #{} g)
              steps (fn [a] (into #{} (concat (map second (filter #(= a (first %)) g))
                                              (map first (filter #(= a (second %)) g)))))
              p (fn p ([a b avs] (let [cs (clojure.set/difference (steps a) avs)]
                                      (cond (= a b) true
                                            (empty? cs) false
                                            :else (boolean (some identity (map #(p % b (conj avs a)) cs))))))
                      ([a b] (p a b #{})))]
      (every? identity (for [a vs b vs] (p a b)))))

(fn fully-connected? [graph]
  (let [nodes (set (apply concat graph))
        full-graph (set (mapcat (fn [[a b :as n]] [n [b a]]) graph))
        children (into {} (for [[k v] (group-by first full-graph)] [k (set (map second v))]))
        connections (fn [node]
                      (->> (iterate #(into % (mapcat children %)) #{node})
                           (partition 2 1)
                           (drop-while #(apply not= %))
                           first first))]
    (every? #(= % nodes) (map connections nodes))))

(fn [graph]
          (let [all-nodes (->> (apply concat graph)
                               set)]
            (->> (iterate (fn [nodes]
                              (->> (for [n nodes
                                         t (concat (->> (filter (comp (partial = n) first) graph)
                                                        (map second))
                                                   (->> (filter (comp (partial = n) second) graph)
                                                        (map first)))]
                                        t)
                                   (concat nodes)
                                   set))
                          (set [(first all-nodes)]))
                 (take (count all-nodes))
                 last
                 (= all-nodes))))

(letfn [(component [sets v]
                (or (some #(if (% v) %) sets) #{v}))
              (update-components [sets [v1 v2]]
                (let [c1 (component sets v1)
                      c2 (component sets v2)]
                  (conj (remove #(or (= % c1) (= % c2)) sets)
                        (clojure.set/union c1 c2))))
              (components [vs]
                (reduce update-components #{} vs))]
        (fn [x] (= (count (components x)) 1)))

(fn [s]
    ;; Start with randomly selected edge as a seed
    (loop [found #{(first s)}
           pending (rest s)]
      (if-not (seq pending)
        ;; All edges found a place in the graph! Great!
        true
        ;; Find edges which match to any part of the graph
        (let [{matches true discards false}
              (group-by
               (fn [[a b]]
                 (boolean
                  (some (fn [[c d]] (or (= a c) (= a d) (= b c) (= b d))) found))) pending)]
          ;; If pile of discards is smaller, continue
          (if (< (count discards) (count pending))
            (recur (into found matches) discards)
            ;; It is not connected, because amount of edges is not shrinking
            false)))))

(fn f 
  ([edges] (not (nil? (f (first (first edges)) edges))))
  ([node edges] (let [branches (filter (fn [edge] (some #(= node %) edge)) edges)
                      other    (remove (fn [edge] (some #(= node %) edge)) edges)
                      children (map (fn [branch] (first (remove #(= node %) branch))) branches)]
                  (if (empty? branches)
                    (empty? other)
                    (some #(f % other) children)))))

(fn connected? [edges]
  (let [sets  (set (map set edges))
        nodes (set (mapcat identity sets))
        grow  (fn [nodes]
               (set (mapcat identity (for [n nodes s sets :when (contains? s n)] s))))
        connected (loop [prev #{(first nodes)} next (grow prev)]
                    (if (= prev next) prev (recur next (grow next))))]
    (= nodes connected)))

             #{} edges)))))

(fn connected? [graph]
  (let [first-node (first graph)
		  nodes (rest graph)
		  connected-nodes? (fn [[a b] [c d]] (cond (or (= a c) 
													   (= a d)
													   (= b c)
													   (= b d)) true
													:else false))]
		(loop [node first-node found [] nodes nodes]
			(cond (empty? nodes) true
			      (empty? node) (if (empty? found) false
								    (recur (first found) (rest found) nodes))
				  :else (let [toadd (into #{} (filter #(connected-nodes? node %) nodes))]
					 (recur nil (into #{} (concat toadd found)) (remove toadd nodes))
				  )
			)
		)
	)
)

(fn [es]

(fn [coll]
  (or (empty? coll)
      (= (set (apply concat coll))
         ((fn f [x coll]
            (set (apply concat [x]
                        (for [[a b :as e] coll
                              [y z] [[a b] [b a]]
                              :when (= y x)]
                          (f z (disj coll e)))))
            ) (ffirst coll) coll))))

(fn [i-set]
     (let [
           nodes (reduce
                   #(conj (conj %1 (first %2)) (last %2))
                   #{}
                   i-set)

           n-count (count nodes)
           n-range (range n-count)
           n-map (apply hash-map (interleave nodes n-range))
           n-index (fn [i-node] (get n-map i-node))

           edges (concat i-set (map #(apply vector (reverse %)) i-set))
           grouped-edges (group-by #(n-index (first %)) edges)

           n-dest (fn [i-node]
                      (map last (get grouped-edges (n-index i-node))))
           walk-graph (fn discover
            ([i-node] (discover #{} (hash-set i-node)))
            ([result discovered]
             (if (zero? (count discovered))
               result
               (let [
                     current (first discovered)
                     n-result (conj result current)
                     new-nodes (filter #(not (contains? n-result %)) (n-dest current))
                     ]
                 (discover n-result (reduce conj (apply hash-set (rest discovered)) new-nodes))))))
           ]
       (= nodes (walk-graph (first (first i-set))))))

(fn [graph]
 (letfn [(transitive-closure [rel]
           (let [nrl (clojure.set/union rel
                                        (set (mapcat identity (keep (fn [[r s]] (reduce (fn [a [u v]]
                                                                                          (if (= u s)
                                                                                            (conj a [r v])
                                                                                            a))
                                                                                        []
                                                                                        rel))
                                                                    rel))))]
             (if (= rel nrl)
               rel (recur nrl))))
         (undirected [graph]
           (set (mapcat (fn [[a b]] [[a b] [b a]]) graph)))
         (connected [graph]
           (let [nodes (set (mapcat identity graph))]
             (set (mapcat (fn [a] (map (fn [b] [a b]) nodes)) nodes))))]
  (= (transitive-closure (undirected graph))
     (connected graph))))

(fn graph-connectivity
  [s]
  (let [all-nodes (set (apply concat s))
        connections-mapping (reduce #(-> %1
                                         (update-in [(first %2)] clojure.set/union #{(second %2)})
                                         (update-in [(second %2)] clojure.set/union #{(first %2)})) {} s)
        node (first (first s))
        has-path? (fn has-path? [path connection node-b]
                     (cond
                       (= connection node-b) true
                       (contains? path connection) false
                       :else (some
                              #(has-path? (conj path connection) % node-b)
                              (clojure.set/difference (connections-mapping connection) path))))
        connects-to? (fn [node-a node-b]
                         (has-path? #{} node-a node-b))]
    (every? #(connects-to? node %) all-nodes)))

(fn connected-graph? [graph]
  (letfn
    [(connects-with-any [edge connected]
       (some
         #(some (set edge) %)
         connected))
     (get-connections [connected rest-edges]
       (filter
         #(connects-with-any % connected)
         rest-edges))
     (is-connected? [connected rest-edges]
       (prn connected rest-edges)
       (if (empty? rest-edges)
           true
           (let [new-connecions (get-connections connected rest-edges)]
             (if (empty? new-connecions)
                 false
                 (is-connected?
                   (reduce conj connected  new-connecions)
                   (reduce disj rest-edges new-connecions))))))]
    (is-connected?
      #{(first graph)}
      (disj graph (first graph)))))

(letfn [(connected? [conn-nodes edges]
                    (if (empty? edges)
                      true
                      (if-let [edge (some
                                     (fn [[x y]]
                                       (when (or (conn-nodes x) (conn-nodes y)) [x y]))
                                     edges)]
                        (recur (conj conn-nodes (first edge) (second edge)) (disj edges edge))
                        false)))]
  #(let [edge (first %)]
     (connected? (conj #{(first edge)} (second edge)) (disj % edge))))

#(letfn [(join [r s] (for [[x1 y1] r [x2 y2] s :when (= y1 x2)] [x1 y2]))
         (tc [r]
           (let [r2 (set (join r r))]
             (if (every? r r2) r
                 (tc (clojure.set/union r r2)))))]
  (let [h (clojure.set/union % (map vec (map reverse %)))
        pairs (for [e1 h e2 h] [(e1 0) (e2 0)])]
    (every? (tc h) pairs)))

(fn [g]
    (let [k reduce
          p (k (fn [m [a b]]
                 (assoc m
                        a (conj (get m a) b)
                        b (conj (get m b) a))) {} g)]
      (loop [n (into #{} (first g))
             c 0]
        (let [n (k
                  (fn [N n]
                    (into N (p n)))
                      n
                      n)
              d (count n)]
          (if (= d c)
            (= d (count p))
            (recur n d))))))

(letfn [(connected? [x+ items old new-items steps]
                    (let
                      [new-old (clojure.set/union old new-items)]
                      (cond (> steps (count items)) :should-never-happen
                            (= items old) true
                            (= new-items #{}) false
                            true
                            (recur
                             x+ items new-old
                             (clojure.set/difference
                              (set (for [[i j] x+ :when (contains? new-items i)] j))
                              new-old
                              ) (inc steps))))
                    )] (fn [x] (let
                                 [x+ (clojure.set/union
                                      x (set (for [[i j] x] [j i]))) items (set (map first x+))]
                                 (connected? x+ items #{} #{(first items)} 0))))

(fn connected? [g]
  (let [flood (fn [ns g]
                (let [ns' (into ns
                                (flatten
                                  (for [[a b] g :when (or (contains? ns a)
                                                          (contains? ns b))]
                                    [a b])))]
                  (if (= ns' ns)
                    ns
                    (recur ns' g))))]
    (= (flood #{(ffirst g)} g)
       (set (flatten (seq g))))))

(fn [x]
  (let [res ((fn bfs [c]
               (let [h (first c)
                     t (rest c)] (if (empty? t)
                                   (set h)
                                   (let [filtered (filter #(some (set %) h) t)
                                         paths (map (fn [elm]
                                                      (let [new-chain (concat [elm] (remove #(= % elm) t))]
                                                        (bfs new-chain))) filtered)
                                         longest (last (sort-by count paths))]
                                     (conj longest h))))) x)]
    (= (count (set (flatten x))) (count (set (flatten res))))))

(fn [edges]
  (let [; Build undirected graph. 
        ; Each vertex is mapped to its set of adjacent vertices.
        ; Undirected means if u is adjacent to v then v is adjacent to u.
        ; Self-loops are accomodated but don't figure into anything.
        g (apply merge-with clojure.set/union
                 (map (fn [[u v]]
                        (if (= u v)
                          {u #{v}}
                          {u #{v} v #{u}}))
                      edges))
        ; Is there a path from u to v?
        path? (fn path? [u v visited]
                (when (not (visited u))
                  (let [adj (g u)]
                    (or (adj v) (some #(path? % v (conj visited u)) adj)))))]
    ;(every? identity (for [u (keys g) v (keys g)]
    ;                   (path? u v #{})))))
    ; Does unnecessary work since u->v implies v->u in an unordered
    ; graph. No need to test u->u either since that follows if u 
    ; connects to every other vertex. 
    ; Solution: test 2-combinations (subsets) instead of ordered pairs:
    (loop [[u & vs] (keys g), flag true]
      (cond (nil? vs) (true? flag) ; both conditions are possible!
            (not flag) false       ; found unconnected pair
            :else (recur vs (every? #(path? u % #{}) vs))))))
	; Not very clojurish but fast! Sub 20 us time for test cases.
    ; One alternative: (let vs (sort (keys g))) and then
    ;(every? identity (for [u vs, v vs :when (neg? (compare u v))]
    ;                   (path? u v #{}))))))
    ; But this requires that vertices implement Comparable ...

(fn [edge-pairs]
  (let [edges
        (into {}
          (for [[k v] (group-by
                        first
                        (into 
                          (into #{} edge-pairs)
                          ; edges are bi-directional
                          (map (comp vec reverse) edge-pairs)))]
            [k (mapv last v)]))
        all-nodes (into #{} (mapcat val edges))
        num-nodes (count all-nodes)]
  (letfn
    [(not-in? [col item] (not (some #(= item %) col)))
     (branch? [node path] (and (edges node)
                          (not-in? path node)))
     (walk [node path]
       (lazy-seq
         (cons path
               (when (branch? node path)
                 (mapcat 
                   walk 
                   (edges node)
                   (repeat (conj path node)))))))]
    (->> (walk (first (first edges)) [])
      (apply concat)
      (into #{})
      (count)
      (= num-nodes)))))

(fn graph-connected? [pairs]
  (let [pairs (concat pairs (map reverse pairs))
        adjacencies (reduce (fn [m [k v]] (update-in m [k] (fnil conj []) v))
                            {}
                            pairs)
        dfs (fn [[current & more :as stack] visited depth]
              (cond
                (nil? current) false
                (= depth (count (keys adjacencies))) true
                :else (let [new-visited (conj visited current)
                            neighbors (filter (complement new-visited) (adjacencies current))
                            new-stack (reduce conj more neighbors)]
                        (recur new-stack new-visited (inc depth)))))]
    (boolean (first (filter identity (map #(dfs (list %) #{} 1)
                                          (keys adjacencies)))))))

(fn [es] (let [ng (fn [es ps] (into ps (apply concat (for [p ps e es :when (e p)] e))))
               n (count (set (apply concat es)))]
  (->> (iterate #(ng (map set es) %) (set (first es))) (take n) last count (= n))))

(fn [l]
  (let [m (reduce (fn [a [k v]]
                    (merge-with concat a {k [v]} {v [k]}))
                  {} l)
        k (set (keys m))]
    (loop [p (set (map vector k))]
      (cond
        (empty? p) false
        (= (count k) (count (first p))) true
        true (recur (reduce
                      (fn [q l]
                        (into q (reduce (fn [a e]
                                          (if (some #{e} (get m (last l)))
                                            (conj a (conj l e))
                                            a))
                                        [] (apply disj k l))))
                      #{} p))))))

(fn connected? 
  ([edges] 
    (let [nodes (set ((comp #(apply concat %) concat) edges))
          visited ((comp set list first) nodes)
          not-visited (clojure.set/difference nodes visited)]
      (connected? visited not-visited edges)))
  ([visited not-visited edges]
    (if (empty? not-visited) true
      (->>
        edges
        (filter 
          (fn [[a b]] 
            (or (and (visited a) (not-visited b)) 
                (and (visited b) (not-visited a)))))
        ((fn [e] 
          (clojure.set/union visited (set (apply concat e)))))
        ((fn [visited']
          (if (= visited visited') false
            (connected? 
              visited' 
              (clojure.set/difference not-visited visited') 
              edges))))))))

      (= c 7)

(fn
      Connectivity [col]
      (let [find_connection (fn [rest-edges current-grah]
                         (filter #(or (contains? current-grah (first %) )
                                      (contains? current-grah (last %) ))
                                  rest-edges))

           find_non_connection (fn [rest-edges current-grah]
                         (filter #(and (not (contains? current-grah (first %) ))
                                       (not (contains? current-grah (last %) )))
                                  rest-edges))]

      (loop [initset (set (first  col) )
             data (rest col) ]
             (if (empty? data)
                (not (empty? initset))
                (let [connected-edges (find_connection data initset)
                      non-connected-edges (find_non_connection data initset)]
                   (if (empty? connected-edges)
                        false
                        (recur (reduce #(clojure.set/union %1 (set %2)) initset connected-edges)
                               non-connected-edges
                          )))))))

(fn [edges]
  (loop [seen (set (first edges))
         remaining (rest edges)]
    (let [{reachable true
           unreachable false} (group-by (comp boolean (partial some seen)) remaining)]
      (cond
        (empty? unreachable) true
        (empty? reachable) false
        :else (recur (into seen (flatten reachable)) unreachable)))))

(let [node-map (fn [edges]
                 (->> edges
                      (mapcat (fn [[a b]] [{a #{b}} {b #{a}}]))
                      (reduce (partial merge-with clojure.set/union)
                              {})))
      connected-nodes (fn [node-map node]
                        (loop [q [node] nodes #{node}]
                          (if (empty? q)
                            nodes
                            (let [new-nodes (->> q
                                                 (mapcat node-map)
                                                 (remove nodes))]
                              (recur new-nodes (into nodes new-nodes))))))]
  (fn [edges]
    (let [nmap (node-map edges)]
      (= (connected-nodes nmap (first (keys nmap))) (set (keys nmap)))
      )))

(fn is-connected [xset]
  (loop [ret [] rst (vec xset)]
    (if (empty? rst)
      true
      (if (empty? ret)
        (recur (conj ret (first rst)) (rest rst))
        (let [tails (flatten ret)
              heads (flatten rst)
              common-elt (first (clojure.set/intersection (set tails)
                                                          (set heads)))]
          (if (nil? common-elt)
            false
            (let [add-elt (first (filter #(or (= (first %) common-elt)
                                              (= (second %) common-elt))
                                         rst))]
              (recur (conj ret add-elt)
                     (remove #{add-elt} rst)))))))))

(fn connected? [es]
  (let [makeAdj (fn [es]  ; construct an adjacency map: k = vertex, v = set of vertices adj to k
                  (let [addEdge (fn [m [u v]] 
                                  (assoc m u (conj (m u #{}) v) v (conj (m v #{}) u)))]
                    (reduce addEdge {} es)))
        adjMap (makeAdj es)
        visited (zipmap (keys adjMap) (repeat false))]
    (loop [visited visited 
           pending [(key (first adjMap))]] ; breadth-first search
      (if (empty? pending)
        (every? true? (vals visited))
        (recur (assoc visited (first pending) true)
               (into (rest pending) (for [v (adjMap (first pending) #{})
                                          :when (not (visited v))] v)))))))

(fn [graph]
  (let [graph (reduce (fn [m [a b]] (-> m (update-in [a] conj b) (update-in [b] conj a))) {} graph)
        path? (fn path? [a b v] (or (= a b) (some #(path? % b (conj v a)) (remove v (graph a)))))]
    (every? (fn [[a b]] (path? a b #{}))
            (mapcat (fn [k] (map #(vector (first k) %) (rest k))) (reductions conj () (keys graph))))))

      (set (keys g))
      (loop [[h & t] [(ffirst d)] s #{}]
        (if h
          (recur (into t (remove s (g h))) (into s [h]))
          s)))))

(fn [edges]
  (let [find (fn [m v] (first (clojure.set/select #(% v) m)))
        union (fn [m v1 v2]
                (let [vs (clojure.set/union (find m v1) (find m v2))
                      m (remove (into #{} [(find m v1) (find m v2)]) m)]
                  (conj (set m) vs)))]
  (loop [forest (->> edges seq flatten (map hash-set) (into #{}))
         edges edges]
    (if (empty? edges)
      (= (count forest) 1)
      (recur (apply union forest (first edges)) (rest edges))))))

(fn connected? [g]
   (letfn [(paired? [a b] (some (set a) b))
           (path-exist? [y s] 
             (let [r (remove #(= y %) s)]
                (if (empty? r) 
                  true
                  (some #(path-exist? % r) (filter (fn [x] (paired? y x)) r)))))]
     
      (true? (some #(path-exist? % g) g))))

#(let [n-lst
        (into {} (for [[k v] (merge-with concat (group-by first %)
                                                (group-by second %))] 
          [k (into #{} (flatten v))]))]
  (loop [hs #{(ffirst n-lst)}]
    (let [n-hs (into #{} (mapcat n-lst hs))]
      (if (= n-hs hs)
